If you've gotten this far we hope you will take a moment to use your social media platforms and some of the tools built into this campaign program to help us spread the word. You can still make a difference and help increase our audience with a few simple clicks of a button.  As always, we're extremely grateful to all those who support us!!!!

story:
Torso and Trunks is expanding and we need your help

 

Our timeline

Fall of 2015 

We created Torso and Trunks because we had an idea. Putting pockets on underwear. All around the world there are underwear parties in bars, night clubs, at home parties. We wanted people to be comfortable and not have to worry about holding cash or wallet in hand which typically happens. 

Spring/Fall 2016

We started working on designs for our underwear during the spring of 2016. While working on our underwear designs, we started with  selling fetish themed t-shirts. Heading into the summer we came up with a final design for our trunks and continued to grow our fetish themed t-shirt collection. By the fall,  we started having prototypes produced for us.

Spring/Summer of 2017

As our journey continued, we started going to adult expos and parties, our first expo was in Las Vegas and since then, Torso and Trunks has journeyed all across the USA. People loved our t-shirt designs. There was excitement over our underwear samples we took with us around the country. By the end of the summer we added hats to our growing collection. 

Fall of 2017

Our first batch of underwear arrived. We shipped out all pre-orders from the shows we visited earlier in the year. We received many great reviews, some saying they were the most comfortable pair of underwear  they have ever worn. As we traveled, we started to get approached by private clubs and shops from across the U.S. and Canada, asking if they can carry our brand.  We have also been invited to parts of Europe and Asia to showcase our brand at fetish events. But at the moment we are too small a company.

Today 

We need your help, we would love to start distributing our brand across the globe and keep up with our inventory demand. Currently we need to expand our color selection for our underwear line and bring up our inventory levels to keep up with demand.  We are adding new products to our collection as well, from kinky lapel pins to having more hats produced all fetish themed. Our collection will continue to grow over time as we do.

 

We have some amazing perks, don't believe me just check the right side of the screen yourself.  Torso and Trunks underwear at wholesale cost, such a great deal! Did we mention its our featured item. 

Size options will be standard USA sizes Small - 3XL

 

We need your help to grow!!! 100%%% of our campaign is to help our brand grow.

We have right now over 30 locations across the USA and Canada that want to carry our brand. We just need to make sure we can handle their first initial orders and some overstock for new orders from them and direct sales from our site. 

 

Where will the funds go, and why $33k?

Currently our underwear collection color options is limited to black, we would like to add four more colors to our collection and more size options, 2XL and 3XL. 

This campaign is for growing our underwear collection only, we are offering some sweet perks, by adding pins and hats and shirts we are making along the way.

We calculated the cost of making the additional colors and new size options. With taking out what indiegogo subtracts from our campaign, 33k is the exact amount it will cost us to add these options to our underwear collection. We are also adding sizes 2XL & 3XL.

The new colors we are adding to our underwear line are the four most popular colors of the hanky color code system.

These are just a few examples of our shirt designs you can select with any perk that includes a shirt by us.

 When you pick any perk that includes a t-shirt, you will be able to select any shirt and size from a collection of designs that will be sent to you via email at the end of our campaign. You will have dozens of designs to choose from.  More shirt designs towards the bottoms of the campaign.  Shirt sizes run SMALL-3XL

 

Accessories and more-

 

When you pick any perk that includes the lapel pins, that is the only item that will be selected for you from our collection of kinky lapel pins. The pins are valued at $9.99 per pin. 

Hats

If you pick any perk including a hat, you can select any hat from our collection. We will send you a list of hats to choose from via email at the end of our campaign. Our campaign is to focus on our growing underwear selection, but we added a few items like our hats and pins to give you some sweet perks.

 

Women love our trunks, designed for men but ladies wear them just the same. They love the pockets, most of our female buyers tell us the same thing, " We wear them at home and keep small things in the pockets, like our phones and more". 

So if any female or male that likes women's shirts feel free at the end of our campaign to select any women's style shirt. You selection will be provided at the end of the campaign. 

 

 

Our Impact on the World!!!

As we grow we want to give back. As soon as we can we will start giving back.

10% of all sales will go towards - Planned Parenthood and organizations that focus on stopping sex trafficking and helping its victims. 

 

Other Ways You Can Help

Some of you  just can't contribute we get it, but that doesn't mean you can't help:

  • Get the word out and make some noise about our campaign. 
  • Share our campaign on any social media platforms you can.  Tag us and hastag us #torsoandtrunks @torsoandtrunks
  • If you just happen to win the lotto...
  • Besides sharing us on social media platforms, follow us as well. @torsoandtrunks  on Twitter, Facebook and Instagram and Fetlife.

And that's all there is to it.

 

Other Shirt Designs to check out.

We will continue to add more designs in our updates over the course of the campaign. 

 

Risks & Challenges

This is our first crowdfunding campaign. The risk would most likely be we can not reach goal meaning not all underwear color options can be made( help us reach goal!!!). We picked a flexable goal, meaning we can still get any funds we raise. Some perks include getting all color options for the underwear. If we get most of our goal we would be able to produce most color options for the underwear, not all. We can ship the colors we produced and let you select what colors you would like duplicates of. Our goal is to have everything shipped by July of 2018. We have our factory ready to get the order going. If there is a delay, we will notify you immediately. 

Questions that might get asked....

 

What are the shipping costs?
Shipping varies. There is a surcharge applied at checkout. Simply click on the pledge and select your delivery country, you will automatically see what the shipment costs are for your selected country.

Will we receive a tracking number for our shipment?

All backers will receive a  tracking number by email once shipment is sent. 

Can I pick up my delivery?

This is unfortunately not possible.

What size options will you offer?

Underwear size options - Small, Medium, Large, Extra Large, XXL, XXXL.

Shirt sizes options - Small, Medium, Large, Extra Large, XXL, XXXL, XXXXL 

What materials are used in the underwear?

Our underwear is a unique cotton spandex blend for maximum comfort. 

Do I need to be a kinkster to select a perk?

No, you do not need to be a kinkster to select any perk, many fans of our brand just love some of the designs or products. Tons of people have purchased our trunks just because of the pockets. We have been told how comfortable they are and when they can travel they have a safe spot to put some emergency cash or credit card. 

What are the color options available to pick for the underwear?

Currently, we only have our trunks in Black, we are hoping to use the campaign to get the following colors added to our collection. Red, Green, Blue and Yellow. The most popular colors used in the hanky code color system. 

Why is Torso and Trunks such a cool company?

Because they care about you enjoying your life, you get one shot at it, so why not be kink 24/7.

 

 

Thank you for visiting our campaign.
story_txt:
Torso and Trunks is expanding and we need your help
 
Our timeline
Fall of 2015 
We created Torso and Trunks because we had an idea. Putting pockets on underwear. All around the world there are underwear parties in bars, night clubs, at home parties. We wanted people to be comfortable and not have to worry about holding cash or wallet in hand which typically happens. 
Spring/Fall 2016 
We started working on designs for our underwear during the spring of 2016. While working on our underwear designs, we started with  selling fetish themed t-shirts. Heading into the summer we came up with a final design for our trunks and continued to grow our fetish themed t-shirt collection. By the fall,  we started having prototypes produced for us.
Spring/Summer of 2017
As our journey continued, we started going to adult expos and parties, our first expo was in Las Vegas and since then, Torso and Trunks has journeyed all across the USA. People loved our t-shirt designs. There was excitement over our underwear samples we took with us around the country. By the end of the summer we added hats to our growing collection. 
Fall of 2017
Our first batch of underwear arrived. We shipped out all pre-orders from the shows we visited earlier in the year. We received many great reviews, some saying they were the most comfortable pair of underwear  they have ever worn. As we traveled, we started to get approached by private clubs and shops from across the U.S. and Canada, asking if they can carry our brand.  We have also been invited to parts of Europe and Asia to showcase our brand at fetish events. But at the moment we are too small a company.

Today 
We need your help, we would love to start distributing our brand across the globe and keep up with our inventory demand. Currently we need to expand our color selection for our underwear line and bring up our inventory levels to keep up with demand.  We are adding new products to our collection as well, from kinky lapel pins to having more hats produced all fetish themed. Our collection will continue to grow over time as we do.
 
We have some amazing perks, don't believe me just check the right side of the screen yourself.  Torso and Trunks underwear at wholesale cost, such a great deal! Did we mention its our featured item. 

Size options will be standard USA sizes Small - 3XL
 

We need your help to grow!!! 100%%% of our campaign is to help our brand grow.
We have right now over 30 locations across the USA and Canada that want to carry our brand. We just need to make sure we can handle their first initial orders and some overstock for new orders from them and direct sales from our site.

story:
Circular Clockworks

We, Ceriel Lucker and Tom Gudde, founded Circular Clockworks during our study Industrial Design at the Technical University of Delft. We were touched by a course showing the current poor state of our environment. Luckily they offered us the tools to do things differently.
We proudly present Supernova. A high-quality watch made from recycled materials and an additional service to recycle the watches again.

Colours
The Supernova comes three striking colours each with a own temperament. All of them can be matched with a sienna or black wristband. 

Lazy lion
Whether stalking its pray or simply relaxing in the sun, the Lion stands out from the crowd by its bright and playful color. 

Dazzling Zebra
It's excellent camouflage provides the perfect colorscheme for every occasion. It provides contrast to stand out from the crowd, yet is subtle under every outfit. 

Black Panther
Leave a strong impression. It provides contrast to stand out from the crowd, yet is subtle under every outfit. 

 

Design Choices
For the Supernova we have rethought every piece of a watch. All to close the material loops and to keep them valuable. 

Water resistance 
Not very special but important is the water resistance. It is not a divers watch, but in daily use it can handle every weather condition imaginable. 

Wristband
The wristband is a story of itself. The goal from the beginning was to exclude any metal parts. The result is a wristband from recycled leather with a small plastic pin locking it securely. Also the material changes during its life, gaining more personality over time.

Circular Coins
In the end, we do not just sell a watch. With each watch we give you 15 Circular Coins. Those coins help you to maintain your watch at its best state. And if its lays more in a drawer than it is on your wrist, we will make an offer you can't refuse. Earning our materials back, to make new watches from them.

Future

So is this watch a 100% circular? No, unfortunately not yet. And there we need your support. By funding our campaign, we will have the resources to do more research how to make this watch into a fully circular watch. Also it helps us to come up with more circular products.  
However the most important reason to support us, is that you will spread the word of the circular economy and show people that recycled materials are beautiful.

story:
Short Summary

Hi, thank you so much for your interest in our campaign. My name is Heather Bling and I am the founder of TheBlingClub.com. I started the company in 2015. Our goal has always been to bring beautiful, high quality jewelry to the public at great prices. From day one, all of our jewelry has been snag free. This means that it won’t catch on your clothing or hair. I personally “road test” every piece to make sure! There’s nothing worse than ruining an outfit by snagging your jewelry on it. You never need to worry about that with products from TheBlingClub.com.

We are launching this crowdfunding campaign to expand our product line and to increase our global presence through marketing. Our company has doubled it’s sales year over year since 2015 however we are at a crossroads when it comes to funding. We will continue to grow no matter what, but we really need $5,000 to launch us to the next level so we can continue to double or even triple our sales this year. I have personally bootstrapped the business until now but it’s time to ask for your help.

Getting the funding of $5,000 will mean the world to us! It will not only allow us to grow, but also will allow us to start hiring people and employ American workers. We work with a veteran’s organization called Patriot Placements and it would be our honor to be able to employ veterans. Any help that you can give us will be greatly appreciated!

What We Need & What You Get

It’s simple, we need money for inventory and marketing, you get a 40% to 50% BONUS on your donation to be used for FREE JEWELRY! It’s a WIN WIN! We will deliver your electronic gift certificate ASAP so you can go ahead and redeem it. FREE SHIPPING TOO!

We would distribute the $5,000 as follows:

$2000 for new inventory

$2000 towards salary to employ a veteran

$1000 for marketing (social media ads and Google)

If we don’t reach our goal, we would still allocate funds towards inventory and marketing however, depending on how short we are, we may or may not be able to employ a veteran. We really hope that we reach (or even better), exceed our goal.

The Impact

Your donation will help build a female owned company as well as supporting veteran employment.

Other Ways You Can Help

If you’re not in a position to donate, no problem. All we ask is that if you like our mission, please share our campaign on social media and help is get the word out! There are handy sharing tools right here on IndieGoGo. Thank you in advance and have a sparkling day!!

story:
DRY ME!

Is the only wire free diaper saturation sensor that uses Bluetooth Smart Technology and WIFI capability that alerts you to when it is time to change baby’s diaper.    

 

The DRY ME! Sensor warns you when the baby’s diaper is saturated.

 Most disposable diapers have a wetness indicator that changes color when the diaper reaches saturation, this means that you have to constantly check and disturb the infant.

The DRY ME! System alerts you to when it is time to change the diaper giving you the freedom to get on with your life without having to repeatedly check your infant.

 

TECHNICAL         

 

The DRY ME! Sensor has an element that uses URIC ACID as an electrolyte to create a current that powers a mini chip and transmitter that sends a signal to a ‘’Bluetooth’’ modified receiver/transmitter which alerts your baby alarm, smart phone, WIFI system or monitor.

 

 FEATURES

The DRY ME! Pack consists of two complete sensors, four spare disposable elements, the ‘’Bluetooth’’ modified receiver/transmitter, six rolls of adhesive sealing tape and the smartphone ‘’app’’.

HOW TO USE THE SENSOR

It’s as easy as one, two three!

ONE

Insert the sensor into the lower front of the outside of the diaper

 

TWO

Push the sensor into the outer layer of the diaper

THREE

Apply the sealing strip and your good to go

 

BENEFITS AND USES

Baby’s are very sensitive and can suffer from diaper rash and cracked skin which can be very painful.

The DRY ME! sensor reduces the time an infant’s skin is in contact with URIC ACID helping to relieve the problem.

The DRY ME! system gives you the ability to get on with your daily life, free from parental anxiety, knowing that your infant’s comfort is assured thus saving unnecessary checks which can disturb the baby.

The DRY ME! technology gives you the freedom to travel anywhere safe in the knowledge that your child is comfortable.

 

Further benefits   

The DRY ME! system can be used in hospitals and rest homes where long term patients are prone to painful skin conditions.

The sensor can alert medical staff thus helping to reduce a patient’s discomfort,

COMMONLY USED PRODUCTS

The DRY ME! system can be used in most popular brands of diaper

 FAQ

Q :- Is it safe for my baby?

A:- Yes, because the sensor does not have batteries or protruding wires   

     and is coated in medical grade silicone which is free of BPA,   

     Phthalates, latex, PVC and is totally non toxic.

Q:-  Can my child access the sensor in any way?

A:-  No, because the sensor is sealed in by a highly adhesive sealing strip,

        The sensor can only be removed by physically cutting the diaper.

Q:-   Can we travel or go shopping using the DRY ME! system

A:-   Yes, because the receiver/transmitter is low energy battery operated

        allowing you freedom of movement.

Q:-    Can I still use the DRY ME! system when my infant

          Becomes a toddler?

A:-     Yes, because the receiver/transmitter is portable and will alert your

          Smartphone as you move from room to room

Q:-     Can it be used at night?

A:-     Yes, because the package includes two sensors, so you have one on

          the infant and one in a clean diaper ready to change.

 

Q:-     Is it easy to clean?

A:-     Yes, just rinse in fresh water, shake and your ready to go.

 

Q:-     Do I have to change the batteries in the receiver/transmitter?

A:-     No, the unit is fully rechargeable and will last up to a week on one

          charge.

Q:-     How long do the disposable elements last?

A:-     They last approximately four months and are eventually degraded

           by the Uric Acid, therefore we include a twelve month supply of

           spare elements in the pack.

Q:-     What is the range of the sensor?

A:-     The receiver/transmitter must be within three meters of the sensor at  

           all times.    

 

MORE INFORMATION

The super-absorbent qualities of disposable diapers are not really the blessing they seem to be. Super-absorbent disposables can do three things,

1:  Facilitate less diaper changing from parents, which leads to rashes because of exposure to the super-absorbent chemicals, bacteria, and ammonia from accumulated urine in the diaper.

2:  Reduce air circulation and pull natural moisture (not just urine) out of your baby’s skin—which can cause irritation.

3:  Raise the temperature of a baby boy’s scrotum far above body temperature, to the point that it can stop his testicles from developing normally, according to a study published in the Archives of Disease in Childhood.

While diaper rashes can be caused by a variety of problems (food allergies, yeast, etc.), the majority of these rashes come from prolonged exposure to URIC ACID and diapers being changed less often because babies feel dry when they are actually wet.

The DRY ME! system helps to prevent these problems.

 

The system is not yet endorsed by a major manufacturer.

story:
Why am I here? 

Please take some time to retrace my journey with me. 

  • In 2006 I was 24 and preparing for a trip to Miami and like every other traveler I wanted to make sure my body was ready for the beach. I made the life changing decision to get on a scale for the first time since high school. I found out that I was 5'4 and 225lbs. I was flabbergasted. I decided at that moment to change my life. 11 months later I lost 65lbs and felt great. Since then I have explored many meal planning ideas and fitness models. I settled and fell in love with one Crossfit and have been a dedicated Crossfit athlete since 2010. My brand was born out of the Crossfit movement.
  • This brand is extremely important to me because it reflects everything I love and hate about living a fit and healthy lifestyle. It reflects bravado and moments you feel great. It also reflects down times and challenges that come with a fit life.  I'm passionate about building a brand that is durable, confident, transcending and engaging.
  • The contributors will help me do a great deal. My goal in 2017 is to attend a total of 10 Crossfit events in the Maryland, DC, Virginia, Delaware, New York and Pennsylvania areas. I intend to get booths and exercise old school gorilla marketing techniques to grow my brand through word of mouth. The funds will help me buy the inventory necessary and booth costs for the various events I plan to attend. 

What We Need & What You Get

  • We are in a need of $25,000 to help fund the inventory. We already have a supplier and have invested over $10,000 in mock and real products from 4 different vendors to determine who is the best. We only use the top of the line material and don't cut corners in quality.Tell people about your unique perks. Get them excited!
  • Our goal is to sell 12,000 shirts in 2017. Our profit margin is between $4.00 and $7.00 per sale depending on the size and type of shirt. 
  • Funds will be in our business account and will be tracked by our 3rd party bookkeeper. All funds are for business use and will not be transferred or shared with our personal bank accounts. We both have good careers in sales making over $90,000 per year with minimal debts.

Feel free to explain more about your campaign and let people know the difference their contribution will make:

  • The fitness industry is continuing to grow as it currently sits at 186 billion. Crossfit related products are approx a 4 Billion dollar industgry. 
  • My partner and I have run 2 successful businesses both in real estate flipping homes, and affiliate marketing.  

Risks & Challenges

  • The biggest challenge is the sheer size of the fitness apparel industry. There are lots of companies emerging on a daily basis. In addition our target audience Crossfit has a huge presence of competing apparel companies. 
  • Our goal will be to cut a presence in the industry and reach $500K in sales by Q4 2018. 
  • Our plan to overcome is going to be built from our gorilla marketing campaign. We will build trust one by one. Crossfit is huge but its a tight knit community. If we deliver a subpar product people will talk. Conversly WHEN we deliver a great product that is creative, comfortable, durable and affordable people will also speak and connect others to our brand. 

Other Ways You Can Help

  • We would love anyone who can't contribute to take a look at our site. www.bestfitapparel.com or our IG @best_fit_team or Facebook @Best Fit Apparel and give us honest and in-depth feedback. 
  • Please feel free to use the Indiegogo tools to share our social media pages and website.

story:
Short Summary

My name is Caryn Stewart. I have a 19-year-old daughter, a 22-year-old-son and before I owned Heelarious, I made a living in online sales and e-commerce. I combined my passion for being a mom and my business experience to create an online children’s boutique store. I could not keep Heelarious shoes in my inventory and absolutely loved the product. Through my vendor relationship with Britta, she offered for me to adopt her baby, Heelarious. I invested most of my savings, dove into my dream and bought Heelarious. As a new business owner, I was saddened when someone in the US infringed on the patent before I could even get off the ground. To my detriment, I invested the last bit of savings that I had trying to stop them. I won the long, drawn out case, but I lost everything. I've spent that last two years educating myself, learning from the right mentors and partnered with someone just as passionate about entrepreneurship, family values, and the community.

My campaign is important to me because it really is what I entitled it.  This campaign is a restitution of my dream. The infringing company has to shut its doors down this year and I rightfully own this patent, which has 9 years remaining on it. As the rightful owner, I can build the brand! This idea was stolen because it is great. I still believe in it. My former clients, friends, and family have all encouraged me to return to my passion. I love the product, babies, and the industry. Best of all we are almost across the finish line and are currently debt free. It's just the two of us doing everything including the website.

For lack of ownership and legal knowledge, I lost everything but I believe that we all deserve second chances. I want to help my family, I want my dream back that I worked so very hard for. This product makes people smile which I love. I also miss being able to financially assist great causes, which proceeds of our profit will go towards. My friend and business partner will be right there with me.

Through my mentorship, self-reflection, learning and partnership, my faith in humanity has long been restored. All of you wonderful investors would be helping me restore my livelihood as well as giving me the opportunity to regain my dream and work passionately towards providing quality products that make people smile.  

What We Need & What You Get

I need $50,000.00 to begin manufacturing small batches, package my product and run a marketing campaign.

$30,000.00 will go towards manufacturing 3 of the 5 styles of shoes, $15,000.00 will pay for packaging storage and shipping costs and $5,000.00 will go towards marketing.

What We Need & What You Get

$30,000.00 will go towards manufacturing, $15,000.00 will pay for packaging storage and shipping costs and $5,000.00 will go towards marketing.

Other than running our business with the highest standards and giving back to our community, I will never really be able to thank you for restoring Heelarious to its former glory as well as giving me back my dream. However, in an effort to do so the first thing that we will do is add a "Thank You" page to our website with each of your names and a thankful video from us as a long-standing thank you of how we got back on our feet and how you changed our lives. Next, once we become profitable, we will place 3% of our quarterly profits towards other Indiegogo campaigns, marking those contributions on the thank you page as a “pay it forward” tribute that your generosity has continued. Finally, we will also send a pair of one of the first Heelarious shoes to the 20 highest contributions to the campaign. There are other perks for investors as well. No contribution is too small!

If we do not reach our entire goal, Heelarious will either pursue an “In Demand” option to continue fund-raising with Indiegogo or begin manufacturing with only one style of the shoes or two style small batch orders.

The Impact

Our project is valuable because it makes a statement. Individuals that think it is ok to infringe on intellectual property and wipe out small businesses will learn that there is a community that cares and that people will not only stand for small businesses with merit but also stand against small business without. For a long time after my loss, I felt defeated for not knowing that the wiser thing to do was to have continued to produce the shoes and move forward. I ran a great and honest business and this is my opportunity to redeem myself and regain that dream that I let someone take from me. It will also put me in a position where I can be of help to others in the future. Not only is it a passion of mine to help others but my business partner is a passionate Human Rights activist and is always helping others in any way that he can. I’m a perfect example. This opportunity will only help him increase his efforts. Finally, I have to say that I have never seen someone not smile when they are introduced to the shoes. Heelarious shoes really are hilarious!

As contributors, long after you donate, whether you log into our site or not, you will know that you restored a livelihood, a sense of standard, created jobs and inspired many. Your donation today will be our donations tomorrow.

My name is Caryn Stewart and my partner’s name is Ray Caban. It may take us a few days but please feel free to contact us at any time for updates, advice on our process, a tour of our garage for now but office…when we can afford one or just to say hello. We will be posting updates and videos on our site. We plan to visit orphanages, hospitals and deserving homes eliciting smiles by personally donating Heelarious shoes. After all, new-born baby girls are also society’s daughters.

Risks & Challenges

Heelarious has an approved patent for another 9 years. We have come up with ways to improve on it at that time. As a result, we do not fear legal competition. In the meantime, we fear unethical individuals that think it’s ok to ruin small businesses. However, in the words of Donna Walsh, creator of a Jewelry Scroll product featured on HSN and QVC whom was so gracious to offer us advice, “People are going to copy you and you should not worry about it! You know what that really means, it means that you have a great idea!”

Now I know that because I own the patent and because the creator is on our side and will always advocate for Heelarious, we must not worry about people infringing. We must build the brand that is rightfully ours and recognized by past customers. We must provide a quality product for our future customers for years to come at a great price and only take steps within reason that do not jeopardize the company.

 No contribution is too small! Even if you can’t contribute financially, there is no better advertisement than through word of mouth. Please promote our campaign in your social networks. Indiegogo has many share tools that help facilitate the campaigning experience. Thank you!

story:
My Story

My name is Carley Rose Wolski and I have two passions on a collision course: fashion and the environment. So far through history the two haven’t been friends. I decided to take a stand against this, and for the last few years I’ve been working on my brand Carley Rose The Label, an ethically minded, sustainability driven brand that creates gorgeous, comfortable and wearable designs. At least, that’s my dream.

 

The ASTERIA Bag is Born!

The ASTERIA bags bring together my two passions. The ASTERIA bag LIGHTS UP and will have you become the centre of attention! Perhaps more importantly, they are also a more sustainable, ethical style option. Each bag is made from BRENTANO’s range of eco-fabrics faux-leathers on the outer, reclaimed textile lining, an ethically hand-beaded design on the front and incorporate brand new e-textile the LED Ribbon from 360Fashion Network, making these bags totally ONE OF A KIND.
 

The ASTERIA bag is:

  • Vegan friendly
  • Made from eco friendly and recycled materials
  • Ethically made
  • High quality
  • Fashion Tech- Literally light up the room!

  • Gorgeous and totally unique!
     

Features and Specs

  • Magnetic clasp

  • Removable wrist strap

  • Matching Tassel

  • Size: 26cm x 17cm x 1.5cm

  • Enough room to fit your phone, coin purse, keys, lipstick and more

  • Composition: 100% PU outer, 100% reclaimed textile lining (cotton/poly/rayon) 

  • Powered by 360Fashion Tech LED Ribbon, RoHS certified

  • 5 light cycles including constant, strobe, blink, fade and slow fade.

  • Interior light: Lights on the LED Ribbon continue to the inside of the bag. Now it's easy to find your cash quickly at the bar!

  • Batteries: 2x CR1220 coin batteries (not included)

    • Batteries last approx. 5 hrs for constant power, depending on quality. If you are in Australia These batteries can be purchased at Jaycar for about $3 each or in bulk on ebay for even less.
       

Not Just a Bag

My dream of launching an ethical, sustainable label is why this campaign is so important to me. To launch such a brand requires a fair bit of capital as you can imagine. By preordering an ASTERIA clutch bag you would not only be contributing to the campaign and receiving an awesome product, you will also become  an inaugural part of something truly amazing. Imagine being involved in the first steps of a massive, world-changing movement towards sustainable fashion… That could be you!

 

Why do we need funding?

The funds raised via profits from the ASTERIA bags and any other pledges will go back into the business to produce an ethical, sustainable clothing collection to launch at Mercedes Benz Fashion Week Australia in 2017. Starting a brand and launching it like this costs around $30,000. This is why I need YOU guys! It's hard to take a stand like this when it is so easy for most companies to take the easy road and contribute slave labor, child labor, and unsustainable resources and methods. With your pledge, you can help fix the future of fashion!

 

What Are the Risks?

This particular campaign will fulfil all preorders regardless of total funding fulfilment. We have the capacity to do so. The extra funding will of course go towards expanding the brand as mentioned. You will receive your gorgeous, ethically made ASTERIA clutch (and/or matching coin purse) and you will love it! You can have peace of mind knowing that you will receive the product you pay for. 

 

What Are The Challenges?

As these bags incorporate a brand new technology, the LED from 360Fashion Network, there is of course a testing faze for the product. Challenges included making sure the LED Ribbon remained functional after a lot of wear as well as figuring out the best way to attach it to the bags. We are still testing to make sure the bags are as durable as possible and we promise to supply a high-quality product in the end. 

Other challenges include sourcing factories that treat their employees ethically and sourcing sustainable fabrics and materials. We have been working hard on these in particular and are pleased to say we have made a lot of progress over the last few months including sourcing an eco-faux leather from Brentano. We will keep you updated as we progress!

 

The Perks!

We are offering 5 perk tiers including:

  • $25: Thank you mention.
    This is for those of you who just want to contribute and get a little bit of recognition. Your contribution is SO appreciated!
     
  • $50: Coin Purse
    Want to offer a little more? We think you should be rewarded. You will be sent a coin purse made from the same eco-fabrics as the ASTERIA bags, but this does incur a shipping fee. Don’t want the purse? Just enter the amount you want to contribute in the custom pledge box.
     
  • $220: One ASTERIA clutch bag
    This is our main perk. You will be preordering one of the amazing ASTERIA bags!! YAY! Choosing this perk while the campaign runs means you get $40 of the RRP of $260 which will go up once the campaign has ended.
     
  • $500: Design your own ASTERIA 
    OMG! Do you have a colour combination or beaded design you want to see on the ASTERIA clutches? Choose this perk if you want to see it come to life! We will personally work together to make your idea a reality, plus free shipping! Your design might even be taken to production!
     
  • $1000: Become a sponsor
    Promote your own business while supporting an up-and-coming one. Read perk for all inclusions. We appreciate your sponsorship! This would make a huge difference!

 

On top of this, feel free to type your own custom pledge after clicking 'back it'. All pledgers from the duration of the campaign will be thanked on either social media, our website or both. Here’s some thanks in advance: THANK YOU!! SO MUCH!!

 

How Else Can You Help?

You can help by simply sharing on social media. Whether or not you would like to buy a bag or make a pledge, a share can mean just as much and will be very much appreciated. Thanks so much!
 

Get ready to light up your style with the ASTERIA bag!

Check back for updates on newly released colour options!

story:
Who is Stray Cat Strut?

Stray Cat Strut is a partnership composed of three female Atlanta-based designers and makers—Alicia Kot, Emmie Thompson, and Drew Atkinson.

We came from all across the US and somehow (THANK YOU UNIVERSE) made it into each other’s lives.

Emmie and Alicia are costume and clothing makers and designers and Drew specializes in makeup application and special effects prosthetic fabrication. Together they can create the perfect look for your needs, no matter how big (we’re thinking Hagrid… or maybe a giant Cyclops??) or small (what about a 1920s flapper party look?).

Not only do we offer custom-designed looks for consumers, we are also a space for artist to connect, learn, and grow from each other. Through workshops and classes held in our studio, we welcome all creators and inspirers from all walks of life and all levels of their craft to come and join our family of “strays.” (Think about it like you are the cat who showed up on the crazy cat lady’s doorstep and are carried into this house filled with other, different, unique, and inspiring cats and you’re just like “How did I get so lucky?! I just showed up because I heard there was free food!”)

We have worked and lived in this community long enough to understand the need for this type of partnership to take place. Atlanta is a major production hub and has a vast, professional theatre scene. With that comes a need for hard workers who can not only get the job done, but also inspire others and each other in the process. (Honestly, we are doing this together because we can hold each other accountable and we love each other enough to want every member of our team to grow individually as well as in our super exciting partnership.)

Our job is making sure others are happy. In order to do that, we need to start off with the ability to make that happiness happen! As a contributor, you will provide the footing for us to get these projects up and running and we will do the rest. With a distinct effort to put everything we've got into all projects that are thrown our way, our mission is to design looks that inspire and connect creators to spread the power of curiosity!

 

What We Need & What You Get

Our dream goal is $30,000. This is enough funding to carrying us well into our first year of business.

We will use these contributions to design the welcoming work studio that we need to create our goods. We will use contributions on marketing materials, and all the small details that help create our brand, and we will use these contributions on tactile materials that we will use every day.

If these exciting plans aren’t enough, we have also included some unique perks for contributors!

$5 – Logo Sticker

$20 - Invite to Launch Party, Logo Sticker

$50 - Stray Cat Strut T-Shirt, Invite to Launch Party, Logo Sticker

$100 - Stray Cat Strut Mix Tape, T-Shirt, Launch Party, Logo Sticker

$250 - Free Class, Mix Tape, T-Shirt, Launch Party, Logo Sticker

$400 - Makeup Application, Free Class, Mix Tape, T-Shirt, Launch Party, Logo Sticker

$500 - Prosthetic Set, Makeup Application, Free Class, Mix Tape, T-Shirt, Launch Party, Logo Sticker

$1,000 - Style for Event (Halloween), Makeup Application, Prosthetic, Hair, Costume, Prosthetic Set, Makeup Application, Free Class, Mix Tape, T-Shirt, Launch Party, Logo Sticker

 

Other Ways You Can Help

Every contribution, no matter the amount is worth it to us. Want to do more than contribute money? Spread the word about Stray Cat Strut!

Make some noise about this campaign by sharing it on Facebook!

Like Stray Cat Strut on Facebook and watch our design journey unfold!

Follow us on Instagram and see what’s happening in the Stray Cat Strut studio!

 

And in general, give us your love and support. We accept this in all forms, but especially ice cream. We can’t wait to show you what you have helped us create!

story:
My why for wanting to start a clothing brand is that I see a strong need for a brand to serve the community not just to sell a quality product but also to provide a service that people would need as well. Back in the early mid-2000's, My mom couldn't afford designer clothing from the mall because she was a single mother and had to pay bills. I used to get picked on for not having those types of clothes. I have a vision of where my brand can be one of the top brands of the world but affordable to people who lack finance.

There is a need for service to come with a clothing line. There are many designer brands out there that multi-million dollars brands, however, they don't give back to people. We have a farmer mindset meaning we want to plant some crowns back into the community. Over time when a plant receives proper water, gardening and sunlight it will give you a strong end harvest from the care that it was given. We look to service the needs of others by having a future washing service/dry cleaning service, having a high-quality product, and having it at an affordable price.

Ripe Brand Clothing needs $2,160 to get funded for our first kingdom shirts. This order will take 30 days to mass produce overseas and orders will be fulfilled as soon as we receive the shipments. If you make a donation, you will get a shirt as well as a coupon code for a future purchase that never expires.  

The Seed of Royalty in our kingdom means to plant an investment crown into our production to where you sow a seed with us we give a double up to a quadruple harvest to what love you show us! The purpose of the seed is to capture an audience of people that see a need for a sense of community and wealth.  

Each supporter is going to have their picture taken and we are going to put them in our secret Google+ culture community to where people can share their testimonies about our product and communicate how special we made them feel. People may not remember what you have done for them, they will always remember how you made them feel. We are going to crown our kings that supports and serves the community around them. That is what a kingdom of wealth is.

Our biggest challenge is building a brand from scratch and selling apparel solely online. The problem is people aren't going to know if the product is quality if just sold online and not being able to try the clothing on. We also face possible production and shipping delays since our products are coming from overseas. Part of our solution is we are going to having fashion shows in the local area as well as statewide to get the name established through word of month. We going to go through DHL shipping for the fastest way for our supporters to get their product as well as return the product if it doesn't fit correctly or its the wrong size. The delivery speed will be 9/10. The only thing that you will pay is your shipping for your shirt.

Let's say that you're not able to donate any money. That is perfectly fine. We still will need your help. We need your help by spreading the word as well through social media. If someone donates money from your network we will give you a shirt as well to say thank you. Please like us on Tumblr, Instagram, Facebook, and our website is www.ripebrandclothing.com Please also use Indiegogo Share tools as well.

Bonus Facts: Red pineapples are the royal fruit of Brazil. They are found in South America, Central America, the Caribbean Islands. Trinidad, Guadalupe, and Grenada.  

Bonus Facts: Red pineapples are the royal fruit of Brazil. They are found in South America, Central America, the Caribbean Islands. Trinidad, Guadalupe, and Grenada.

story:
Reppit is an online rental service for sports jerseys, starting with football, that will span across the United States. We plan to perfect our logistics and process in our test run with football, and expand to baseball, hockey, basketball, and beyond.

The story of Reppit actually began at a Patriots-Jets game a few years ago that I attended with my father. My father is a long-time Jets fan, but is lucky to be able to make it to one game a season. He was sporting a Jets' Brett Favre jersey, which at the time of the game was more than a few of seasons out-of-date. When I asked him why he was wearing it, he told me that he had spent a lot of money on it, he had wanted to wear something relevant to the game, and he didn't want to buy a new jersey for fear of the same remorse he felt with the Favre jersey. No fan should end up with buyer's remorse, nor should they feel like they have to wear an outdated jersey to fit in with the crowd. Reppit will be the option that saves fans from these pitfalls and makes sure that everyone can "rep" their favorite players every time.

Through 2 comprehensive online consumer surveys, an historical attendance analysis, and a thorough analysis of our projected margins, there is definitely a market for Reppit to help sports fans everywhere feel like their part of the team. More than 17 million people attend professional football games in the United States each year, and our surveys have shown that our interested market can include 40% or more of those fans. To let that sink in again, that 6.8MM potential users per year is only accounting for fans attending professional football games. This Indiegogo can prove that jersey rental is the future for fans of all sports, and Reppit is excited to be that future.

The funding goal that we have set out to achieve with this Indiegogo is going to help us purchase a portion of our jersey inventory for our reward offers. The crux of our appeal is having a diverse range of jerseys to give our fans the choices that they want. With this initial kickoff, we will be able to start building out our inventory into a more comprehensive and well-rounded closet of choices for Reppit users. We will also be using the funding to ship the aforementioned jerseys to you and clean them once they return to ensure that our inventory can be rented to future fans as if they were brand new. Finally, this funding will be used to help promote the Reppit brand and product to help make sure that we will be able to continue bringing fans high-quality jersey rentals into 2018 and beyond!

story:
Last call for millionaires ...

OK, you've made it and secretly you know you are better than everyone else.

Now is your chance to show just how generous you are!

Heck, don't even bother buying anything - just donate. And donate BIG! What's the point in having all that cash if you can't show off every now and then?
 

Not a millionaire? No problem, you know where the Perks are. Go grab 'em!
 

Who We Are and How We Started

Ustyle Designs is a Los Angeles based business founded and run by Janet Young, a self-confessed fashionista and veteran of the interactive computer accessories market. Janet is an expert in manufacturing, logistics and customer deliverables.

The Unstrap was conceived during a recent trip to Paris where many travel photos were "spoiled" by purse and handbag straps that obscured the style and designs of the clothing I purchased. The added security of a harder-to-see and harder-to-cut strap is a deterrent to pick pockets and purse snatchers.

I have always been passionate about fashion and fashion ideas that solve everyday problems. I decided to found Ustyle Designs as a way to achieve that vision.

Having designed The Unstrap (and other products) and produced prototypes off my own back, your support is vital in helping me achieve the fulfillment, delivery and marketing objectives needed to drive The Unstrap into the broader marketplace.
 

How Your Support Helps Us

  • The $10k in funding we are seeking will be used to pay for finished, manufactured product, delivered out of California, USA.
     
  • ​Unfortunately, packaging and postage are not free and some of the funds will be used to cover these costs.
  • A small amount of the funds will be used to drive online and social media marketing directing customers to Indiegogo and, post-launch, to our website.
     
  • In the event the campaign is not fully funded, we will endeavor to supply every person who funded us so long as the campaign contributions hit at least 50% of our ask.

How Your Support Impacts Us

Your support and assistance in making this a successful campaign for us allows us to move forward with confidence in producing new and innovative product for you.

  • The Unstrap offers simple yet effective solution for a problem faced by anyone who has ever worn a purse or handbag.
  • Unlike many people starting out in business I have a 20-year track record of manufacturing experience, customer service experience, and an enviable reputation amongst my peers.
  • Simply put, your support allows me to follow my dream of pursuing ongoing solutions to fashion problems, and to work with products and people I love.

Risks & Challenges

While there are always risks and challenges in business, my experience and tenacity mitigates most, if not all the challenges faced by new business owners.

  • I work with reliable manufacturers and trustworthy distributors
  • Every product I make either meets or exceeds the safety requirements for that product
  • I genuinely care about my customers' experiences and enjoyment of my products

What is The Unstrap?

  • Constructed from High Grade PVC
  • Strong, durable, lightweight
  • Near-invisible finish doesn't obscure your clothing design or pattern
  • Improved safety and security when travelling
  • Fully RoHS (chemical) tested for your safety
  • Fully adjustable (Total length 26.00 inches to 51.5 inches) (Clip 1.0 inch length, 0.5 inch width)
  • Waterproof
  • Harder to cut or sever than leather or cloth
  • Stylish, smart and see-through
  • Works with any purse color or style
  • Can be used with purses, handbags, messenger bags and totes
  • All Unstraps are shipped from the USA
  • Never have an ugly purse strap obscure your beautiful outfit again

Can't Afford to Contribute but Still Want to Help?

  • Tell your Facebook friends about our campaign - SHARE the links!
  • Share our campaign and our story on your favorite Social Media platform.

Thank you in advance for your support - it is greatly appreciated!
 

Thank you, thank you, thank you!

As we move into the second week of our Indiegogo campaign we would like to thank everyone who has contributed so far and also thank those who intend to contribute but who haven't had the chance yet. 

Every one of your contributions, large and small, is important to us and we are so grateful for your support.

 
 

 

UNSTRAP - your CLEAR fashion choice

 UNSTRAP - your CLEAR fashion choice

story:
The Problem

 

We love reusable straws, but we also hate them - they’re a bother to clean and take around. For many people, bringing a reusable straw when going out or impulsively eating at a restaurant is easy to forget, and they end up using a plastic straw anyway. 

 

Our Solution: The BluStraw

 

 

Introducing the BluStraw: a revolutionary reusable straw held inside a stylish bracelet case. Take it wherever you go, never forget your reusable straw again, and make a statement about keeping our oceans plastic-free. 

 

The straw is placed inside the bracelet to prevent germs and bacteria from reaching the straw. Both the straw and the bracelet are made from FDA approved silicone, and our packaging is 100% recyclable! 

 

Our high quality silicone straws have an airtight hook mechanism that allows you to open the straw for easy cleaning - no pesky brushes needed! 

 

Why BluStraw? 

Our team at BluStraw consists of avid environmentalists, passionate entrepreneurs, and experienced product designers committed to making reusable straws part of our everyday lives. We’ve spent months testing the market and developing the product, and we’re confident that we can hit the ground running when we hit the market.

 

Not only that, we’re dedicated to helping the environment. Part of our proceeds will be donated towards nonprofits and charities that contribute to plastic cleanup efforts around the world. 

 

We need your help! 

We’ve got everything lined up for a successful product launch, and we just need your help to finalize our product and start manufacturing as soon as possible. Our first shipment will go out to our pre order customers, who will get a 25% discount as well as receive an exclusive product edition before anyone else. The funds raised will help expedite the manufacturing process - we’re projecting to be able send out shipments by the end of the year. Together, we can take plastic out of our oceans. 

 

Follow our instagram @theblustraw for future updates and content.

story:
N-Zen: Pants That You Won’t Want To Take Off!

In today’s busy world, we are all looking for a bit of peace, comfort and relaxation. If we are to enjoy our free time and relax our body and mind, we need clothes that will feel comfortable and give us a feeling of lightness, while at the same time we will look chic and feel confident.

Born in India, inspired by the yoga tradition!

In creating them we were inspired by our stay in India and the local yoga tradition. Unlike western fashion culture, saturated with synthetic materials, people there attach much greater importance to the quality of the materials they wear and it goes without saying that they use the best natural materials, which are synonymous with health and well-being.

The style of our pants is inspired by the traditional yoga clothing there, which provides maximum comfort and flexibility, not only when exercising.

We have combined all this with luxury craftsmanship and a modern design, and have added variable features and created pants that you won’t want to take off.

4 Different Ways They Can Be Worn

Thanks to the removable strap and turn-up waist belt you can be creative and wear your N-Zen pants in four different ways! It’s up to you and your imagination! A different style every day.

Our Cotton Will Pamper Your Skin

We have carefully selected the materials for our products all over the world to bring you the best of Indian and Egyptian cotton.

All our products are made from luxurious 100% cotton, which is breathable, hypoallergenic, durable, optimally regulates moisture, minimises body odour and prevents bacteria from growing.

Everyone Looks Great With N-zen

N-Zen pants are designed to perfectly fit any body type and cover any shortcomings. N-Zen gives you a feeling of confidence and self-esteem! Everyone looks great in them!

Comfortable Luxury for All Active People and Lovers of Yoga and Relaxation

N-ZEN have many uses thanks to their comfortable cut, simple design and the material used. You can wear them for yoga, sport, dance, outdoor activities, travel, you can go out in them with friends or just relax in front of the television in them.

N-ZEN is Fair

Our products are sewn in India by craftsmen in a family-type business. All the employees have an above-standard working environment and fair wages. It’s a joy to work for N-Zen in India!

Target

Our target is to raise at least 10 000 USD to produce the first batch of NZEN pants. The money will go specifically to purchase material, ensure production and specialist work and cover marketing costs.

Share and Get a Gift!

Click The Share Button at The Top of The Page!

Then write us a message about it and as a gift with your pants, we will give you an original, handmade bracelet from India.
story_txt:
N-Zen: Pants That You Won’t Want To Take Off!
In today’s busy world, we are all looking for a bit of peace, comfort and relaxation. If we are to enjoy our free time and relax our body and mind, we need clothes that will feel comfortable and give us a feeling of lightness, while at the same time we will look chic and feel confident.
Born in India, inspired by the yoga tradition!
In creating them we were inspired by our stay in India and the local yoga tradition. Unlike western fashion culture, saturated with synthetic materials, people there attach much greater importance to the quality of the materials they wear and it goes without saying that they use the best natural materials, which are synonymous with health and well-being.
The style of our pants is inspired by the traditional yoga clothing there, which provides maximum comfort and flexibility, not only when exercising.
We have combined all this with luxury craftsmanship and a modern design, and have added variable features and created pants that you won’t want to take off.
4 Different Ways They Can Be Worn
Thanks to the removable strap and turn-up waist belt you can be creative and wear your N-Zen pants in four different ways! It’s up to you and your imagination! A different style every day.

Our Cotton Will Pamper Your Skin
We have carefully selected the materials for our products all over the world to bring you the best of Indian and Egyptian cotton.
All our products are made from luxurious 100% cotton, which is breathable, hypoallergenic, durable, optimally regulates moisture, minimises body odour and prevents bacteria from growing.


Everyone Looks Great With N-zen
N-Zen pants are designed to perfectly fit any body type and cover any shortcomings. N-Zen gives you a feeling of confidence and self-esteem! Everyone looks great in them!

Comfortable Luxury for All Active People and Lovers of Yoga and Relaxation
N-ZEN have many uses thanks to their comfortable cut, simple design and the material used. You can wear them for yoga, sport, dance, outdoor activities, travel, you can go out in them with friends or just relax in front of the television in them.

N-ZEN is Fair
Our products are sewn in India by craftsmen in a family-type business. All the employees have an above-standard working environment and fair wages. It’s a joy to work for N-Zen in India!

The money will go specifically to purchase material, ensure production and specialist work and cover marketing costs.Share and Get a Gift!Click The Share Button at The Top of The Page!Then write us a message about it and as a gift with your pants, we will give you an original, handmade bracelet from India.

story:
"These shoes are art, 

and everyone needs to own a lot of them."

Joan Schweighardt, Shoe Retailing Today

 

How this works: Commit to purchase your sneakers now and you will receive an order form for size/style shortly after the campaign ends.  We will then go into production and your custom made shoes will be delivered to your door late October. Available in most sizes (scroll down to see the chart).  We PROMISE you will receive your sneakers (if for some freakish reason you don't, you will receive a full refund)...and we will send updates at the timeline unfolds including a tracking number when they are shipped.

The ultimate goal was to make a beautiful, unique, comfortable and most importantly, cruelty free sneaker, without using any animal products. Most shoes are fixed with glues containing animal ingredients like gelatin and are made by boiling connective tissue and bone.  These shoes are 100% vegan and come in high tops, low tops and slip ons that kick ass anywhere, anytime. 

Each sneaker is carefully curated from the extensive collection of fine art Kelli Bickman has created over the last decade.  More on Bickman's work here: www.kellibickman.net

Choose from 10 designs:

 

 

                                             
BONUS: TWO FREE PAIR OF COLORED LACES INCLUDED WITH YOUR PURCHASE!  We will personally color match two select pair of laces to spice up your high top and low top shoes, for FREE!

Indiegogo bonus: FREE DESIGNER KEEPSAKE BOX!  

The illustration extends around the entire package...all four sides, top and bottom.  Save it for your swag.

Keeping it real: Bickman has designed each shoe to be a personal work of art, from the individual image to the II:II logo to the hand drawn box.  This is a true labor of love coming straight from the heART. The promo video was created this summer as she road-tripped from New York to Los Angeles and back again, all the while asking friends and family to model the shoes, using a portable video camera and i Movie to put it all together.  There is no big fancy advertising machine here...just an artist, an idea, a paint brush/canvas, a computer, a camera and a dream....and a partner factory to make the product real.  A vision manifested from her studio to your feet.  

Timeline: You will receive an order form shortly after the campaign ends to determine your design and size choices, production will begin upon receipt and your new favorite sneakers will be shipped to you late October!

Why II:II - What does it mean? 

11:11 is a sequence of numbers that, according to numerologists, indicate one’s desires are poised to come true.  The numbers also mean that maintaining a positive mindset helps to realize all dreams.  When you see these numbers it is also an indication that you are in the right place at the right time and to pay attention to your thoughts...they are on their way to manifesting!

 

In launching 11:11 Style, community support is vital and we will not tire of thanking you. Involving the Indiegogo community in the launch is essential to the quality growth of our business, as it allows us to design and develop the product we want without outside investors. THANK YOU!

RISKS AND CHALLENGES:   We promise to forge ahead confident that solid partnerships have been established regarding manufacturing, shipping and distribution.  Our partner factory assures us they have unlimited capacity for order fulfillment.  We will work with Indiegogo's partners for shipping and distribution as we march, dance, run, skip, hop and jump onward (in fabulous new shoes)!

YOUR PURCHASE MAKES A DIFFERENCE: A % of the proceeds from this campaign will support a grassroots community engaged Mural Arts Program founded and directed by Bickman. She has worked with thousands of youth and dozens of artists to create large scale public art installations in NY and beyond.  This after-school art program inspires our youth, engages our public spaces and changes lives for the better.  More on the program at www.kellibickman.net/muralarts

OTHER WAYS YOU CAN HELP:  SHARE THIS CAMPAIGN with anyone you think might be interested in super rad kicks.  Your time and attention are truly appreciated.

THE ART, THE ARTIST AND THE SHOEZ!  "Dragonfly" original work on canvas and artist Kelli Bickman wearing "Dragonfly" low top in black.  photo by Deborah DeGraffenreid

'Inferno' "63" x 84" acrylic and oil crayon on canvas. Painting available for purchase. 

Kelli Bickman, artist (not for sale) wearing 'Inferno' hightop in black

In the studio making the 'Mandala' painting.  Photo by Stacey Estrella

Also available as a perk is the original work on canvas that inspired the "Sunflower" sneaker. 5' x 5' acrylic, oil crayon and glitter on canvas...watch the making of video from Bickman's Art Diary here: https://www.facebook.com/kelli.bickman/videos/vb.706051508/10157539607151509/?type=2&video_source=user_video_tab

story:
Millennia is an up and coming Luxury British watch brand dedicated in catering high value Swiss movements, geared towards the millennial market.

Despite the market being flooded with other minimalist brands, our brand competes on the value of the watch we bring to the market as opposed to price.

A lot of the well-established  brands are able to offer a quality timepiece but the brand fails to speak to the millennial generation. On the other hand, there are certain brands that are popular with millennial audiences but use poor quality components in the production process and are unable to provide a durable watch.

We always admired the heritage watch brands of Switzerland, neither of us owned a very expensive watch like a Rolex, but we liked the idea of creating our own brand that could provide durable and desirable Swiss-Made watches. Nonetheless geared to an audience similar to ourselves, in particular young professionals and entrepreneurs. 

 

The idea of creating a watch brand came during our school days, when we were studying for our A-Levels. This is the crossroads in life where a lot of young people ask themselves what am I going to do now?

Having participated in the 'Young Enterprise Project' during our last two years of Sixth Form; this enabled us to create and manufacture our first product called the Pocket Pal.

After 15 hour days hustling in local markets ... It was a success!

We were able to raise enough money to officially create Millennia. Following on from our previous successes, we started cold approaching our target audience on the streets of London, eventually building an email marketing list of over a thousand people.

Despite having an official logo and a strong list of potential customers, we still needed a little more to have Millennia's first ever production run.

As a result, we looked towards Virgin Start-Up for help. After a long and strenuous period our loan application was finally approved. This enabled us to take that next step into bringing Millennia to life.  From the loan, we were able to purchase our first batch of Millennia watches and put together social media content to the best of our ability.

 

 

Millennia London offers watches that are not only contemporary in their designs, but is also produced with the highest quality of materials. 

If you don't want to wear your most expensive watch everyday, Millennia watches are a great inexpensive alternative where the quality is not compromised as a result.

Whether you are going about your regular day-to-day, attending a meeting of any sort or even special occasions like a formal dinner party; Millennia watches not only presents high class through its design simplicity but also great desirability due to the values associated with the brand.

We need your support to enable us to make this a reality, and with your help you can be a part of the vision.  We simply cannot sustain the growth of the business from just our own pockets. That's why we have turned to the public to assist us in bringing the next best watch brand to the market. 

 

 

 

 

 

 

Bronze Bundle - £25

- Your Name on the Bronze Page of our community 'Wall Of Fame' on the Millennia Website.

 

Silver Bundle - £50

- Your Name on the Silver Page of our community 'Wall Of Fame' on the Millennia Website.

- An A3-Sized Thank You Letter complete with signatures

 

Gold Bundle - £100

- Your Name on the Gold Page of our community 'Wall Of Fame' on the Millennia Website.

- An A3-Sized Thank You Letter complete with signatures

- £25 Millennia Gift Card

 

Platinum Bundle: Leather - £179 (250 Available)

- Your Name on the Platinum Page of our community 'Wall Of Fame' on the Millennia Website

- An A3-Sized Thank You Letter complete with signatures

- Pre-Order a Leather Millennia Watch of your choice with limited edition IGOGO reference code

- IGOGO Authenticity Certificate

- £50 Millennia Gift Card

 

Platinum Bundle: Metal - £199 (250 Available)

- Your Name on the Platinum Page of our community 'Wall Of Fame' on the Millennia Website

- An A3-Sized Thank You Letter complete with signatures

- Pre-Order a Metal Millennia Watch of your choice with limited edition IGOGO reference code

- IGOGO Authenticity Certificate 

-£50 Millennia Gift Card

 

VIP - £250 (100 Available)

- Your Name on the VIP Page of our community 'Wall Of Fame' on the Millennia Website.

- An A3-Sized Thank You Letter complete with signatures

- Pre-Order a Millennia Watch of your choice with limited edition IGOGO reference code.

- IGOGO Authenticity Certificate 

-£75 Millennia Gift Card

- Exclusive watch engraving 'VIP 1-100' with VIP Authenticity Certificate

 

CEO - £500 (50 Available)

- Your Name on the CEO Page of our community 'Wall Of Fame' on the Millennia Website.

- An A3-Sized Thank You Letter complete with signatures

- Pre-Order a Millennia Watch of your choice with limited edition IGOGO reference code.

- IGOGO Authenticity Certificate 

-£100 Millennia Gift Card

- Exclusive watch engraving 'CEO 1-50' with CEO Authenticity Certificate

- Personal Engraving of up to 10 characters 

 

~ Silver Dial Metal 39mm & Blue Dial Leather 39mm are NOT available options ~

~ Black Dial Metal 28mm & Black Dial Leather 28mm  are NOT available options ~

 

 

Throughout the course of the campaign, Millennia is running a referral contest and offering rewards to those who are able to successfully share our campaign.

Join our referral program to win Free  Amazon Gift Cards based on how much contributions you bring to this campaign via your personal link.

 

Click the link - How to share a campaign

 

We will be gifting a 50% referral fee/commission rate based on how much funds you are able to bring to this campaign using your unique URL.

 

Click the link - How to Participate in a referral contest

 

You are able to monitor all referrals and contributions through the 'My Profile' tab. At the end of the campaign we will tally the amount contributed through your account and send you a Amazon Gift Card worth half of that value!

 

~ Please note that contributions are not associated with perks ~

 

 

 

 

 

Leather strap watches: £179

 

 

 

 


 

Metal strap watches: £199

 

 

 

    

 

                                             

 

~We have set further financial aims for stretch goals~

These are not set in stone but achieving each financial threshold will enable us to to drastically advance the current product portfolio we have available

 

£12,500 -  Kick-start Millennia and have our Official Launch. This will enable us to fulfill Pre-Orders and continue to grow.

 

£50,000 - Introduce new minimalist designs similar to our current collection and continue to invest in new software in order to significantly improve the designing process.

 

£75,000 -  Establish more intricate designs with additional features such as Chronograph, Diver and Moonphase collections.

 

£100,000 - Expand the Millennia team to increase the amount of content and level of customer service. Hiring staff and maintaining quality throughout all aspects of the company. This includes the best camera equipment for our photography and video content and working qualified specialists.

 

£150,000 -  Develop limited edition collector sets geared towards watch connoisseurs and enthusiasts.

 

£200,000  - Unveil a new line of watches far superior to previous collections. These  include:

  • Mechanical 
  • Automatic 
  • Smart watch designs 
 

£250,000 - Prepare for our leather goods launch with high-quality belts and bags.

 

 

 
 
 
 

Due to the large volume of watches that will be ordered and produced, there is always potential for errors and delays to occur in the process. 

Even though we have great trust in our suppliers in delivering on time, there is always that risk of goods not being delivered in line with the schedule seen above.

However, we are going to working tirelessly through out and work closely with our manufacturer, to ensure we can fulfill the perks as soon as possible. 

Stay up to date with the process, even once the campaign has ended, by looking at the updates tab and by also checking out our social media.

 

 

Remember even if you cannot contribute, you can still support Millennia to reach its goals by participating in the referral contest!

Be sure to share this campaign with your friends and family and earn yourself free Amazon Gift Cards.

 

THANK YOU
