story:
Hi, we are Wramer. We have designed a 100% seamless wallet with eco-friendly fabric.

Introducing the WRAMER Wallet

The 100% welded construction creates a minimalist, modern and refined aesthetic. The Cordura TPU coated fabric is incredibly strong, durable, water resistant and resist resist stretching over time. 

Innovative wallets are always built in a classic way, Wramer Bifold is a classic wallet built in an innovative way.

TheWramer can hold 10 cards and banknotes of any currency.

Nothing is more elegant than black, that's why we chose a monochrome design.

Our Cordura TPU coated fabric is pleasant in hands. Rounded edges minimize friction when carrying it in your pocket.

Ultra-fast slot

Ultra-fast access for the cards you use the most.

 

Cash strap

An easy and secure area dedicated to banknotes.

 

Cards compartments

Two compartments to store all your other cards and tickets.

The world of fashion (backpacks, shoes, jackets) is in perpetual evolution, but the wallet sector is still stagnating. That's why we decided to change it with an 100% seamless assembly.

Its Cordura TPU coated fabric is strong, durable and completely waterproof. And its assembly by welding makes it possible to forget the sewing problems that do not last over time.

With the Wramer, we wanted to create you the most compact wallet, the most resistant, keeping a sleek and minimalist design !

OEKO-TEX Standard 100 Classe II. The environment is one of our priorities. Creating a functional and design wallet was not enough for us, it was important for us to combine all these qualities with respect for the environment. Our WRAMER Bifold is mainly made of an OEKO-TEX Class II labelled fabric, which means that its design is environmentally friendly and safe for your health.

 

1. Water resistant

Resistant to all climates, the Wramer will accompany you everywhere! Thanks to its cordura 500D weaving structure, the Wramer is Waterproof, sweatproof and machine washable. 

 

2. Abrasion & stretch resistant over time

With abrasion resistance 3 times greater than that of conventional nylon and 20 times greater than that of cotton, The cordura fabric is one of the most robust fabrics.

 

3. No fraying of Edge

We have made it a point of honor to make a wallet that does not unravel over time. Thanks to a laser cut of each piece at 750C °, a layer of TPU is applied to the tench for a clean and resistant finish. 

 

Thank you for your support and everyone who has helped us along the way !

And share with your friends, family, on instagram, facebook and anywhere else :)

Follow us on Instagram :
story_txt: Hi, we are Wramer. We have designed a 100% seamless wallet with eco-friendly fabric.Introducing the WRAMER WalletThe 100% welded construction creates a minimalist, modern and refined aesthetic. The Cordura TPU coated fabric is incredibly strong, durable, water resistant and resist resist stretching over time. Innovative wallets are always built in a classic way, Wramer Bifold is a classic wallet built in an innovative way.TheWramer can hold 10 cards and banknotes of any currency.Nothing is more elegant than black, that's why we chose a monochrome design.Our Cordura TPU coated fabric is pleasant in hands. Rounded edges minimize friction when carrying it in your pocket.Ultra-fast slotUltra-fast access for the cards you use the most. Cash strapAn easy and secure area dedicated to banknotes. Cards compartmentsTwo compartments to store all your other cards and tickets.The world of fashion (backpacks, shoes, jackets) is in perpetual evolution, but the wallet sector is still stagnating. That's why we decided to change it with an 100% seamless assembly.Its Cordura TPU coated fabric is strong, durable and completely waterproof. And its assembly by welding makes it possible to forget the sewing problems that do not last over time.With the Wramer, we wanted to create you the most compact wallet, the most resistant, keeping a sleek and minimalist design !OEKO-TEX Standard 100 Classe II. The environment is one of our priorities. Creating a functional and design wallet was not enough for us, it was important for us to combine all these qualities with respect for the environment. Our WRAMER Bifold is mainly made of an OEKO-TEX Class II labelled fabric, which means that its design is environmentally friendly and safe for your health. 1. Water resistantResistant to all climates, the Wramer will accompany you everywhere! Thanks to its cordura 500D weaving structure, the Wramer is Waterproof, sweatproof and machine washable.  2. Abrasion & stretch resistant over timeWith abrasion resistance 3 times greater than that of conventional nylon and 20 times greater than that of cotton, The cordura fabric is one of the most robust fabrics. 3. No fraying of EdgeWe have made it a point of honor to make a wallet that does not unravel over time. Thanks to a laser cut of each piece at 750C °, a layer of TPU is applied to the tench for a clean and resistant finish.  Thank you for your support and everyone who has helped us along the way !And share with your friends, family, on instagram, facebook and anywhere else :)Follow us on Instagram :

story:
Full radio welded seams (RFW) guarantee maximum waterproof. Durable water resistant (DWR) customized lamination provides the best protection for your delicate electronics. We raised the bar with inner welding finishing to leave a smooth surface in all corners, fabric threads-free.

 

 

 

 

From pack mode to briefcase, ready for your formal meetings or hanging out with friends! Finally there are 6 carry ways to hold your laptop case......Wherever you are heading Unico will adapt so you don't have to.  

 

 

 

 

With all the accessories combinations Unico enlarges from 10L to 21L, with over ten configurations. It is the daily solution to every needs: compact look with organised capacity. YKK weather resistant zip and  Reach standard.

 

 

 

We’re back. Since the launch of RIVIERA on Indiegogo in 2018, successfully shipped in 54 countries. We've worked continuously in order to create new products according to the suggestions and feedback of our community of backers. So we've designed a brand new line of extreme waterproof digital-bags: 

UNICO II The waterproof digital bags with endless configurations

Finally there are more options to carry your important electronics: designed for your everyday life tested in extreme conditions. 

 

We need YOUR help to make this project as SOLID reality! Become a contributor, pick your perk, pre-order one of our bags NOW. You will get an unrepeatable and exclusive discount. 

Pick your perk, just share it with your friends, family or community! Help Us to reach raw material minimum quantity. We can't wait to hear your voice and ship UNICO around the world together!

 

 

 

 

 

 

Shoulder straps are ergonomically designed and padded with neoprene for water resistance and extra comfort. Top loops offer a holding gear for glasses, light or The Pouch and The Underworld Sling in front pocket position (up to 4 pouches or 1 Sling). Detachable bottom Straps are easy hidden on the case back compartment. 

 

 

 

The detachable premium elastic net is designed for holding extra clothing layers, helmet, water pouch and more. Nylon front grab handles and top reflective fix loops keep your professional tools (or bicycle extra lights) in order with external modular organisation. Bottom straps keep your project, yoga mat at your fingertips.

 

 
 

 

 

To be the best travel companion ever, Unico is designed to fit any Backpack, Carry-on or check-in luggage, giving extra protection against elements to the "indoors" of your gear! Your delicate electronics will be safe anywhere and in any condition.

 

 

 

 

The high-tech integrated material is made of 4 different layers which transforms this digital bag 100% resistant to temporary full immersion, stain proof, shock absorbing, UV protected, cold proof, fire retardant, scratch resistant, anti bacterial....

 

 

 

STAIN PROOF TEST: 

 

 

EXTRA FABRIC FEATURES: 

  • EXTRA LAMINATED BALLISTIC TARPAULIN
  • LASER CUT FABRIC PATTERN.
  •  REINFORCED BACK ISOLATION PANEL.  
  • SHOCK ABSORBING EVA PADDING.
  •  INNER WATER RESISTANT LINING. 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

The Unico notebook sleeve is designed to secure your electronic devices with high portable solutions and versatility. Like no other laptop case in the market! 

 

 

 

UNICO FEATURES LIST: 

  •  IMMERSION PROOF: Fully welded seams (RFW) ensure extreme waterproof standard, keeping the main compartment Watertight with Roll top closing. 
  •  SHOCK ABSORBING: Inner high density EVA padding make the pack resistant to hits and bumps. 
  •  BACK ISOLATION PANEL: made for heating isolation and protection on the move.
  •  RFW SEAMS: All seams are inner radio frequency welded for water resistance and to avoid any fabric threads to loosen during (years).  Durable water repellent (DWR) fabric finishing. 
  •  EASY TO PACK: Size is tailored to fit any backpack, carry-on or check-in luggage, offering extra protection to your existing gear. 
  •  SLIM DESIGN: the thinnest bag is designed to make your way in crowded  places and move as fast as possible in any urban jungle (have you ever tried to keep your pack on your metro ride to work?)
  •  PORTABLE: TOTE /BACKPACK/MESSENGER/BRIEFCASE up to 6 holding positions. 
  •  MODULAR: FLAT or COMBINED MODE integrates with 3 accessories up to your daily needs.
  •  WORK ORGANIZED: Easy access pocket, inner organizer, front handles, elastic. 
  •  MINIMAL TECH: HFW with DWR finish for shell fabric plus 3 other layers. 
  •  PREMIUM ELASTIC HOLDER for extra external capacity (helmet, jacket, water bottle ....)
  •  LARGE BACK NEOPRENE POCKET A4 documents/books/magazines and The Organizer. 
  •  EXPANDABLE ROLL TOP: designed for 13' or 15' Mac standards.
  •  REFLECTIVE FIX LOOPS: for high visibility during the night .
  •  DETACHABLE SHOULDER STRAPS ergonomically designed and padded with  neoprene for extra comfort. Top loops offers an holding gear for glasses, light or The Pouch and The Underworld Sling in front pocket position. 
  •  BOTTOM STRAPS offering extra capacity for your daily gears.

 

 

 

An Ultra Compact and Fully Waterproof sling bag for your daily adventures with a quick access to your valuable goods. 

 

 

 

4 DIFFERENT BAGS IN 1: The sling can be easily folded to become a waterproof pouch, an handbag or a "pochette". As any other product in this collection the roll top ensure  extreme waterproof standards. Either if you use it alone or combined with Unico bag. The Sling  modularity and versatility makes the best choice for a new daily companion. 

 

THE UNDERWORLD SLING BAG FEATURES :

  •  EXTRA VERSATILE You can wear it alone or combined with the Unico Case.
  •  IMMERSION PROOF: Fully radio inner welded seams (RFW) and innovative roll top closing ensure extreme waterproof standard, keeping the main compartment watertight.
  •  SEAMS: seam are fully inner radio frequency welded to fit the most extreme weather conditions and avoid any fabric threads or external fabric wrinkles.
  •  FOUR BAGS IN ONE: fold and close your in the way you like. 4 different bags!  
  •  ROLL TOP: it expands from 3.5L to 7L in just seconds.
  •  TOP CLOSING: two easy hidden buckle can refold giving multiple closing options
  •  BACK 3M PATENT EXTRA STRONG VELCRO CLOSING: loading up to 15kg weight
  •  NYLON DETACHABLE SHOULDER STRAP: with both sides hook with metal closing
  •  EXTRA D-RING for everything you need at your fingertips.
  •  LIGHT WEIGHT with maximum functionality.
  •  COMBINED WITH UNICO The Sling turn into in to a back pocket (folded, fully extended or submersion mode) attached to the front shoulder straps, through special clips, the Sling turns in a Marine easy access chest pocket (compatible with most packs straps).

 

 

 

 

 

With Unico Organizer, keeping your work in order has never been so simple.

 

 

As our Digital bag and the Sling bag, the Organizer is intelligently designed to adapt to your daily needs so you can use it alone or combined with UNICO bag for extra organized working space.

 

 

 

THE ORGANIZER FEATURES LIST: 

  •  ULTRA COMPACT SIZE: slim enough to fit any pocket yet large enough to put your things in order.
  •  WATER RESISTANT: Seams are fully radio frequency welded (RFW) and fabric DWR. 
  •  DEDICATED TABLET or E- READER POCKET: 21cm width and up to 33cm length can fit up to smallest notebook and different tablet sizes. 
  •  4  THOUGHTFUL POCKETS 
  • 8 PENS AND MARKERS HOLDERS
  •  4 ELASTIC HOLDERS for cables, extra pens and memory cards.
  •  A4 DOCUMENT HOLDER: Creative and organized everywhere. 
  •  LARGE NEOPRENE POCKET for extra lifting capacity such as power bank or smartphone.
  •  SMALL NEOPRENE POCKET for business cards or credit cards.

 

 

 

 

THE POUCH FEATURES: 

  •  EXTRA VERSATILE You can wear it alone or combined with the Unico Case.
  •  IMMERSION PROOF: Fully radio frequency welded seams (RFW), ensure extreme water resistant standard. Fabric is inner welded to avoid any threads.
  •  VERSATILITY: The pouch it can be wear by itself, in your bag or hand to the waist. Or customised with Unico handles and straps (up to 2 in front and 2 on the back). 
  •  ROLL SIDE CLOSING: Side roll closing make this easy access pocket perfect for grab on the go mobile, keys or any staff you want at your fingertips. 
  •  INNER ORGANIZER: designed for mobile, credit card, octopus card and more. 
  •  COMPACT SIZE LARGE CAPACITY: it can extend from 1L to 1.8L, holding all your chargers, cables, and more. 

 

 UNICO FULL SET ON CONCRETE URBAN JUNGLE:  

 

THANK YOU FOR YOUR SUPPORT ONCE AGAIN!

We can't say it enough! Without your support on our first campaign, nothing of this would be possible. Thank you for believing in us once again.

We can't wait to get UNICO Digital Bags in your hands!  

 

 

SHIPPING STATUS UPDATE

We fulfilled our early adaptors and we are ready to ship new rewards worldwide. Please do not hesitate to jump on board with us and supporting our Indiegogo campaign. We are thrilled by so many contributions and such amazing feedbacks. Thank you very much! 

Your help was, is and will be extremely important! We still need your support to launch new waterproof dreams into reality and enlarge our under numbered team.   

Despite this critical time, our logistics channels are working full force with our ready to ship Unico digital bags.  For any further information about shipping do not hesitate to check our FAQ's or contact us  => mowvivian@126.com or mowstarup@gmail.com 

 

 

VIDEO, PHOTOGRAPHY AND PAGE DESIGN: 

Video and photography: Never Milesi  Page design: Greta Mininni

 SPECIAL THANKS: 

Samu, Clivia, Micheal Broch, Eugi, Kiril&Martina, Baffo, Ilaria&Aida, Pino, Never (we are missing you), Serena, Federico, all MOW's family, the Roots: Francesca & Paka, Je, Carlotta, Micheal, Giubbe, Nina, Calice bar for hosting us during their pick time and of course the most important part, You, that make every adventure possible!

 

LINKS: WEBSITE  FACEBOOK  INSTAGRAM  YOUTUBE

story:
WHY ‘TOUCHWOOD’ FOR LIFE?

To "touchwood” is to avoid bad luck, bring good luck.

There must have been a time in your life when someone, or yourself, for that matter, has uttered the words ‘touchwood’ but there has never been any wood around for you to touch. The history and tradition of ‘touch/knock on wood’ is long debated, however, it seems to be a familiar phrase across many cultures.

In Pagan belief, trees were thought to be home of bad spirits and people would knock on wood to request good luck or distract the spirits from evil intentions. As time has elapsed people have developed their own version of the belief, which is well known today as touching wood for luck. 

WHO WE ARE

The touchwood team comprises of three aspiring young men, Galvin Mendez, Varpreet Batra and Deshveer Singh who saw an opportunity to bring this sense of ‘luck’ to people in a unique and stylish way. We grew up together and noticed people with increasingly complex lives and an obsession with wealth, yet people instinctively continued to rely on a sense of luck and hope for a better future.

With hopes of empowering people and spreading positivity, we introduce a product line that incorporates the need for functionality and also the yearn for luck. Touchwood For Life is more than just wooden products, we believe it is and want it to be a lifestyle brand. We hope Touchwood creates a sense of luck that everyone wants in their life and we intend to convey with it a sense of class, originality and style. 

To ensure that luck reaches everyone, the Touchwood product line includes men and women’s accessories suitable for any occasion. It can be worn to a picnic or may even help strike up a conversation at a black tie event, so please don’t miss out on the opportunity to stand out and be different, make sure you get your Touchwood products before the campaign ends.

Touchwood's Products

WATCHES

Touchwood for Life has released a premium, eco luxury line of wooden watches. These watches are considered a cult classic. The smooth suede wristband gives an urban feel to the very classy watch, which adds to their timeless appeal. The watches are adjustable for any wrist, 100% recyclable and toxic free.

Watches are made with 

  • Japanese Mayota Movement
  • Mineral glass with black plated seal
  • Black metal crown
  • Metal inlay linings and logo
  • Smooth Suede straps
  • Metal Buckles

Men Choose from 

  • Bamboo (Black strap)
  • Maple (Mustard Strap)
  • and Black Sandalwood (Brown Strap)

WOMEN's WATCHES

Women Choose from 

  • Bamboo (Pink strap)
  • Maple (Orange Strap)
  • and Black Sandalwood (Brown Strap)

Touchwood's classy and exclusive sunglasses range 

EBONY ELEGANCE

Touchwood for life's exclusive and premium Unisex wooden sunglasses. All sunglasses are made from various natural woods. We have kept every person around the world in mind when creating these sunglasses, from your corporate,businessman and everyday person to your skateboarder and surfer living life on the edge. Choose your own style to best suit your appearance and personality! (UNISEX)

THE TRAVELER

The Traveler are smart-looking sunglasses that have a dominant blue color with an unexpected touch of red adding a fun urban appeal. The Traveler are sunglasses to dream about! (MENS)

MADOC BLUEY

The Madoc Bluey is a super fun and ideal for the beach and gym. The bold blue is guaranteed to catch others’ eyes and is fantastic in finishing off an outfit. (UNISEX)

  • Frame: Blue acetate
  • Temples: Bamboo wood
  • Lens: Brown

MADOC WALNUT

The Madoc Dark Walnut exudes classic styling of a modern and dapper-looking man. It has a traditional, minimalistic design to it that makes it a timeless piece. (UNISEX)

MADOC POLARIZED 

The sportsman’s sunglasses, the Madoc Reflector are hard wearing and have a modern, futuristic look. It is in trend this season and an update of a classic style. (UNISEX)

MADOC OAK

The Madoc Oak suits the everyday occasion of a modern globetrotter. It is considered a cult classic with timeless appeal. (UNISEX)


SUNGLASSES COVER - Keep your sunglasses nice and safe in this cylinder case. Normally sold seperately for $10 but FREE for all backers who buy a pair of sunglasses. TOUCHWOOD!!!


TOUCHWOOD NECKLACES

Touchwood for life's elegantly designed; fluro wooden necklaces are handmade with wooden beads and are perfect for all occasions.

Choose from our range of:

  • Blue stone, 
  • Orange stone, 
  • Or White stone bracelets.

TOUCHWOOD BRACELETS

Touchwood for life's elegantly designed wooden bracelets are handmade with wooden beads and are perfect for all occasions.

Choose from our range of:

  • Matte black beads, 
  • Stainless Steel beads, 
  • Blue stone, 
  • Orange stone, 
  • Or White stone bracelets.

WHY WOOD

At touchwood we believe that its everyone’s responsibility to preserve our planet. All our products are Eco-friendly and sustainable, made from natural woods. Our products really do showcase the Fusion between Nature and technology. 

There are not many renewable materials that we have on this planet. Wood is one of the few exceptions. If we are careful about how we manage forests we can grow new wood to replace the wood we use. When wood is used in the production process for products the carbon is stored away and doesn't get back into the atmosphere until the wood product decays or is burnt. 

This may take decades or even centuries. Furthermore, we can make things out of wood that we would otherwise have to make from materials that are hazardous to the environment when they are made - like metals, concrete and plastics.

WE NEED YOUR SUPPORT!

As three aspiring young men, we need your help! Spread your love for what Touchwood products are all about. Please contribute funds to our Kick-Starter campaign: It will help share sense of luck that Touchwood products bring and will provide necessary funds which can be used to expand our range.

It will give you "superstars" the opportunity see more of Touchwood's future range through different shapes, sizes. We want to see the products held or worn by everyone around the world. "Lets not create a business but lets build a community!" The funding will also else help with much needed large-scale marketing and production.

People involved in the kick-starter community are either launching or backing products. Our goal is to represent a brand that is not only here to become successful, but is truly focused on empowering our customers by the brand’s positivity, class, and pure wooden luck. Just TOUCHWOOD!

 THANK YOU IN ADVANCE FOR ALL YOUR HELP!!!!

"Share the love!"

Also by simply liking or sharing our Facebook, Instagram page, following us on twitter, or sending a few quick emails to your friends and family will also go a long way in helping kickstart our journey. CLICK ON THE LINKS BELOW!!

A big thank you!

We would like to thank the following people for their time and contribution towards the campaign:

Model: Trent James Sky

Model: Catherine Chaaya

Model: Kirsten Clarke

Videography: Navjeet Singh

Photography: Aman Mankoo

Editing: Ash Kataria

Voice over: Jeremiah Hartmann

Risks and challenges

MANUFACTURING:

One of the main challenges when creating a product is the manufacturing process. We want you to rest assured that we have very reputable and capable manufacturers and we personally deal with all involved in the production process. From start to finish we will not leave any stone un-turned and will do quality checks ourselves to make sure the standard is high.

DELIVERY:

Once we are successfully funded there is a 1-week time frame to collect everyone's pledge. Shortly after we compile everyone's information we send the orders to our trusted manufacturers and production will take approximately 60 days, immediately upon arrival we will ship your stunning products directly to you.
story_txt:
WHY ‘TOUCHWOOD’ FOR LIFE?
To "touchwood” is to avoid bad luck, bring good luck.
There must have been a time in your life when someone, or yourself, for that matter, has uttered the words ‘touchwood’ but there has never been any wood around for you to touch. The history and tradition of ‘touch/knock on wood’ is long debated, however, it seems to be a familiar phrase across many cultures.
In Pagan belief, trees were thought to be home of bad spirits and people would knock on wood to request good luck or distract the spirits from evil intentions. As time has elapsed people have developed their own version of the belief, which is well known today as touching wood for luck. 
WHO WE ARE
The touchwood team comprises of three aspiring young men, Galvin Mendez, Varpreet Batra and Deshveer Singh who saw an opportunity to bring this sense of ‘luck’ to people in a unique and stylish way. We grew up together and noticed people with increasingly complex lives and an obsession with wealth, yet people instinctively continued to rely on a sense of luck and hope for a better future.

THE BRAND
With hopes of empowering people and spreading positivity, we introduce a product line that incorporates the need for functionality and also the yearn for luck. Touchwood For Life is more than just wooden products, we believe it is and want it to be a lifestyle brand. We hope Touchwood creates a sense of luck that everyone wants in their life and we intend to convey with it a sense of class, originality and style. 
To ensure that luck reaches everyone, the Touchwood product line includes men and women’s accessories suitable for any occasion. It can be worn to a picnic or may even help strike up a conversation at a black tie event, so please don’t miss out on the opportunity to stand out and be different, make sure you get your Touchwood products before the campaign ends.

Touchwood's Products
WATCHES
Touchwood for Life has released a premium, eco luxury line of wooden watches. These watches are considered a cult classic. The smooth suede wristband gives an urban feel to the very classy watch, which adds to their timeless appeal. The watches are adjustable for any wrist, 100% recyclable and toxic free.


Watches are made with 

Japanese Mayota Movement
Mineral glass with black plated seal
Black metal crown
Metal inlay linings and logo
Smooth Suede straps
Metal Buckles


MEN's WATCHES

Men Choose from 

Bamboo (Black strap)
Maple (Mustard Strap)
and Black Sandalwood (Brown Strap)



WOMEN's WATCHES


Women Choose from 


Bamboo (Pink strap)
Maple (Orange Strap)
and Black Sandalwood (Brown Strap)






Touchwood's classy and exclusive sunglasses range 
EBONY ELEGANCE


Touchwood for life's exclusive and premium Unisex wooden sunglasses. All sunglasses are made from various natural woods. We have kept every person around the world in mind when creating these sunglasses, from your corporate,businessman and everyday person to your skateboarder and surfer living life on the edge. Choose your own style to best suit your appearance and personality! (UNISEX)
THE TRAVELER


The Traveler are smart-looking sunglasses that have a dominant blue color with an unexpected touch of red adding a fun urban appeal. The Traveler are sunglasses to dream about! (MENS)
MADOC BLUEY


The Madoc Bluey is a super fun and ideal for the beach and gym. The bold blue is guaranteed to catch others’ eyes and is fantastic in finishing off an outfit. (UNISEX)

Frame: Blue acetate
Temples: Bamboo wood
Lens: Brown

MADOC WALNUT


The Madoc Dark Walnut exudes classic styling of a modern and dapper-looking man. It has a traditional, minimalistic design to it that makes it a timeless piece. (UNISEX)
MADOC POLARIZED 
The sportsman’s sunglasses, the Madoc Reflector are hard wearing and have a modern, futuristic look. It is in trend this season and an update of a classic style. (UNISEX)




MADOC OAK


The Madoc Oak suits the everyday occasion of a modern globetrotter. It is considered a cult classic with timeless appeal. (UNISEX)

SUNGLASSES COVER - Keep your sunglasses nice and safe in this cylinder case. Normally sold seperately for $10 but FREE for all backers who buy a pair of sunglasses. TOUCHWOOD!!!







TOUCHWOOD NECKLACES


Touchwood for life's elegantly designed; fluro wooden necklaces are handmade with wooden beads and are perfect for all occasions.
Choose from our range of:

Blue stone, 
Orange stone, 
Or White stone bracelets.



TOUCHWOOD BRACELETS


Touchwood for life's elegantly designed wooden bracelets are handmade with wooden beads and are perfect for all occasions.


Choose from our range of:

Matte black beads, 
Stainless Steel beads, 
Blue stone, 
Orange stone, 
Or White stone bracelets.





WHY WOOD
At touchwood we believe that its everyone’s responsibility to preserve our planet. All our products are Eco-friendly and sustainable, made from natural woods. Our products really do showcase the Fusion between Nature and technology. 
There are not many renewable materials that we have on this planet. Wood is one of the few exceptions. If we are careful about how we manage forests we can grow new wood to replace the wood we use. When wood is used in the production process for products the carbon is stored away and doesn't get back into the atmosphere until the wood product decays or is burnt. 
This may take decades or even centuries. Furthermore, we can make things out of wood that we would otherwise have to make from materials that are hazardous to the environment when they are made - like metals, concrete and plastics.


WE NEED YOUR SUPPORT!

As three aspiring young men, we need your help! Spread your love for what Touchwood products are all about. Please contribute funds to our Kick-Starter campaign: It will help share sense of luck that Touchwood products bring and will provide necessary funds which can be used to expand our range.
It will give you "superstars" the opportunity see more of Touchwood's future range through different shapes, sizes. We want to see the products held or worn by everyone around the world. "Lets not create a business but lets build a community!" The funding will also else help with much needed large-scale marketing and production.
People involved in the kick-starter community are either launching or backing products. Our goal is to represent a brand that is not only here to become successful, but is truly focused on empowering our customers by the brand’s positivity, class, and pure wooden luck. Just TOUCHWOOD!
 THANK YOU IN ADVANCE FOR ALL YOUR HELP!!!!
"Share the love!"
Also by simply liking or sharing our Facebook, Instagram page, following us on twitter, or sending a few quick emails to your friends and family will also go a long way in helping kickstart our journey. CLICK ON THE LINKS BELOW!!





A big thank you!
We would like to thank the following people for their time and contribution towards the campaign:
Model: Trent James Sky
Model: Catherine Chaaya
Model: Kirsten Clarke
Videography: Navjeet Singh
Photography: Aman Mankoo
Editing: Ash Kataria
Voice over: Jeremiah Hartmann



Risks and challenges
MANUFACTURING:
One of the main challenges when creating a product is the manufacturing process. We want you to rest assured that we have very reputable and capable manufacturers and we personally deal with all involved in the production process. From start to finish we will not leave any stone un-turned and will do quality checks ourselves to make sure the standard is high.
DELIVERY:
Once we are successfully funded there is a 1-week time frame to collect everyone's pledge. Shortly after we compile everyone's information we send the orders to our trusted manufacturers and production will take approximately 60 days, immediately upon arrival we will ship your stunning products directly to you.

story:
JONAS PAUL EYEWEAR WEBSITE



Jonas Paul Eyewear was launched by Ben and Laura, whose son, Jonas, was born with a rare visual impairment that rendered him nearly blind. Jonas underwent 16 surgeries in his first 2 years of life, all in hopes of improving his likelihood for sight. When Ben and Laura researched future eyewear possibilities for Jonas, they were uninspired by existing options. Therein Jonas Paul Eyewear was born, created to offer eyewear to Jonas and other children that would excite, inspire, and help them feel beautiful.

The are millions of children in America being barraged with the confidence deflating words "nerd" and "four eyes" — their peers mocking them because they have to wear corrective eyewear.  While to some this may seem trivial or "kids being kids," a child's self-esteem and identity can be cemented as young as the age of 8.  This identity is deeply molded and influenced by their peers as they form an initial view of how they fit into the world.

We feel that this needs to change ... and we thought to ourselves ....

Why do children's glasses have to be embarrassing?  Why can't they be a fashion statement like they are for adults?  Why can't we bring new form to children's eyewear, removing the stigma and instilling confidence and excitement in children who have to wear them?

We're the first of our kind: a provider of simple, elegant, high quality kids glasses at an affordable price. Our CPSC Certified frames are both durable and flexible; they are made from custom acetate in warm, rich hues and trendy styles.  We have a free home try on kit with free shipping both ways that allows children to try on our frames in the comfort of their own home.  And when you purchase frames at jonaspauleyewear.com, you can submit your prescription for us to fill before shipping them right to your door. Pretty cool, huh? We think so.




For each pair of Jonas Paul Eyewear frames purchased, we give 10% to CBM International to bring vision to a person in need through a pair of glasses or corrective surgery.

We believe it is possible for enterprise to positively impact the world around us.
Jonas Paul Eyewear seeks to inspire style, provide purpose, and meet the needs of those who share our vision and those whose vision is compromised.

The number of individuals living with a curable visual impairment is overwhelming. Through the service of CBM International, your purchase of a Jonas Paul Eyewear frame can help cover the cost of an individual’s eye care and deliver sustainable change to these individuals and their communities. Our partnership provides corrective eyeglasses for children, anti-parasitic medicines to prevent Onchocerciasis (also known as river blindness), and cataract surgeries for both children and adults.

Through CBM, we are sharing sight with those who need it, and we need your passion to make it a reality.

Bring your passion to our vision, and join us in Buy Sight, Give Sight.



We're hoping you will contribute to our campaign goal of $20,000!

Your contribution will go toward increasing brand awareness for Jonas Paul Eyewear, launching our new apparel line, and launching new limited edition frames. When parents find out their kids need glasses, we want them to say, "Finally! I've been waiting for an excuse to buy Jonas Paul Eyewear frames." But first, parents have to know who we are & where to find us. That's where you come in.


Contributions from this campaign will be used to grow Jonas Paul Eyewear in 3 areas :

1.  We will be able to better broadcast our story, brand, and mission into the world of waiting parents.  We will bring awareness to very people who await our unique product, and they'll have access to high-quality, stylish frames.  Everybody wins! 

2.  We will launch exclusive, limited release frames that our Indiegogo supporters will have first access to!  These frames may only be available to Indiegogo supporters with the limited supply we will be producing ... so if you want access them make sure you contribute!  (see images below, estimated delivery mid June 2015)



note : there may be additional styles and colors available depending on the success of our campaign



3.  We will launch our apparel line, which features empowering phrases for kids that we hope will be a tool to remove the stigma associated with eyeglasses for children.  (see images below)




And don't think we forgot about you! When you donate, you'll have your pick of a range of gifts from us ... scroll down to see the perks below.






Below are some of the benefits of your contribution :

•  Our brand and mission are good news for kids who wear or want glasses.

We believe in Jonas Paul Eyewear. We believe kids should have high quality, low-cost eyewear options that inspire them and help them feel beautiful. And we believe kids and families around the world will love the possibility of excellent frames without great expense. We hope to grow our brand and outreach so more people can benefit from our products. 

•  We want to make children’s prescription eyewear affordable.

For parents whose kids require glasses, cost can be the most daunting consideration as the average pair of prescription frames can cost $275 - $390. High quality frames are expensive, lenses are overpriced, and kids have a sweet way of scratching and scuffing their most fragile and expensive goods. We want to provide families a haven among the high prices: Jonas Paul Eyewear prescription eyeglasses cost $99.00, prescription included; our frames are made from high-quality, durable acetate; and they look stellar, so kids love wearing and taking care of them. 

•  We want to provide eye care and opportunity for those in developing countries.

With the purchase of every frame, Jonas Paul Eyewear donates to CBM International to support the eye care and welfare of persons around the world.  This impact is made through eye tests, corrective eyewear, cataract surgeries and preventative medicine for "river blindness" (which is the leading cause of blindness in developing countries).  The more we grow, the better we can support the health and wellbeing of persons in need and, in turn, the more those affected can develop unique solutions for their own communities. We want to help others make an impact with our enterprise.

•  We want to encourage children to feel beautiful and be confident in their eyeglasses

In our opinion, it is unacceptable that children still feel embarrassed when they have to get eyeglasses.  For adults, eyeglasses are a fashion accessory, and many wear glasses even when they don't need vision correction!  Why can't it be the same way for children?!

Check out some of the faces of confident, beautiful Jonas Paul Eyewear customers below!






Everyone that donates $25 will receive the following :
• A thank you note from the JPE team

• A 10% coupon for any Jonas Paul Eyewear prescription eyeglasses or sunglasses to be used for your child's next pair or given as a gift to someone you know ( up to a $30 value )
• The joy of encouraging children to feel confident and beautiful in his or her glasses, while at the same time providing sight to a child in need!  With helping Jonas Paul Eyewear grow, you will be partnering in the impact the social venture is making all over the world!
 


Everyone that donates $50 will receive the following :
• A thank you note from the JPE team
• A 10% coupon for any Jonas Paul Eyewear prescription eyeglasses or sunglasses to be used for your child's next pair or given as a gift to someone you know ( up to a $30 value )

• Your choice of 1 of the above JPE t-shirt designs printed on a gray, super soft Tri-Blend shirt (your choice of toddler or child size) - $25 value
• The joy of encouraging children to feel confident and beautiful in his or her glasses, while at the same time providing sight to a child in need!  With helping Jonas Paul Eyewear grow, you will be partnering in the impact the social venture is making all over the world!



Everyone that donates $100 will receive the following :

• A thank you note from the JPE team

• Your choice of 1 Jonas Paul Eyewear prescription frame for your child or given to a friend ( $99 value )

• Early access to the exlusive, limited release clear and matte finish frame styles.  With the limited quantity, these may only be available to our Indiegogo campaign supporters. (you can use free pair included in this donation towards these exclusive frames)

• A 10% coupon for any Jonas Paul Eyewear prescription eyeglasses or sunglasses to be used for your child's next pair or given as a gift to someone you know ( up to a $30 value )

• Your choice of 1 of the above JPE t-shirt designs printed on a gray, super soft Tri-Blend shirt (your choice of toddler or child size) - $25 value

• The joy of encouraging children to feel confident and beautiful in his or her glasses, while at the same time providing sight to a child in need!  With helping Jonas Paul Eyewear grow, you will be partnering in the impact the social venture is making all over the world!




Everyone that donates $200 will receive the following :

• A thank you note from the JPE team

• Your choice of 2 pairs of Jonas Paul Eyewear prescription eyeglasses or sunglasses for your child or given to a friend ( $198 value )

• One pair of Jonas Paul Eyewear non-prescription sunglass frames with 100% UV protection ( $69 value)

• Early access to the exlusive, limited release clear and matte finish frame styles.  With the limited quantity, these may only be available to our Indiegogo campaign supporters. (you can use free pair included in this donation towards these exclusive frames)

• A 10% OFF coupon for any Jonas Paul Eyewear frames to be used for your child's next pair or given as a gift to someone you know ( up to a $30 value )

• Your choice of 1 of the above t-shirt designs printed on a gray, super soft Tri-Blend shirt (your choice of toddler or child size) - $25 value

• The joy of encouraging children to feel confident and beautiful in his or her glasses, while at the same time providing sight to a child in need!  With helping Jonas Paul Eyewear grow, you will be partnering in the impact the social venture is making all over the world!



Everyone that donates $500 will receive the following :

• A thank you note from the JPE team

• Up to 6 pairs of Jonas Paul Eyewear prescription eyeglasses or sunglasses for your little one, or given as gifts to family or friends ( up to a $594 value )

• Early access to the exlusive, limited release clear and matte finish frame styles.  With the limited quantity, these may only be available to our Indiegogo campaign supporters. (you can use free pair included in this donation towards these exclusive frames)

• A 10% OFF coupon for any Jonas Paul Eyewear frames to be used for your child's next pair or given as gifts to friends and family  ( up to a $30 value )

• Your choice of 2 of the above JPE t-shirt designs printed on a gray, super soft Tri-Blend shirt (your choice of toddler or child sizes)

• The joy of encouraging children to feel confident and beautiful in his or her glasses, while at the same time providing sight to a child in need!  With helping Jonas Paul Eyewear grow, you will be partnering in the impact the social venture is making all over the world!



Everyone that donates $1000 will receive the following :

• A thank you note from the JPE team

• Up to 6 pairs of Jonas Paul Eyewear prescription eyeglasses or sunglasses for your little one, or given as gifts to family or friends ( a $594 value )

• An online 1 hour business consulting session with the Jonas Paul Eyewear Team (including a follow up pdf document with our recommendations for next steps prepared by our team, specific to your business)

Have an idea for a product you would like to develop and sell?  Need help with branding?  Need help with how to setup a website to sell your product online?  Need help with finding a manufacturer for your product?

Jonas Paul Eyewear went from concept to launch (and being featured in the Wall Street Journal) in a little over 6 months ... and we want to help you make your concept a reality!

We will schedule a Skype or Google hangout call during which the Jonas Paul Eyewear team will discuss your idea (we're happy to sign an NDA) with you and provide you with our opinions and ideas  that will help you turn your concept into a business. We will then follow up with a document providing you with our ideas, web resources, tips on manufacturing internationally, and connections that will hopefully help you to succeed in your entrepreneurial venture!

• A 10% OFF coupon for any Jonas Paul Eyewear frames to be used for your child's additional pairs or given as a gift to someone you know (up to a $30 value)

• Your choice of 4 of the above JPE t-shirt designs printed on a gray, super soft Tri-Blend shirt (your choice of toddler or child sizes)

• The joy of encouraging children to feel confident and beautiful in his or her glasses, while at the same time providing sight to a child in need!  With helping Jonas Paul Eyewear grow, you will be partnering in the impact the social venture is making all over the world!




To be honest, the eyewear industry can be a little intimidating.  It's a field with a lot of old rules and standards, especially huge markups on high quality products. While we respect companies who have been successful on this model, we plan to do things a little (a lot) differently. We're not sure, but we may face resistance for our new paradigm. While we believe in our product and mission enough to pursue it, we do face the struggle of being a unique company with a new standard setting out in a traditional field.




    Can't contribute? You can still help! Here are some other ways to get involved with our project:

    • Make some noise! You can help us by getting the word out and spreading the news of our campaign. Tell friends, kids, teachers, moms, dads, doctors, everybody!
    • Post to Facebook, tweet to Twitter, email your whole entourage! Indiegogo has all the sharing tools to help us spread the word together.
    • And make sure you tag us so we can thank you for your social love!  

    facebook.com/jonaspauleyewear

    instagram.com/jonaspauleyewear

    hashtags : #jonaspauleyewear  & #buysightgivesight

• A thank you note from the JPE team

• Up to 6 pairs of Jonas Paul Eyewear prescription eyeglasses or 
sunglasses for your little one, or given as gifts to family or friends (
 a $594 value )
• An online 1 hour business consulting session with the Jonas Paul Eyewear Team (including a follow up pdf document with our recommendations for next steps prepared by our team, specific to your business)
Have an idea for a product you would like to develop and sell?  Need help with branding?  Need help with how to setup a website to sell your product online?  Need help with finding a manufacturer for your product?
Jonas Paul Eyewear went from concept to launch (and being featured in the Wall Street Journal) in a little over 6 months ... and we want to help you make your concept a reality!
We will schedule a Skype or Google hangout call during which the Jonas Paul Eyewear team will discuss your idea (we're happy to sign an NDA) with you and provide you with our opinions and ideas  that will help you turn your concept into a business. We will then follow up with a document providing you with our ideas, web resources, tips on manufacturing internationally, and connections that will hopefully help you to succeed in your entrepreneurial venture!
• A 10% OFF coupon for any Jonas Paul Eyewear frames to be used for your child's additional pairs or given as a gift to someone you know (up to a $30 value)
• Your choice of 4 of the above JPE t-shirt designs printed on a gray, 
super soft Tri-Blend shirt (your choice of toddler or child sizes)

• The joy of encouraging children to feel confident and beautiful in his
 or her glasses, while at the same time providing sight to a child in 
need!  With helping Jonas Paul Eyewear grow, you will be partnering in 
the impact the social venture is making all over the world!



  







To be honest, the eyewear industry can be a little intimidating.  It's a field with a lot of old rules and standards, especially huge markups on high quality products. While we respect companies who have been successful on this model, we plan to do things a little (a lot) differently. We're not sure, but we may face resistance for our new paradigm. While we believe in our product and mission enough to pursue it, we do face the struggle of being a unique company with a new standard setting out in a traditional field.



  




Can't contribute? You can still help! Here are some other ways to get involved with our project:

Make some noise! You can help us by getting the word out and spreading the news of our campaign. Tell friends, kids, teachers, moms, dads, doctors, everybody!
Post to Facebook, tweet to Twitter, email your whole entourage! 
Indiegogo has all the sharing tools to help us spread the word together.
 
And make sure you tag us so we can thank you for your social love!   




facebook.com/jonaspauleyewearinstagram.com/jonaspauleyewearhashtags : #jonaspauleyewear  & #buysightgivesight

story:
O meu nome é João Pastor, sou designer e sou o criador e proprietário da marca Nomada.

My name is João Pastor, I am a designer, creator and owner of Nomada brand.


Nomada Apparel é uma marca criada em função das actividades feitas na região, os Açores, que estão cada vez mais virados para o turismo ativo e os desportos radicais, tendo em conta a natureza que os envolve.

Nomada Apparel is a brand developed for the activities done in the region, the Azores, which are increasingly facing the active tourism and adventure sports in view of the nature that surrounds them.


Nos Açores podemos encontrar a geografia perfeita para se ser nómada nos dias que correm, porque tudo está naturalmente feito para recompensar o nosso olhar.

In the Azores we can find the perfect geography to be nomadic these days because everything is naturally made to reward our eyes.


Com esta marca, pretende-se que o público-alvo sejam os habitantes das ilhas dos Açores, mas essencialmente os turistas que as visitam, de modo a que se sintam confortáveis e directamente ligados ao local de visita.

With this brand, it is intended that the target audience are the inhabitants of the Azores islands, but mainly tourists who visit, so that feel comfortable and connected directly to the place.

Em cada produto criado com a marca Nomada Apparel é possível encontrar consistência e simplicidade, para que o cliente possa estar o mais satisfeito possível. Estão disponíveis produtos como: hoodies, t-shirts, long sleeves, pólos, polares, casacos, calções de banho, toalhas, gorros e chapéus, para ambos os sexos.

In each product created with Nomada Apparel brand you can find consistency and simplicity, so that the customer can be as satisfied as possible. Products are available as hoodies, t-shirts, long sleeves, polo shirts, polar, coats, trunks, towels, caps and hats, for both genders.

Conto com a sua ajuda para obter um stock mínimo para uma primeira fase de venda online e, posteriormente, efectuar vendas físicas num local próprio.

I count on your help to get a minimum stock for a first online sales phase and subsequently perform a physical sales site.


Agradeço qualquer crítica construtiva para poder preencher qualquer lacuna ao criar produtos que se adaptem às necessidades da região.

I appreciate any constructive criticism in order to fill any gaps to create products that address the needs of the region.


Analisando o enquadramento da marca no mercado, o risco a enfrentar é mínimo e a própria marca dar-se-á a conhecer a uma pequena parte da população. No entanto, o principal objectivo é que a marca seja reconhecida e desejada por grande parte do público-alvo.

Analyzing the environment of the brand in the market, the risk is minimal facing and the brand itself is will make themselves known to a small part of the population. However, the main objective is that the brand is recognized and desired by most of the target audience.


Caso o projecto seja bem sucedido será possível incorporar um maior número de peças de vestuário e, assim, reduzir custos de produção. Isto traduzirá numa maior rentabilidade da marca e, ao mesmo tempo, uma maior notoriedade seja para o vendedor como para o consumidor final.

If the project is successful will be possible to incorporate a greater number of garments and thus reduce production costs. This will lead to a higher yield of the mark and at the same time, a higher reputation is for the seller and for the final consumer.


           Obrigado pela sua atenção e por me ajudar a alcançar o meu objectivos.

Thank you for your attention and help me reach my goals.

story:
About us:

We are Paige Johnson and Jessica Prather, we started PB&J Threads together last year. We started out by recycling old leather jackets and sewing them into baby moccasins. We have grown so much since then, and now we are going to launch a new soft-soled shoe line!

We were inspired by our kids to make quality shoes that are also classy and trendy. We also realized how hard it was for shoes to stay on our kid's feet! Our designs are the perfect combination of cute, quality, and convenience.

All of our shoes are carefully designed to stay on you child's foot. We test each style out before releasing it on our website.

Our moccasins are made from genuine leather. They provide a barefoot experience to promote healthy foot growth and inspire confidence for little ones learning to walk. 

Our shoes are also made from recycled leather to help sustain our environment. 

(Most of our new shoes will also be made from recycled leather!)

And the best part is: our shoes are affordable! Half the cost of leading brands. 

We need your help to make our dream a reality. 

What We Need & What You Get

We are looking to raise $5,000 to launch this new shoe line. This will help us:

  • Hire help to manufacture shoes on a larger scale. All manufacturing will take place in the US. 
  • Pay for us to attend the MAGIC trade show in Las Vegas in August. MAGIC is the largest fashion trade show in the world. Attending, will be some of the hottest brands as well as buyers from big name retailers.
  • Pay for new packaging, technology and supplies. 
  • All levels of donations are matched with awesome rewards! Take a look and see how you can get your hands on shoes from our new line before they are released on our website, as well as one of a kind, hand crafted gifts. 

Other Ways You Can Help

If you are not able to donate, don't worry! You can still help us out. 

  • Tell all your friends about us.
  • Share our campaign on your social media!

Rewards:

_____________________________________________________________________________

_____________________________________________________________________________

_____________________________________________________________________________

_____________________________________________________________________________

*New Perk!*

$40 Fringe Chic Bag! 

________________________________________________________________________

_____________________________________________________________________________

_____________________________________________________________________________

_____________________________________________________________________________

_____________________________________________________________________________

story:
We are asking 1 million consumers who like our sneaker designs to donate and vote for their favorite sneaker design. At the end of the campaign, the sneaker design with the most votes will be our first sneaker collection. The first million supporters will received an ICON Voucher gift card; no donation is too small. Our ICON Voucher gift card is one of the ways we can say, "Thank you!" for your donation and double its value. For a donation of $10.00, your V.I.P. card value is $20.00. If you donate $40.00, your V.I.P. card is worth $80.00 toward your purchase.

Please join us, by taking three simple steps:
Únasenos por dar tres pasos simples.

  • Donate to our campaign, the ICON Sneaker, because the name reflects who you are to us, an ICON.
  • Share this great campaign with all your Facebook friends and help us develop this great sneaker line for every day, every sport, and every game.
  • Vote for your favorite ICON Sneaker design model. Vote por su zapato favorito. Email binns.johnny@yahoo.com to tell us which design is your favorite. This will help us to produce our consumer choice sneaker design winner.

Your donation will help us to grow in three specific ways:
Su donación nos ayudará crecer.

  • Launching our ICON Sneaker Line will enhance your sportswear wardrobe.
  • Share our product around the world will help grow our business and allow us to produce new sneaker lines
  • Research and collaboration will allow us to produce innovative new products, such as the Love Sneaker Collection

What's different about the ICON Sneaker Design Package?  It's not just a sneaker design, it's an iconic sneaker design. It's not just a sportswear item, it's an iconic sportswear item. It's not just a fashion statement, it's an iconic fashion statement. These sneakers also give parents whose children play sports the ability to print their child's jersey number and ball design on their very own sneaker. These sneakers can help tell your iconic story in a big way. ICON ID Max design includes concepts such as: Teddy Bear Designs, Pink Designs, Love Designs, Football Designs, Basketball Designs, Chess Designs, and our Soccer Ball Designs presented on our crowd-funding page.


Our goal is to be the ultimate brick and mortar designs company as well as an online store serving the local, national, and international communities as an image maker and fashion leader. The key to our success will be measured by our customers' belief in our ability to exceed their expectations.

Mission Statement: Our goal is to be a company that is trustworthy, reliable, and truthful to our customers and that enhances the economic future to the glory of God by investing in training and employing those who are unskilled for new jobs.

Operations: By contracting and sub-contracting with boutiques, specialty shops, and department stores, we will build relationships with clients. We will produce a small run and gauge the market reaction before we make a larger investment. This will allow us to be flexible when introducing new sportswear, and promotional products into the marketplace. 

Marketing: We will utilize social media sites and 3D Printing, which will enable us to give customers a sneak preview of future development. Our gift cards will enable us to analyze and determine the cost effectiveness of distribution in this format. We will keep a close eye on our competitors' pricing and their marketing strategies, as well as the market size, which is estimated to be over a half trillion dollars annually.


Financial Proposal: Our goal is to earn at least a million dollars in year one and achieve a 33% increase in sales during the second year and maintain an annual increase of 10% to 15% thereafter. As soon as possible we will enlist the services of business professional such as: business attorney, insurance broker, and C.P.A. Investment will be divided into two parts: inventory and working capital.

Once we reach our goal, the funds raised will go toward taking the sneaker designs to the next level. By using digital drawing, we will produce prototypes that will contribute to continued production and expansion. We certainly expect to deliver to you within 3 to 6 months after the end of the campaign. And we will do everything within our control to expedite the process.

Shipping is $5.00 in North America and $10.00 internationally. Please feel free to email us with  any question at: binns.johnny@yahoo.com

If we do not reach our goal, the funds raised will go toward producing a smaller production. For example, the donation of $300K will be divided into two parts: $150K Start-up which includes: Purchase equipment, furniture, inventory, renovation, building and $150K for working capital which includes: Operating costs, research and development, marketing, saving account, business attorney, insurance broker, and C.P.A.

Founder Profile: Attention to detail, integrity, persistence, and years in business as a shop manager and contractor, Johnny Binns is a Christian entrepreneur who has managed three custom auto-body shop. I love the LORD because He first love me. Christ changes my life, that's why I care about other people and want to give back to the community. I have developed two copyrighted trademark designs First of all, I want to thank my Lord and Savior Jesus Christ. I'd also like to thank Kendren Jackson, Wayne G. Paul, Sharon Damelio, Mark Smith, Alicia Wilson, Zindi Tate, Charlotte Holland, and all the staff and volunteers at Central Outreach & Advocacy Center.

story:
Our Story

Each year around the world 4 million children die before age 5, and 1 out of 5 of those children dies of a vaccine-preventable disease. During a college summer internship in Cusco, Peru, our founder Lauren noticed that indigenous, low-income moms weren’t remembering to bring their children in to the clinic for vaccinations on time, although vaccines were available for free and moms knew vaccines were important for their children’s health.

The reason moms came late was because they were handed a small paper reminder, which quickly got lost and the date forgotten. That meant that nurses had to leave overcrowded clinics to go door-to-door in remote villages to remind moms, and unused vaccines expired and had to be thrown out.

After learning more about the problem from nurses and moms, Lauren designed a simple bracelet adapted to their resource-poor environment so that moms could remind themselves of their children's vaccination dates.

Later, Lauren founded Alma Sana Inc., a nonprofit social enterprise, whose mission is to ensure that every child, no matter where he or she lives, gets life-saving vaccinations on time. After a very successful initial research study in Peru and Ecuador funded by the Bill & Melinda Gates Foundation, we’re ready to reach more moms and babies – in Nigeria, Pakistan, and Colombia – and measure our impact, together with our partners and your financial support. 

Simple Bracelets as Vaccine Reminders

Our bracelets were designed specifically to fit the needs of uneducated moms living on $1.25 or less a day. Designed with indigenous moms and nurses, the bracelet uses only numbers and symbols – no words – to convey a child’s entire vaccination record. Corresponding guides help nurses and moms decode the symbols. 

By looking at the bracelet, a mom knows the number and type of vaccines her child has received and the date of the child’s next immunization. Each symbol represents a different vaccine, and each number represents the child’s age in months. Nurses hole punch out symbols on the bracelet to show that a child has been vaccinated. It's designed to be worn by the child from birth to 4 years. Nurses can easily put it on babies with minimal time and effort. The bracelets are highly customizable to local culture and needs and cost about $0.10 each. They are also waterproof, durable, comfortable, and baby-safe. 

Beyond reminders, the bracelets can help increase moms’ awareness about the individual vaccinations her child requires and received. The majority of moms, when asked, don't know the names of the vaccines their children have received and the diseases these vaccines protect against. This information is important to build community champions for vaccinations, which has the potential to increase vaccination timeliness and reduce moms' concerns about vaccines. 

Where Your Funding Is Going

We need $100,000 so that we can get started on reaching more children with our bracelets. Your funding goes entirely toward our Phase II study which will be a full impact evaluation and randomized controlled trial. We’ll be assessing the impact of the bracelets’ use in terms of effectiveness, cost-effectiveness and operational feasibility in Nigeria, Pakistan, and Colombia where there is a pressing need for this intervention. The study will run for 18 months, with all work being completed within 2 years.

We’ll need to create a new bracelet design for each country. We'll adapt the colors, symbols, and layout to each local context based on pre-testing with parents so that each country's bracelet is custom-made to fit parents' needs, preferences, and cultural values. Based on moms' feedback from Phase I study, we'll add more bracelet sizes to fit the child as it grows.

Our study has to be big enough to determine how much of an impact the bracelets’ use has on childhood vaccination rates, so we’ll need to hire and train local staff to enroll and follow up with moms, and collect data. We’ll need to create several different data forms to track impact, cost, and feedback from parents and health care workers at each child’s vaccination visit. We’ll need to get local buy-in, so we’ll sit down with community leaders, government officials, and other relevant groups to get their official support and raise awareness about the study within communities. Below is an itemized budget for Nigeria. A similar budget will be used in Colombia and Pakistan. 


Why We’re Right for the Job

We’ve been widely recognized for our promising approach and attention to detail in designing a product to meet the needs of moms living on $1.25 or less a day. 

Potential Impact of our Bracelets

Economic burden of late vaccination

Vaccine preventable diseases such as pneumonia, diarrhea, measles, pertussis and tetanus are the leading causes of child deaths in these countries. For example, in Nigeria, they account for about 30% of all under-five deaths. Besides death, the associated disabilities exert physical, social and economic burden on children, their families and communities. It has been estimated that more than 600,000 lives can be saved and $17bn in economic losses averted in Nigeria over a 10-year period if the country can achieve 90% coverage with Hib, pertussis, pneumococcal, measles and rotavirus vaccines.

Demand from mothers for bracelets

We know that there is a demand from moms to use our bracelets from their feedback in our initial study.

Moms who weren’t able to participate who saw the bracelets asked questions about how they worked and asked to use them, creating an opportunity to educate the broader community of parents about the need to vaccinate their child and to stimulate an interest in and demand for the bracelets.

Demand from health care workers

At the end of our initial study, every Ministry of Health nurse we worked with in Peru and Ecuador recommended that the bracelets be incorporated into official vaccination program protocol. Nurses said the bracelets are “something that needs to be continued”, “good for the mothers”, and "an easy way of reminding mothers about vaccinations”. One nurse from the Ecuador pilot site said, “Mothers are now arriving to vaccination appointments on time. Before initiating this program, we had problems with the mothers’ punctuality.” Having their support is critical to the long-term sustainability of this project.

Demand from global vaccine community

Many individuals from governments, NGOs, pharmaceutical companies, and communities across the developing world (and even in the US and UK) have approached Alma Sana asking to use the bracelets, stating that vaccine timeliness and coverage are challenges in their areas too. Armed with evidence after this Phase II study, we’ll be able to partner with these organizations to reach tens of thousands of parents and help every child be fully immunized on time.

FAQ

If you know moms like using the bracelets, why do you need to do more research before scaling up? 

Although we’ve been widely recognized for our work and we know that moms, NGOs, and governments want to use our bracelets, these would-be partners need to see definitive evidence of the bracelets’ effectiveness before they would be willing to commit significant financial and programmatic resources to implementing the intervention on a large scale. Evidence of effectiveness is important because NGOs and governments don’t want to invest tons of resources into rolling out an innovation on a large scale if they're not sure that it works better than current reminders. Completing this study will give us that evidence, meaning that this is the last step we need to take before we can partner with these organizations to reach tens of thousands of parents and help their children be fully immunized on time. 

The bracelets cost about $0.10 each. Why is this project so expensive? 

Research is expensive, particularly large studies like this which are necessary to be able to detect the impact of an innovation on a population. We have the advantage of having a low-cost innovation, but because we’ll be reaching thousands of moms, we’ll need more staff on hand to track their data and make sure we don’t miss a single child. It’s also more costly to work in rural or remote areas because of longer distances and travel time, but children living in those areas are the least likely to be immunized on time, and those are the children we want to reach with our bracelets. 

I'm not able to donate at this time, but I really want to help. What can I do?

Believe it or not, our average donation size is just $25. Every little bit helps, no matter how small! Spreading the word on social media by posting our campaign link and emailing our campaign to others is incredibly important to helping us reach our goal. Tell your friends, family, and colleagues about our campaign and encourage them to financially support us so that together we can reach every child. We’d love to hear from you! Like us on Facebook, follow us on Twitter, and join us on LinkedIn.
story_txt:
Our StoryEach year around the world 4 million children die before
age 5, and 1 out of 5 of those children dies of a vaccine-preventable disease. During
a college summer internship in Cusco, Peru, our founder Lauren noticed that indigenous,
low-income moms weren’t remembering to bring their children in to the clinic for vaccinations
on time, although vaccines were available for free and moms knew vaccines were
important for their children’s health. 
The reason moms came late was because they were handed
a small paper reminder, which quickly got lost and the date forgotten. That
meant that nurses had to leave overcrowded clinics to go door-to-door in remote
villages to remind moms, and unused vaccines expired and had to be thrown out. 
After learning more about the problem from nurses
and moms, Lauren designed a simple bracelet adapted to their resource-poor environment
so that moms could remind themselves of their children's vaccination dates. 
Later, Lauren founded Alma Sana Inc., a nonprofit
social enterprise, whose mission is to ensure that every child, no matter where he or she lives, gets life-saving vaccinations on time. After a very successful initial research study in Peru and Ecuador funded by the Bill & Melinda Gates
Foundation, we’re ready to reach more moms and babies – in Nigeria, Pakistan,
and Colombia – and measure our impact, together with our partners and your
financial support. Simple Bracelets as Vaccine Reminders
Our bracelets were designed specifically to fit the needs of uneducated moms living on $1.25 or less a day. Designed with indigenous moms and
nurses, the bracelet uses only numbers and symbols – no words – to convey a child’s entire
vaccination record. Corresponding guides help nurses and moms decode the symbols. 
By
looking at the bracelet, a mom knows the number and type of vaccines her
child has received and the date of the child’s next immunization. Each symbol
represents a different vaccine, and each number represents the child’s age in
months. Nurses hole punch out symbols on the bracelet to show that a child has been vaccinated. It's designed to be worn by the child
from birth to 4 years. Nurses can easily
put it on babies with minimal time and effort. The bracelets are highly customizable to local culture and needs and cost about $0.10 each. They are also waterproof, durable, comfortable, and baby-safe. 



Beyond
reminders, the bracelets can help increase moms’ awareness about the individual
vaccinations her child requires and received. The majority of moms, when asked,
don't know the names of the vaccines their children have received and the
diseases these vaccines protect against. This information is important to build
community champions for vaccinations, which has the potential to increase
vaccination timeliness and reduce moms' concerns about vaccines. Where Your Funding Is Going
We need $100,000 so that we can get started on
reaching more children with our bracelets. Your funding goes entirely toward our Phase II study which will be
a full impact evaluation and randomized controlled trial. We’ll be
assessing the impact of the bracelets’ use in terms of effectiveness,
cost-effectiveness and operational feasibility in Nigeria, Pakistan, and
Colombia where there is a pressing need for this intervention. The study will run
for 18 months, with all work being completed within 2 years. 
We’ll need to create a new bracelet design for
each country. We'll adapt
the colors, symbols, and layout to each local context based on pre-testing with parents so that each country's bracelet is custom-made to fit parents' needs, preferences, and cultural values. Based on moms' feedback from Phase I study, we'll add more bracelet sizes to fit the child as it grows.
Our study has to be big enough to determine how
much of an impact the bracelets’ use has on childhood vaccination rates, so we’ll need to hire and train local staff
to enroll and follow up with moms, and collect data. We’ll need to create several
different data forms to track
impact, cost, and feedback from parents and health care workers at each child’s
vaccination visit. We’ll need to get local
buy-in, so we’ll sit down with community leaders, government officials, and
other relevant groups to get their official support and raise awareness about the study within communities. Below is an
itemized budget for Nigeria. A similar budget will be used in Colombia and
Pakistan. Why We’re Right for the Job
We’ve been widely recognized for our promising
approach and attention to detail in designing a product to meet the needs of moms living
on $1.25 or less a day. Potential Impact of our Bracelets
Economic burden of
late vaccination

Vaccine preventable
diseases such as pneumonia, diarrhea, measles, pertussis and tetanus are the
leading causes of child deaths in these countries. For example, in Nigeria, they
account for about 30% of all under-five deaths. Besides death, the associated
disabilities exert physical, social and economic burden on children, their
families and communities. It has been estimated that more than 600,000 lives
can be saved and $17bn in economic losses averted in Nigeria over a 10-year
period if the country can achieve 90% coverage with Hib, pertussis,
pneumococcal, measles and rotavirus vaccines. 
Demand from mothers for bracelets
We know that there is a demand from moms to
use our bracelets from their feedback in our initial study.

Moms who weren’t
able to participate who saw the bracelets asked questions about how
they worked and asked to use them, creating an opportunity to educate the
broader community of parents about the need to vaccinate their child and to
stimulate an interest in and demand for the bracelets.Demand from health care workers 
At the end of our initial study, every Ministry of Health nurse we worked with in Peru and Ecuador
recommended that the bracelets be incorporated into official vaccination
program protocol. Nurses said the bracelets are “something that needs to be continued”,
“good for the mothers”, and "an easy way of reminding mothers about
vaccinations”. One nurse from the Ecuador pilot site said, “Mothers are now arriving to vaccination
appointments on time. Before initiating this program, we had problems with the
mothers’ punctuality.” Having their support is critical to the long-term
sustainability of this project. 

Demand from global vaccine community
Many individuals from governments, NGOs,
pharmaceutical companies, and communities across the developing world (and even
in the US and UK) have approached Alma Sana asking to use the bracelets, stating that vaccine timeliness and coverage are challenges in their areas too. Armed
with evidence after this Phase II study, we’ll be able to partner with these
organizations to reach tens of thousands of parents and help every child be
fully immunized on time.FAQIf you know moms like using the bracelets, why do you need to do more research before scaling up? 

Although we’ve been widely recognized for
our work and we know that moms, NGOs, and governments want to use our
bracelets, these would-be partners need to see definitive evidence of the
bracelets’ effectiveness before they would be willing to commit significant
financial and programmatic resources to implementing the intervention on a
large scale. Evidence of effectiveness is important because NGOs and governments don’t want to invest tons of
resources into rolling out an innovation on a large scale if they're not sure that it works better than current
reminders. Completing this study will give us that evidence, meaning that this is the
last step we need to take before we can partner with these organizations to
reach tens of thousands of parents and help their children be fully immunized
on time. 

The bracelets
cost about $0.10 each. Why is this project so expensive? 
Research is expensive, particularly large studies like this which are necessary to be able to detect the impact of an innovation on a population. We have the advantage
of having a low-cost innovation, but because we’ll be reaching thousands of
moms, we’ll need more staff on hand to track their data and make sure we don’t
miss a single child. It’s also more costly to work in rural or remote areas because
of longer distances and travel time, but children living in those areas are the least
likely to be immunized on time, and those are the children we want to reach
with our bracelets. 
I'm not able to donate at this time, but I really want to help. What can I do?
Believe it or not, our average donation size is just $25. Every little
bit helps, no matter how small! Spreading the word on social media by posting
our campaign link and emailing our campaign to others is incredibly important to helping us reach our goal. Tell
your friends, family, and colleagues about our campaign and encourage them to financially support us so that together we can reach every child. We’d love to hear from
you! Like us on Facebook, follow us on Twitter, and join us on LinkedIn.

have a more convenient way to take care of the child during the diaper change
 the feeding and napping. The Baby Blanket has a pillow on the top part, that rest on the parent shoulder so the infant can be comfortable when resting his head, and not feeling the collar bone. At the other end there are 2 pockets within convenient reach, that can hold and keep any necessary items. The pillow is removable so the Blanket can be washed without damaging the pillow. Its 12 inches wide and 24 inches long. It will be produced in light blue and Pink. It's also very convenient when you want to change his diaper and you laying the child on the floor our Improved Baby Blanket  gives the infant a pillow to rest his head on, and not the hard floor.
