story:
Legg Sleeves are fashionable, detachable pant sleeves that come off and on with ease.  These adapted garments are also suitable for Amputees.  Legg Sleeves are basically pant legs without the torso and waist sections of the pants. They are simple to use, and because they are designed without zippers or buttons, they can be slipped on and off with ease, often without assistance from others. Reaching the upper thigh, they provide modest coverage for men, women and children of all ages, and can be worn under longer shirts and sweaters, giving the appearance of a full pant. In inclement or cold weather, women can even wear them under skirts or dresses for added warmth and comfort, similar to leggings. They are extremely portable and can be easily packed in a purse or bag for transport.

Possibly the best feature of Legg Sleeves is the fact they make the
process of toileting for people with limited mobility much more streamlined for both them and their caregivers. Giving these patients a way to feel more independent in this area of their lives is  immeasurable.
Legg Sleeves has been introduced to professionals in nursing homes and hospitals, including veteran's hospitals and have been very well received by both patients and staff.  They found Legg Sleeves to be simple, and easy to use, and their portability makes them appealing for all parties involved. We would like to make Legg Sleeves available to anyone who could benefit from their use. 

The design is patent-pending.

Please support our crowdfunding campaign so that a robust production schedule can begin. I strongly stand behind this product for its ingenuity, its ease, its accessibility, and its potential to genuinely change many lives for the better. FASHION FOR ALL !!

story:
Short Summary

  • The world's a big place - Go Explore.  www.goexploredesigns.com
  • We design uniquely fashioned, quality shirts created with photographs.  These shirts are designed with the intention of providing others with inspiration to explore, travel, and create art.
  • Rare opportunity to have your very own uniquely shirt designed for you!
  • Check the Image Gallery for more creative designs~

What We Need & What You Get

  • We need funding to promote these products, create new fashion designs, so that comfortable, quality, and uniquely creative shirts are made available!
  • Perks! Donate and get yourself your very own unique shirt! Find a design you like or we will CREATE A SHIRT UNIQUELY FOR YOU from your own photograph or ideas related to your passion! Suggest any theme, and I'll produce a beautiful shirt unique to you and your interest.
  • If the goal is not met, all funds and donations will still be used to create shirts meant to create inspiration.

The Value and Impact

  • Be unique, comfortable, and express yourself by sharing what you are most passionate about through contributing to these promoting these quality shirts.
  • All shirts are sent out from within the United States.

Risks & Challenges

  • The shirt market is oversaturate with shirts that lack quality or just don't provide the designs unique to your personality. We need to change that.
  • In a market that requires quality, creativity, and passion to survive, We're committed to creating shirts that are the best quality physically and creatively.

Other Ways You Can Help

  • Please share this on Facebook, Twitter, or any social media, we will love you!

Sample Designs

  • Enjoy just a few of the many designs available at www.goexploredesigns.com

story:
Designer Bio

I am Chaz Aracil, an artist and designer based in Providence, Rhode Island. I attended the Rhode Island School of Design (RISD) to study painting and fine art, however I earned my BFA in Apparel Design in 2015. 

I have recently been invited to show my collection at New York Fashion Week (NYFW) in February of 2016. It is going to take a lot of resources, but through this campaign I hope to raise funds to help me successfully get there. Showing a collection in NYFW has always been an ultimate dream of mine, and with your help this could become a reality! 

While studying at RISD, my personal creative process has evolved dramatically. I find my interests and inspirations to rely heavily on extensive research pertaining to systems of natural sciences and unique elements within our surroundings. Through this research I have been able to translate and reinterpret my findings into one of a kind wearable art pieces.

The work I will be presenting at NYFW "Spectral Cell", is a women's haute couture collection based on ideas of growth, spectrality, and generation. Synthesizing my inspiration from nature into tactile wearable experiences, the spectrum of materials featured range from the sleek and architectural to the gestural and organic. This collection includes natural wools, leather skins, and printed fabrics derived from my original photography. Specific looks featuring the sculptural and vibrant rubber textiles are the product of a collaboration with fellow RISD artist Zoe Lohmann. 

 Left: Radiolaria glass model by Leopold and Rudolf Blaschka 

RIght: Rubber skirt in collaboration with Zoe Lohmann paired with digitally printed kimono top


                 Black wool kimono dress                                      Digitally Printed Dress 

Please check out the gallery above to see more photos of my collection, "Spectral Cell".

What I Need & What You Get

The total amount of funds necessary for me to get to NYFW is $10,000. These funds will go to various expenses such as: 
  • Materials for the Collection
  • Accessories
  • Models
  • Hair and Make-up
  • Showing Fees
  • Travel Expenses
By supporting me in reaching my goal, you are essentially becoming a part of my design process. In return, I have created a number of special perks for you to receive for your kind donations. 

Perks in Detail  
$25: Thank You E-mail
Receive a personal thank you e-mail from Chaz with an attached piece of digital artwork.
$50: Small Printed Artwork
Receive one small (4" x 6") mystery printed artwork featuring imagery from the collection, signed by Chaz. 
$100: Large Printed Artwork 
Receive one large (11" x 17") limited edition mystery print, numbered and hand signed by Chaz himself.
$250: High Quality Printed Lookbook
Receive a high quality, printed lookbook featuring Chaz's biography, inspirations, as well as photos of the collection, hand signed by the designer himself! 
$500: Digitally Printed Silk Scarf
Receive a limited edition digitally printed silk scarf, featuring the same printed fabric seen on the runway! 
$2,000: Chaz's Favorite Little Dress
Receive a high end custom tailored dress.  Work with Chaz to determine design elements such as color theory, and material preference. Also, receive one ticket to the Chaz Aracil runway show in New York! 

*All perk fulfillments will be processed after the New York Fashion Week premiere. If you are claiming the perk, "Chaz's Favorite Little Dress"  personal consultations will be scheduled to discuss further details and a timeline that works best for both parties.  

** If you are looking to commission Chaz for a custom piece in the near future, please contact him at chazaracilstudio@gmail.com


The Impact

As a recent RISD graduate and emerging designer this presentation will be a monumental experience for me. Your contributions to this project will not only help get me to NYFW but also really influence the next exciting steps in my career as a conceptual designer. 

Share my story, make a donation, everything helps. 

Together we plant this seed, and together we watch it evolve into something greater. 

Thank you so much again for supporting my work and design process, I truly look forward to sharing this special experience with you!  

Photo by Joe Harary.  Models: Chloe Peters, Adrienne Hugh, Ka Young Jeong, Melissa Grace, and Monike Reyes-Navarro.


Credits:

Collection: Spectral Cell by Chaz Aracil

Casted textile collaboration with Zoe Lohmann, seen in specific looks 

Video by Jon Gourlay

Gallery Photos by Rob Chron

Video Model Adrienne Hugh

story:
The perfect oxford shirt...

We started John Harris because we want to prove that it is possible to combine high quality design with affordable prices.

Thanks to our established and personal contacts with our manufacturer, we could identify and cut all unnecessary costs, such as marketing and too many middle men who all need to make profit from the same product. Your John Harris shirts are shipped straight from the manufacturer to you - we have eliminated all unnecessary intermediaries.


Cutting prices for marketing is simple. It is true that quality is reflected in the price, but only to a certain point. The rest of the money you pay is for....the brand. The brand won’t keep you warm and dry, or perform any other useful function related to the product. If you are the type of person who is happy to give away 50-70% of your purchases for imaginary benefits, John Harris is not your brand.


Our brand is about real value - what you get for your money. Most brands want to convince you that you will be more liked, accepted and popular if you buy their products. That’s not our promise, because that is actually up to you. It’s not what you wear that defines who you are. But if you appreciate fine fabrics and quality design, John Harris offers you clothes that feel just right, at the lowest possible prices.


If you like our products, tell your friends. This is our simple branding strategy. It is proven that people need to be very satisfied in order to recommend a product. We are confident that you will be amazed at the quality/price point when it comes to our Oxford shirts. If you are not really satisfied, contact us and you will be refunded, no questions asked (other than possibly how we can improve our quality and designs).


We know we are not alone, nor the first, to try to combine everyday luxury quality with affordability. However, we have a unique opportunity and setup for bringing you top notch design and quality at much lower prices than similar alternatives. Support and join us, to help us offer a well-dressed lifestyle, for each and all.

Be one of the first to get a shirt in January...

Our Oxford shirts are ready for manufacturing and shipping. We will ship shirts to all who pledge, even if we do not reach our funding goal. If we do, however, we will work fast to expand our range so that you can rely on John Harris for more and more of your everyday luxury clothing, at a 50-70% discount compared to similar quality products.


100% thick and breathable cotton... 

We have developed four different sizes: Small, Medium, Large and Extra large. In order to make a shirt that fits almost everyone, we have compared, tried and measured brands (and people) from all over the world to understand what it is that makes a shirt fit perfectly. We will continue to test and improve our models and are very grateful for your input to us.


Everyone should own a well-fitting oxford-shirt. Why? Because of the versatile use and comfort. We use 100% thick and breathable cotton. It feels incredibly comfortable against the skin, and, with a slim cut, it falls naturally on the body.

                    


These prices are outrageous...

John Harris is, and will always be, quality at affordable prices. The idea and niche are not unique, but we do have a unique capacity to bring you the finest, state-of-the art designs and fabrics, at amazing prices. Our manufacturer is our partner, so we handle both shipping and production in the same place - to reduce all unnecessary costs. What we don’t skimp on, however, is securing a safe and sustainable working environment along with fair wages to all. After all, your shirt shouldn’t be off someone else’s back.



Share share share...

Even if you don’t join us, we are grateful if you share this with friends who might be interested. The first step is always the hardest, but we hope to get this started with a little help from you all. Many thanks!

Listen pledgers...

*After your kind contribution: Choose from four different sizes and four different colors. 
Email your request to: simon@modenyck.se*

The brand won’t keep you warm and dry, or perform any other useful function related to the product. If you are the type of person who is happy to give away 50-70% of your purchases for imaginary benefits, John Harris is not your brand.Our brand is about real value - what you get for your money. Most brands want to convince you that you will be more liked, accepted and popular if you buy their products. That’s not our promise, because that is actually up to you. It’s not what you wear that defines who you are. But if you appreciate fine fabrics and quality design, John Harris offers you clothes that feel just right, at the lowest possible prices. If you like our products, tell your friends. This is our simple branding strategy. It is proven that people need to be very satisfied in order to recommend a product. We are confident that you will be amazed at the quality/price point when it comes to our Oxford shirts. If you are not really satisfied, contact us and you will be refunded, no questions asked (other than possibly how we can improve our quality and designs).We know we are not alone, nor the first, to try to combine everyday luxury quality with affordability. However, we have a unique opportunity and setup for bringing you top notch design and quality at much lower prices than similar alternatives. Support and join us, to help us offer a well-dressed lifestyle, for each and all.   Be one of the first to get a shirt in January... 
Our Oxford shirts are ready for manufacturing and shipping. We will ship shirts to all who pledge, even if we do not reach our funding goal. If we do, however, we will work fast to expand our range so that you can rely on John Harris for more and more of your everyday luxury clothing, at a 50-70% discount compared to similar quality products.
  100% thick and breathable cotton...  
We have developed four different sizes: Small, Medium, Large and Extra large. In order to make a shirt that fits almost everyone, we have compared, tried and measured brands (and people) from all over the world to understand what it is that makes a shirt fit perfectly. We will continue to test and improve our models and are very grateful for your input to us.
Everyone should own a well-fitting oxford-shirt. Why? Because of the versatile use and comfort. We use 100% thick and breathable cotton. It feels incredibly comfortable against the skin, and, with a slim cut, it falls naturally on the body.

                    


These prices are outrageous...
 John Harris is, and will always be, quality at affordable prices. The idea and niche are not unique, but we do have a unique capacity to bring you the finest, state-of-the art designs and fabrics, at amazing prices. Our manufacturer is our partner, so we handle both shipping and production in the same place - to reduce all unnecessary costs. What we don’t skimp on, however, is securing a safe and sustainable working environment along with fair wages to all. After all, your shirt shouldn’t be off someone else’s back. 





   Share share share...
Even if you don’t join us, we are grateful if you share this with friends who might be interested. The first step is always the hardest, but we hope to get this started with a little help from you all. Many thanks!

Listen pledgers...
*After your kind contribution: Choose from four different sizes and four different colors. 
Email your request to: simon@modenyck.se*

story:
Have you ever dropped and broken your phone or, worse, had it stolen? Are you tired of stuffing your pockets with your phone, keys and money or having to carry a bag or purse everywhere so everything stays securely in one place?

To solve these issues, you now have ColorPaks™, a secure, customizable, hands-free pocket for your phone, keys and money!


Let’s be honest, smartphones are expensive. Dropping, losing or having your phone stolen is costly. As careful as we try to protect our valuable property, it still happens. As the creator of the SpiderBelt, No-Bounce Sport Pocket, I saw firsthand how desperate customers had become to ensure their valuables were secure while working out. Now, recognizing that smartphones are getting bigger and bigger and customers are wanting a more VERSATILE everyday product, I created ColorPaks™!


 

ColorPaks™ are lightweight and worn across your body so they’re virtually impossible to pickpocket. Plus, their hands-free design makes them impossible to drop. Whether you’re shopping and want to have your hands free or you’re dancing and don’t want to worry about carrying a bag or dropping your phone, ColorPaks™ are perfect in any setting. You can even personalize them by choosing your own strap, pocket and zipper colors or by adding artwork and logos for your own one-of-a-kind design.


 

ColorPaks™  come in several sizes, to fit almost anyone, even kids!

My favorite thing about ColorPaks™ has to be all the places you can use them!


100% of your support will go toward equipment, materials and web development, as well as toward marketing and operational expenses. We can’t do it without you. Your support ensures ColorPaks™ makes it to market!

     

To reduce the carbon footprint, all materials are sourced as close as possible to Los Angeles, CA, where ColorPaks™ are made to order. All components have been selected for their durability and proven quality. ColorPaks™ are MADE IN THE USA because we’re dedicated to creating American jobs, and your support helps ensure we reach this goal. That said, we ship WORLDWIDE!

This campaign is just the beginning of a very big idea. While ColorPaks™ is an ideal product for everyday consumers, it’s also perfect for large groups. Schools, small businesses, corporations, athletic events, festivals, tradeshows, fraternal organizations and religious groups can all benefit from a branded, customized product that every member could wear and use. A successful campaign today will open the doors to an even larger mainstream market tomorrow.


The campaign goal is $12,000. The money we raise together will go directly toward the following:

  • Purchasing equipment to produce the personalized ColorPaks™
  • Paying a developer to create the product configurator (a fancy word for the 'customizer') for the website, including hosting and domain fees
  • Sourcing and purchasing materials
  • Fabrication
  • Marketing

To sweeten the deal, we have seven great perks for you to choose from. As little as $5 can help make a difference. Most of the perks will get you one, two or ten ColorPaks™ of your own. The ten packs are ideal for groups, from family reunions to sorority socials or team-building events. Note: If you take advantage of our perks, as soon as the configurator is LIVE on our site (July/August 2016), you will be able to 'build' your customized ColorPaks and receive them in August/September. You won’t be able to get deals like this after the campaign ends. Take advantage of them now!


PLEASE SHARE this campaign with your friends and colleagues. Even if you can’t contribute, sharing can be just as valuable. Clicking one or all of the share buttons on the left goes a long way toward helping us meet our goal!


 
With your help, we plan to get your ColorPaks™ to you starting September 2016! That's just before the holiday season starts up and don't forget ColorPaks™ make great GIFTS!

story:
Short Summary

We set out to design a new way to carry money. Our inspiration originated with the money clip. We looked at different ways people cary money and a lot of people roll up their cash and secure it with a rubber band. This product design provides a big improvement in security and style for transporting currency or other items. 

What We Need & What You Get

We use the best quality carbon fiber, and that is the bulk of our expense. The more orders we get, the better prices we can get through bulk.

Because we have custom parts made for this, the more we can order the cheaper, and we can reach minimum orders required for those prices.

The Impact

The Bank Roll is a new design with the intention to disrupt the look of wallets and expand the horizons for creativity for every day needs like carrying cash.

Risks & Challenges

Perfecting the system to make it the most user friendly is out main interest as well as keeping to delivery dates!

Other Ways You Can Help

If you like our project, it would be awesome to share with friends and family!

story:
Welcome to the Styrofoam Studio 

Styrofoam Studio is a newly formed visual production company with a breadth of artistic ambitions, starting with fashion. Formed in Louisville, Kentucky by a group of friends looking to create innovative art and apparel and be self-sustained/funded doing so, Styrofoam Studio aims to practice full creative freedom with no middle man between us and our audiences.    

Our Plan

The funds we receive will immediately go into producing more clothes at a faster pace with the same handmade quality. We'll be purchasing supplies and equipment to help up start building an inventory. 

As we produce our first lines of clothing we'll also begin building and preparing to drop our website, which will allow us to sell our products, showcase our projects, and connect with people. 

Other funds coming from this campaign will be invested in future projects based in other disciplines, including but not limited to film, animation, painting, and prints. 

Get limited edition Styro gear!

We offer a number of our limited first edition products as thanks for your contributions, we can even personalize something specifically for you! Check our perks section for more information.

Feel free to contact us with any questions or business inquiries at styrofoamstudio@gmail.com

Follow us for up to date information, deals, content, and more.

 @Styrofoam_studio

story:
Un petit bout de moi / A Liltle bit about me 
  • Bonjour tout le monde et merci de vous arrêter par ici.  Alors je m'appelle Ettiaka, originaire de la cote d'ivoire (en Afrique de l'ouest), je vis à Montréal depuis quelques années et je suis maman d'une fille de 2 ans.  Je suis autodidacte et créer des accessoires ,  était au départ un passe temps ,je voudrais, cependant,  le faire à temps plein, je voudrais vivre de ma passion.  j'ai déjà lancé ma petite entreprise, présenté quelques pièces et participé à des foires. 
  • Hello everyone !!  thank you for viewing my campaign. I'm Ettiaka, from Ivory Coast (in West Africa), i live in  Montreal  and i have 2-year-old daughter. Creating accessories was initially a hobby, but I'd like to turn it into a full-time business. I have already started my small business, showcased some pieces and participated in fairs.

L'objectif / The Goal 

  • Si le projet est financé avec succès, Ettyaka sera en mesure de produire plus d'accessoires et d’être plus accessible. L'objectif à moyen terme est de pouvoir participer au développement communautaire ici à Montréal et de pouvoir à long terme, permettre à des femmes en difficultés dans mon pays d'origine, d’acquérir leur autonomie et de sortir de la misère. 
  • If this project is successfully funded, Ettyaka will be able to produce more accessories and reach a bigger target audience . The medium-term objective is to be an active player in community development here in Montreal and in the long term, empower women in difficulty in my country, allow them to be independent and to step out of poverty 


Pourquoi / Why  $3000?

  • Ce montant est nécessaire  pour importer les tissus africains, acheter les pièces nécessaire à la fabrication des accessoires, pour l’équipement, pour la presse et la publicité ainsi que pour la création du site web. 
  • This amount is necessary to import African fabrics, to purchase craft materials and equipments, to buy press coverage and advertising, and to create my website.


Contrepartie / perk  ($60)

Un exemple du collier que vous recevrez.  NB : les motifs et les couleurs seront differents

An example of the necklace you will receive. NB : the patterns and colors will be different

D'autres façon d'aider / Other ways you can help 

  • Je comprends que tout le monde ne sera en mesure de faire un don - mais il y a d'autres façons d'aider! Passez le mot au sujet de ma campagne sur Facebook, Twitter, Instagram etc !!  et vous pouvez utiliser les outils de partage Indiegogo !
  • I understand that not everyone will be able to donate - but there are other ways you can help!  Help me spread the word about my campaign on facebook, twitter, Intagram etc!!  Use the share tools !! 


MERCI / THANK YOU :) :) :) :)

story:
What is it?

VacuumGlow is a vacuum-tube clock that combines vintage indicator elements and cutting edge technologies.

Rare indicator lamps are used in VacuumGlow to show the time. Up to 70-s years of the 20th century, such gas-discharge indicators were the most common way to display information. Their production stopped due to the development of new display technologies, therefore, today glow-discharge lamps are a rarity on factory warehouses. We have combined gas-discharge indicators and advanced technologies in order to create an unusual and upmarket VacuumGlow clock.



The clock can be controlled through an application on your smartphone by Bluetooth 4.0 protocol. The applications are now available on Google Play and App Store. The GPS/GLONASS function is responsible for time accuracy. The data will be updated from the satellite if you place the clock within 2-3 meters from the window. The clock case is made of aluminum and painted using micro-arc oxidation, which simultaneously helps to protect metal from corrosion and ensures pleasant tactile properties of the surface. Decorative lighting completes the image of a clock and sets the mood. You can select any backlight color and change it at any time.



About the project / Backgrounds

VG Project is a pioneer project that accelerates the introduction of mass technology into everyday life, while taking care of your personality.

Our idea to create a quality VG clock has evolved from the idea of continuity. We appreciate the vintage and do not overload it with trendy features. We keep all most exclusive parts to it and introduce what it needs. In order to understand that time is aesthetics and clocks may inspire, you do not have to surround yourself with smart gadgets that set your alarm with the power of your thought.




If the idea of time is as important to you as it is to us, join us.


What we need / what you get

We are keen to evolve, i.e. to improve the design and to invent new models that would satisfy the most demanding taste. We want to create high-quality clocks that bring closer the future of technology, but do not cancel its past.

We have implemented our first idea – the invention of original initial models of vacuum-tube clocks. We have produced several pieces of them. Our small factory production is ready. The technical details have been developed and the factory refinements have been taken into account. 


We have:

- Developed designs of vacuum-tube clocks that set them apart from all usual models

- A limited number of clocks of different models and colors

- A working production scheme which takes into account the intricacies and peculiarities of each model

- An idea of reliable and high-quality packaging design for storage and transportation of the clocks

We need:

Your support in our endeavor.




Our goal is to step to the next level and to be the first to launch mass-production of original vacuum-tube clocks. Our ideas that increase in their scale and number every day will help you make your dreams of future clocks come true. Join now and be amazed!


Risks / Guarantee

We plan to continue to set high standards for our product and maintain high quality in accordance with the values of the project.

There is already a work plan for both the manufacturers and the supply chain for the necessary case parts. A limited number of ready-made models, which you can see, are a clear guarantee that the money from your support will bring results. As soon as the campaign comes to its end, you will be able to show your new and unusual purchase to your friends, and we will continue to work on new models, so that in the future everyone could choose a clock to match their personality.


Timeline


Models

The main features can be found in the picture.

VacuumGlow Veneze




VacuumGlow Levitation

Manufactured warranty
1 year  - for clock  
3 years -  for indicators

Feel free to contact us: 

info@vacuumglow.com
 +7 495 252 01 33

story:
What is CG Studio?

Hello, I'm Satoshi Mabuchi.

I have been developing a new 3DCG software "CGStudio".

I worked on CAD/CAM software bender,

and studied physics simulation in graduate school.

I like 3d computer graphics, but through these experiences, I think that 3D modeling is very hard.

So, I decided to make a new CG software.

After 1 year development from 2014, I released the beta version of the CG Studio on 2015.

At this point, the CG Studio is used for modeling.

In the near future, the CGStudio will be a unified CG software which includes rendering, animation, physics simulation.

I hope that many users create and share your 3DCG products.


What We Need & What You Get

I am going to release product version in 2016, April.

To brush up the software, beta users are really needed.

Beta version of the CG Studio is available from our web site.

http://www.premiumgraphics.co.jp/

I distributed the beta version software to my friends, and they really loved the software.

However, I have no channel to advertise the software. 

At this point, only windows version is available.

The design of the software is platform independent.

If more money collected, I have a plan to release mac version or iphone version.

I have been developing the software more than one year.

To make unified CG software, more users and money are really needed.


The Impact

If the project grows, many users are able to create your own 3D models!

Some people will create full CG movies.

Some people will print the model with 3D printer.

I believe that human have great imagination.

I think that with the CGStudio, your PC can be more creative tool.

Moreover, I open my library for the application on github.

You can use the library to your software without permission.


Load Map

As I mentioned above, I am going to build unified 3DCG software. 

The load map may change in the future.




Risks & Challenges

Developing a unified 3DCG software is very hard.

Many bugs and improvements will be appeared.

I trust that many users and programmers will help improvements the software.

If you are a end user, let's download beta-version software.

http://www.premiumgraphics.co.jp/

If you are an programmer, let's checkout the library.

https://github.com/SatoshiMabuchi/CGLib

Many eyes will help improvements the software.

Your feedback is really needed!


Profile

I worked on CAD/CAM software bender.

I got Ph.D. from Keio University.

The theme of doctoral thesis is real-time physics simulation.

The demo is here.


The physics simulation will be available on the CG Studio.

In 2014, I founded Premium Graphics.



Thanks

I used POV-ray for offline rendering. 

http://www.povray.org/
story_txt:
What is CG Studio? 

Hello, I'm Satoshi Mabuchi.
I have been developing a new 3DCG software "CGStudio".
I worked on CAD/CAM software bender,
and studied physics simulation in graduate school.
I like 3d computer graphics, but through these experiences, I think that 3D modeling is very hard.
So, I decided to make a new CG software.
After 1 year development from 2014, I released the beta version of the CG Studio on 2015.


At this point, the CG Studio is used for modeling.


In the near future, the CGStudio will be a unified CG software which includes rendering, animation, physics simulation.
I hope that many users create and share your 3DCG products.



  
What We Need & What You Get 
I am going to release product version in 2016, April.
To brush up the software, beta users are really needed.
Beta version of the CG Studio is available from our web site.
http://www.premiumgraphics.co.jp/
I distributed the beta version software to my friends, and they really loved the software.
However, I have no channel to advertise the software. 
At this point, only windows version is available.
The design of the software is platform independent.
If more money collected, I have a plan to release mac version or iphone version.
I have been developing the software more than one year.
To make unified CG software, more users and money are really needed.




   The Impact 
If the project grows, many users are able to create your own 3D models!
Some people will create full CG movies.
Some people will print the model with 3D printer.
I believe that human have great imagination.
I think that with the CGStudio, your PC can be more creative tool.
Moreover, I open my library for the application on github.
You can use the library to your software without permission.



Load Map


As I mentioned above, I am going to build unified 3DCG software. 
The load map may change in the future.







    Risks & Challenges 
Developing a unified 3DCG software is very hard.Many bugs and improvements will be appeared.I trust that many users and programmers will help improvements the software.If you are a end user, let's download beta-version software.http://www.premiumgraphics.co.jp/If you are an programmer, let's checkout the library.https://github.com/SatoshiMabuchi/CGLibMany eyes will help improvements the software.Your feedback is really needed!




Profile


I worked on CAD/CAM software bender.
I got Ph.D. from Keio University.
The theme of doctoral thesis is real-time physics simulation.
The demo is here.

The physics simulation will be available on the CG Studio.
In 2014, I founded Premium Graphics.



Thanks
I used POV-ray for offline rendering. 
http://www.povray.org/

story:
This is an open online jewelry community app for designers and customers. We are providing a platform for customer to choose jewelry directly from a designer or even communicate with each other. Or designers can get to know about popular-ity of their designs and earn designing commission here. 

1. There are more unique and beautiful designs on our app. We need financial supp-ort to promote our app and let more people can choose jewelry on our App. 

2. There will be more designers on this community soon. But it’s hard to get access to designers’ resource. So we need your support to reach more designers.  


Choose your favorite item as shown below!

It’s super easy to use this app.

“Like” allows you to favor different styles of jewelry. Scroll through all the designs on the Design bar, choose your favorite designs and “Like” them. We will decide whether these items should be manufactured according to the number of Likes. Yes, it’s up to you to choose. It’s you who decides!

To receive updates about your designs, check here! You are able to view your Liked and Pre-ordered designs here. Of course, you can check for updates of your followed designers.

What is D-coin?

D-coin is an in-app currency which can be redeemed for a monetary value that will reduce the cost of your purchased items. You can receive D-coins by liking photos, reviewing photos, or inviting friends.

Why is it useful?

If you have 500 D-coins and your product costs $89, instead of paying $89 you can redeem your D-coins and pay $84 for the item. 1 D-coin is equal to 1 cent. Isn’t it great?

Now it is time to take your Liked jewelry home! Just click on the item. Fill in your shipping information and pay the remaining balance. Then you just need to wait for the final product which is sent straight to your home!

Our goal is to develop a platform to allow you to create unique and personalized jewelry for all occasions.


We have spent several months developing this app. Now, we need your support. Most importantly, we want to share this incredible moment with you! 

1. This is the first time that we’ve developed an app. 
2. This is the combination of an app and the jewelry making process. 
3. It’s hard to get access to the resources that our designers, users, and promoters will require. It’s a big challenge for us and we need your help.

story:
Hey Everybody ~

Welcome to our Crowdfunding Page

(new video footage to be uploaded above VERY soon)

Be the first on our list to receive our newest product information and special offers:  be sure to SIGN UP to become an Astral Flyer!!!

www.astralar.com


Astral AR builds robotically-enhanced limited mass customization long-range drones, with tons of different uses for everyone from hobbyists to professional racers, commercial enterprises to search & rescue.   We're super-excited about our invention: an integrated system for intuitive drone piloting (AR not VR). After many moons of daydreaming, development, troubleshooting, and experimentation we're ready to unveil our hobbyist-level Beta version and give people super powers.

Everybody wants to fly -  and with Astral AR superpowers, you can!  Revolutionize the way you fly your drone.  Fly with our Augmented Reality drone piloting systems without the vertigo of VR - and with our "Wizard" system experience advanced AR holoportation and telepresence

With your help we're going to launch our Beta for the world to see - and in the process, make history. 

What IS mind-flown flight? 

In its most basic form, the pilot wears AR mount visors + a Thalmic Myo armband and enjoys augmented immersion. 

In its most advanced  form, the pilot wears holoportation smartglasses + a Thalmic Myo armband + a minimalist headset EEG reader.  The pilot thinks "Turn Right/Bank Left/Elevate/Drop" with a small gesture emphasis, and the drone flies by mental command - just like that - providing realtime telepresence and holoportation. 



Basically, it's like being in two places at one time, able to fly up to 400 feet and at speeds up to and beyond 50 mph. 

Basically, it's flying like an eagle (or a dragon) while standing still.



Our prosumer platform supports hobbyists. drone-photogs, and drone-prix racers to go to a new realm of aeronautical capacity for max fun and creativity, a realm that is the bleeding edge of unmanned aerial vehicles.

We've also designed for limited mass customization for commercial applications across industries, allowing us to change around handful of robotic components and sensors with minimal engineering overhead to produce an entirely new vertical or product addressing a new market. Our realtime drone-solutions address real world challenges like Public Safety, Search & Rescue, Industrial Worker Safety, Environmental Remediation, and World Heritage Site protection. 

We've been invited to demo for FEMA and are in serious talks with two different Fortune 50 companies interested in using our drones. 


Where You Come In

We need to launch our first basic Prosumer product to beta-test our platform, integrate customer feedback, and prove our production skills for our advanced flight systems and largescale, global reach.  This is the simplest version of Astral AR flight systems:  a Thalmic Myo armband + AR Visors.  After a year of pre-production planning and infrastructure with a small stellar team, we're ready to sell our beta aftermarket piloting system and spread the love with drone-lovers.  

We were made for this!  Our early adopters and bleeding-edge friends:  it's time to fly.  We are crowdfunding this thing to announce Astral AR to the world.

Investors:

  • Check out our TechCrunch Crunchbase page
  • Have a look at our Angel.io page
  • And we're also on F6S


Other Ways You Can Help

Some of ya'll boostrapping startups and starving students just can't contribute financially right now - but there are other ways you can help :D

  • Make some noise about our campaign!
  • Use the Indiegogo share tools! 

3...2...1... LAUNCH!

While you wait for your pre-sale drones, here's some flying music :)

story:
What is Sunshine & Bravado?

Sunshine & Bravado is a line of magical, ethical clothing for the adventurous & badass women of the world. It is a circle of style for wanderers, sun-chasers, tree-huggers, soul-seekers, magic-makers, bohemians, and the radical, passionate punk babe in all of us.

ABOUT THE DESIGNER

Hi, I'm Nikki! I am an indie fashion designer from New York, based in Columbus, Ohio. I started out as a self-taught seamstress and designer, from a working class family in New York, and went on to receive a scholarship to attend Parsons School of Design in Manhattan. I started out as a "traditional" fashion major, but quickly switched to the more flexible major of Integrated Design. I fit in better with the like-minded sustainable designers interested in changing the design world for the better. It was there that I learned about things such as natural dyeing, sustainable fabric technology, and even crowdfunding. I also spent a semester studying abroad at Central St. Martins in London (University of the Arts London), where I studied print-making, textiles, illustration, and the importance of collaborating at a global scale.

 

ABOUT THE COLLECTION, Sunshine & Bravado LOTUS

This collection, my first collection, is called LOTUS. The Lotus flower grows from the mud at the bottom of a pond, up through the water, and into the sunshine above. It is a symbol that no matter what hardships you have gone through, life can still be a beautiful adventure.

  •  I am also working with female business owners who want to bring garment production back to the United States. Sunshine & Bravado clothing is made with love right here in the USA, in Louisville, Kentucky. I dye everything by hand using natural, plant based dyes.

  • This campaign will enable me create a sustainable, earth-friendly, female-powered brand that creates jobs. The fashion industry is changing at a grassroots, indie level: we're tired of an industry that puts garment workers in danger, pollutes the earth, and has a negative impact on women's self-esteem. By using ethically sourced, organic & natural fibers and textiles, and plant-based dyes, my line is encouraging a shift towards a more sustainable fashion future. When you wear Sunshine & Bravado clothing, you will always be able to answer the question, #whomademyclothes?

What We Need & What You Get

Break it down for folks in more detail:

  • This campaign is for $3,500 US dollars. It is a flexible funding campaign. The money will go towards all of the things that are vital in producing a fashion line, such as:

pattern making for studio production; organic fabrics and natural dyes; manufacturing the clothing in an ethical, American studio factory; screen printing; comfy, ethically made Alternative Apparel t-shirts; legal fees for registering a business; care labels, tags, and other legal things required for clothing production. Also, the initial cost of upgrading my website, www.sunshineandbravado.com, to support e-commerce (online sales)!

  • I have some really awesome, unique perks, including hand-made postcards, screen printed t-shirts, and pre-sales of the entire line!

THE SUNSHINE & BRAVADO MANIFESTO

we consider black to be a happy color, and tie dye to be a neutral. our favorite holiday is Halloween. we carry crystals in our purses. we take any chance to travel. we get advice in this order: first you call your bff, then you ask the Tarot. we believe journaling is a way of life. we care about the earth. we believe that personal style is a high form of creative expression. we strive to make the world a better place. we support fair trade. we believe in the healing powers of art. and we create our own magic.

The Impact

  • Indie fashion is taking over. It's time to add our voices to the movement to make the fashion world a better place.

  • My collection is seasonless, which means that it is not fast fashion - the designs can be worn and layered during any time of the year.

  • Supporting this campaign will make it real. Actual clothing, actual jobs, and an actual community of awesome, earth-saving women in the sunshine & bravado circle. I can make Sunshine & Bravado into my real-life job, my career, my full-time passion, and spend my time making things and giving back. Fuck the side-hustle! Dreams come true!
  • Because giving is a circle, I am working to collaborate with non profits so that a percentage of every sale goes to help someone else. For this collection, I'm working with:

     

  • The Love Yourself Project

an NYC based art therapy nonprofit centering on self love. [photos via their website]

  • Survivor's Ink

a Columbus based non-profit which helps survivors of human trafficking reclaim their bodies, by covering up scars and brands with tattoos. [photo via the Guardian]

 

Other Ways You Can Help

If you are unable to contribute financially right now, I totally understand (though even one dollar helps!) Here are some other ways to help if you are feeling the vibes of my mission:

  • Get the word out about the campaign. Share photos, share my video, share the link on social media! Tell all your friends! This will not be possible without you, and any tiny contribution or act of sharing counts.
  • Use the Indiegogo Share Tools!

Get in Touch

sunshineandbravado@gmail.com

www.sunshineandbravado.com // @sunshineandbravado on Instagram

#sunshineandbravado #ethicalfashion #fashionrevolution

story:
So I got a little carried away with focusing on trying to make my blog the best it could possibly be, and I think my goal of $10k kind of gave people the wrong idea about who I am and what I'm trying to do. So, I lowered my goal to $3,000 (half of that being for a laptop).

My thought process going into this was if I can get the help I need in a creative way, why not give it a shot! I admire people finding unique ways to go after their dreams and accomplish their career goals. Then sadly, after all of this time and hard work I invested into this campaign, I quickly realized this isn't how I wanted to do it. This isn't how I want to gain my success.

I've always prided myself on being extremely independent and hard working, and I started to picture myself becoming successful both through this campaign and organically, and through this campaign just didn't feel right. I realized that if I went through with this, I wouldn't respect myself as much and I wouldn't feel as good about my success.

It's going to be a long, stressful journey working my way to where I want to be starting from complete scratch, but it will be a much more enjoyable journey, a journey to be proud of. I've gotten myself to where I am now (and I'm not just talking blog/career wise, I'm talking making my own dinners and mowing the lawn since fourth grade, moving across the country to one of the biggest cities in the country and supporting myself completely on my own) and I did a pretty damn good job, so I'll just keep doing what I'm doing and I'll get there.

So, then I decided to take my campaign down. But the joke was on me, Indiegogo doesn't let you take a campaign down after it has raised any amount of funds. And now, for the grand finale: My Ultimate Decision.

I am leaving the campaign open to anyone who wants to buy any of the clothing, shoes, accessories, etc. I am offering because I still do need to get rid of them. My closet is literally a foot wide and I just don’t have the space. Also, I feel like this would be a more effective way than ebay, and for a better cause and more creative way than selling on ebay. 

 

In the end, I don't regret this at all. I've learned so much about myself, what I want and what I truly value. And I've decided to leave this video up because, well...I'm damn proud of it. Also, I could've used an example like this when making my own video, so I'll leave it as an example for someone else.

I sincerely appreciate anyone who shared my campaign and supported me. I never really expected or wanted any of my friends to donate, the goal was just to get this campaign seen by experienced backers who could relate to my story and see the drive I had in me, but I greatly appreciate the friends that did donate, it meant the absolute world to me and the favor will definitely be returned. So thank you all again, I can't wait to see my progress over these next few years, and I can't wait to say that I did it all on my own.

Sincerely,

Kelsey

​​

story:
OUR STORY

We're excited to launch our first crowdfunding campaign. We are KOJIMA GENES, 20-year-old Japanese denim maker, based in Kojima, Okayama, Japan.

We started KOJIMA GENES to build a new type of denim brand that focuses on creating innovative and quality denim at an affordable price point. Our jeans are made with daily wear in mind, and we strive to make “Beloved” jeans.

“WAKONAI®” SPECIAL NATURAL INDIGO DENIM AS YOUR REWARD

We have teamed up with the world famous KUROKI MILL. KUROKI’s innovative and quality denim has attracted many high fashion brands throughout the world.

For this campaign,  we are offering you the jeans crafted with the same fabric that high fashion brands use, beautiful KUROKI's “WAKONAI®, Genuine Natural Indigo”. We will crowdfund and deliver it directly to you at an affordable price point.  

With your support, it will be brought to life with our sleek slim-fit design. We are ready for production releasing these awesome pairs for the first time to the world! Please join us! These pairs will be available only through this campaign!!

KUROKI WAKONAI® (JAPAN SPIRITS)

WAKONAI®(wa-kon-ai) is Genuine Natural Indigo Dye exclusively developed by KUROKI MILL. It is 100% natural indigo denim and is characterized as the traditional beautiful Japanese Indigo dyed denim, and has a vivid, natural fade in color.

WAKONAI® is produced by a special technique, “Awa Genuine Indigo Dye Method” that is globally renowned as “Traditional Art Craft” and is designated as Intangible Cultural Treasure by the Ministry of Manufacturing and Industry in Japan.

NATURAL INDIGO IS ECO-FRIENDLY AND SUSTAINABLE

Natural Indigo is a sustainable resource and is part of an ecosystem where the waste water from the dyeing process can be used to water fertilize the land.

Japan has a rich history with indigo. Indigo was brought to Japan around 1400 years ago and gained popularity as a dye in the Edo era (1603-1868). The Natural Indigo dye gives the jeans a richer, deeper color. It leads to a pure, darker indigo color.

You can see more details in the following! →More Images

ADDITIONAL REWARD ​- KUROKI EXCLUSIVE 21OZ

We will also release 21OZ Selvedge that is heavy and densely woven by KUROKI MILL. KUROKI exclusively developed this awesome denim for us. A special automatic loom “Riki-Shokki” gives the denim a beautiful uniformity of color. As the denim matures, you will enjoy a fade unique to you. With your support, we will bring it to life with our authentic, classic and vintage infused straight-fit design.

Production for 21oz denim is very limited and you will rarely find it on the market. There are very few factories that can sew this thick and heavy denim. This special denim is a “Compilation of Kojima Craftsmen’s Techniques”.

You can see more details in the following! →More Images

BENEFITS FOR YOU

If you think about famous high fashion brands, a pair of premium jeans with Japanese denim may cost near $1000 at a department store. The price point was our main issue since KUROKI works with those high fashion brands.

Our focus is quality and affordability. So we work with a new mindset to branch off from traditional way to cut out the middle agents to keep the costs as low as possible. We chose crowdfunding as a platform to deliver these awesome pairs directly to you at a most affordable price point.

If you buy these quality premium denim, it will last longer! That means it will be gentle to the environment, and also to your wallet. You can get cost benefit per wear when you buy our quality denim that lasts longer, compared to buying cheaper denim that lasts for only one season.

WHY CROWDFUNDING?

The beauty of crowdfunding is that we can directly communicate with our community. We have learned so much through this campaign. We keep our ears open to valuable feedback and suggestions (positive or negative). We will keep learning more from you and our dream is to build an amazing community with our global audience.

WHAT IS HAPPENING IN THE FUTURE?

We are planning more campaigns to go. With your support, we will keep challenging to offer you denim with better cost performance for the future campaigns. Also, we want to create denim that YOU will want to wear. We want to hear from you as to what kinds of denim you want to wear at what price points. Please feel free to drop us a line at info@kojimagenesxsf.com

SUPPORT KOJIMA'S CRAFTSMEN

We want to raise your awareness that the Japanese textile industry is dwindling.

The Japanese textile industry used to be huge in Japan, and Kojima has been the heart of the industry since the Edo era (1603-1868). But now with all the companies outsourcing jobs and factories the number of factories in Japan is declining. In 1960, there were around 70,000 textile factories in Japan. That number has dropped to 15,000 in 2010.

If everyone plays a role, we will be able to raise awareness to help the textile industry in Kojima flourish again.

Our goal is to produce “Beloved” denim to our audience around the world, while supporting Kojima’s craftsmen!

ABOUT KUROKI TEXITILE MILL

Established in 1950, KUROKI is globally recognized as a leading fabric manufacturer. KUROKI continues to make Japan’s denim history creating quality denim fabric by innovative methods. They consider local environment and ecological issues very seriously. Each of their plant is well-equipped with total waste water disposal system.

ABOUT KOJIMA GENES x SAN FRANCISCO PROJECT 

KOJIMA GENES was born in 1996 with the respect toward craftsmen in KOJIMA. We make denim that prioritizes everyone’s lifestyle and to fulfill our customer’s essential needs. 

KOJIMA, OKAYAMA is globally recognized as the birthplace of Japanese denim and dubbed as the world’s "Denim Mecca". MADE IN KOJIMA denim is renowned for its premium construction and incredible attention to detail by highly skilled craftsmen. 

Two years ago, our journey has started with the simple idea, to bring MADE IN KOJIMA denim to people around the world. We are launching the project from SAN FRANCISCO where our team members are based, in this beautiful city by the bay also known as the “Gateways to the World”.

DETAILS OF REWARDS

REWARD#1 

KUROKI WAKONAI®(JAPAN SPIRITS) SELVEDGE - 13OZ SLIM FIT, Handcrafted in Kojima, Okayama

Click here for more images.

Product Details

  • Sizes: 28-42  (SIZE GUIDE)
  • Limited Production: Serial numbers will be stamped on inside of pocket
  • 100% Natural Indigo, Genuine Natural Indigo Dye
  • One wash, 100%Cotton
  • Overseas Exclusive Leather patch
  • Slim leg fit, Tapered from the knee down
  • Regular rise
  • Zip fly with YKK Universal zipper
  • Punched copper rivets with hidden rivets
  • Selvedge coin pocket
  • Sanforized
  • Dyeing Method: Rope dyeing
  • Dark Blue bordered by white selvedge ID

​

REWARD #2

21OZ KUROKI EXTRA HEAVY SELVEDGE - STRAIGHT FIT, KOJIMA GENES Original, Handcrafted in Kojima, Okayama

Click here for more images.

Product Details

  • Sizes: 30-42 (SIZE GUIDE)
  • Tough and Durable
  • Limited Production
  • Raw (Rigid) – Non Wash, 100%Cotton
  • Leather patch
  • Classic straight leg fit -  not too skinny, not too loose
  • Regular rise
  • Slightly larger back pockets
  • Zip fly with YKK Universal zipper
  • Punched and hammered copper rivets which will oxidize and age over time
  • Selvedge coin pocket
  • Sanforized
  • Red bordered by white selvedge ID

​ 

What is Selvedge? 

Selvedge denim is considered higher quality and is more durable. The edge produced on woven fabric is to prevent unravelling. It is usually finished with a signature colored thread and is visible to show off when you cuff your jeans.

THE FADE

Another enjoyable feature of premium denim is the fade of color as the denim matures. Fading is unique to every wearer, and also depends on the milling and production process.

ANYTHING WE CAN DO?

We are especially working hard at expanding our project, as we chose to do DIY marketing, so we would love and appreciate it if you all can share us with your friends!  We are on Facebook, Instagram, and our webpage. If you ever need more information don’t hesitate to contact us at info@kojimagenesxsf.com

SIZING AND CARE

SIZING GUIDE

Size charts from KOJIMA GENES are measured 360 degrees for the waist and flat for the remaining measurements. The measurements are taken after the first wash. All the measurements are in centimeters except for the waist size. 

Please pay close attention to the sizing and measure your own jeans to get accurate numbers. KOJIMA GENES products are made smaller, so please consider picking one size bigger than your usual waist size. If you are between two sizes, we suggest you choose the bigger size. 

CARE GUIDE

Please click here to confirm it on our website. 

RISK AND CHALLENGES

This is our first time creating a crowdfunding campaign. We plan to grow and learn alongside all of you. We have 20 years of experience in creating denim so we are confident we can bring you an awesome pair of jeans. We have been working many years with our suppliers and have built great relationships with them.

That being said, there are a few things we need to address.

DELIVERY

Our shipping methods are going to be a little bit more complicated than usual, so we also want to address that here.

FAQ

How do I provide you with my size or shipping address?

We will send out a survey to collect size and shipping address once the campaign is over.

Do you ship internationally?

Yes! All of our jeans are made in Japan so our shipping base will be Japan, and we need to ask all the backers an extra shipping cost of $20 except for backers in Japan. Please read our “risk and challenges” for more information.

Do you have women’s sizes?

Unfortunately we don’t, for this campaign, but with your support we may be able to launch a women’s line.  Some women do wear our smaller sizes.

Do you do hemming or customization?

No, we don’t offer hemming or customization of our jeans for this campaign. This is so we can deliver the jeans to you in time and to not make production complicated.

What happens if we choose the wrong size?

The products for this campaign are limited production, so we will do our best to get you the correct size but we cannot guarantee if we would have the right sizes for you to exchange. Please carefully read our sizing and care guide to get the right size for you.

  1. Shipping: All of our jeans are hand-made and shipped from Japan. Unexpected delays may occur but we will make sure we will be on top of things and let you know if something does happen.
  2. Customs: Delays may happen when shipping internationally as each country has their own customs regulations.
  3. Unforeseen events: Although extremely unlikely, if anything unexpected happens, we will make sure you are the first to know.
  4. As stated earlier, all of our products are going to be made in Kojima, Japan.
  5. Orders in North America, including Hawaii and Alaska, will first be sent to our office in San Francisco, and from there we will individually ship orders to backers. Other International orders will be shipped from our factory in Japan directly to you.
  6. Shipping costs: Shipping costs for orders in Japan will be free. International orders will have a shipping cost of 20 USD, including USA.
  7. Shipping methods may change, depending on several factors. If any changes are made we will make sure our community is the first to know.
  8. For orders in the US, (including Hawaii and Alaska), the products will be sent from San Francisco so we will take care of the duty.
  9. Shipping date: Following the end of this campaign, we will start production in November. We will get you your products around the end of March, 2017.
