story:
HAZ CLICK AQUÍ PARA ESPAÑOL 

(Por problemas técnicos, no funciona el link. Por favor baja y después de la info en Inglés, encontrarás la info en Español. ¡Gracias!)
MONSHULS /mon-shools/ Commonly known as a pet, but for genuine pet lovers, monshuls are best friends, fur kids, family.

There are many products for pets, but when throughout my life, when searching for gifts or other products for my MONSHULS, I noticed that these were always the same, boring and with little color and lacking variety, made in series and without, and without regard of the interests and objectives of pet lovers as users.

Increasingly, I started encountering other pet lovers who complained of the same situation and the discomfort it generated them. I also found out, that some of the designs I was selling on Spoonflower were being used to make dog accessories. This time people were using my fabric because they liked my designs, but they still weren't considering humans nor the usability of the product (durable and resistant materials as well as comfortable.)

From there I got the idea of creating MONSHULS - for genuine pet lovers; A brand where I combine my passion for animals with surface design to provide through carefully-crafted and thoughtfully-designed patterns and illustrations every-day fashion and design products for happier dogs, cats and humans.

We create objects that allow pet lovers to express their love for their MONSHULS through a shared style.

The use of our products result in well-being experiences that allow humans and their pets to share unique items that identify them and allow them to feel authentic, special and part of the same family.

Furthermore, through these objects MONSHULS and their humans can express each other positive emotions such as love, joy, and satisfaction.

Lastly, research has found that in the same way that occurs in the relationship between parents and children, the relationship of humans with pets reduces stress and this in turn, generates feelings of peace and tranquility in the pet, which positively feeds back the relationship and bonding between the two. #happyhumanhappypet #happypethappyhuman

Our products are for people with dogs and/or cats, for whom their pets are an essential part of their life and family, and value design objects that allow them to communicate what they feel for them.



For the last year, I’ve been working hard to develop the business foundations of MONSHULS with the help and advise of different professionals, and together, we’ve planned to finally see them all materialized in October with the launch of my first collection. 

I plan on having a wide range of products, but to start, I will reach my market with: collars, and bandanas for both dogs and humans.   

Our dog collars and leashes are made with:

  • 100% poliéster webbing (because it can be printed using sublimation)
  • 100% nylon webbing (because it is the strongest and most durable fiber)
  • 100% nylon thread (usually used in leather goods - ensures resilient and secure seams)
  • Acetal plastic accessories (for its tensile strength, yield strength and toughness)
  • Zamak cast metal accessories (for its mechanical strength)

 

Our bandanas (slip-over collar and classic) are made with:

  • 100% polyester fabric with anti-stain technology (releases stains and allows moisture to spread and dry quickly)

  

  

 

Our multifunctional bandanas are made with:

  • knitted fabric in 100% polyester that allows moisture transport and absorption (maintaining freshness during use), sunscreen protection (UV UPF 30-50), and odor control (a technology that controls the growth of bacteria thus preventing bad odors)

Our MONSHULS wear their clothes and accessories for several days without removing them. With them they go out, play, run and sleep, which means they sweat and get them dirty without a daily change. Polyester provides better performance against mold, fungi, and bacteria than fabrics in natural fibers such as cotton, and this is why, we chose it for our products; To reduce the risk of odors and dust mites that can hurt both MONSHULS and their humans.

These are some of the designs that are part of our first collection. We will use them to print our materials and make our products.
  

All of the designs start with a MONSHULS in mind and a design trend theme that suits him/her. Once I’ve chosen my muse and theme for a specific mini collection, I do some visual research, come up with a concept and color story for the mini collection and proceed with sketching. I like creating quirky characters and motifs with a naive aesthetic (probably because I think of my MONSHULS as eternal, loyal, and always-ready-to-give-love children.)  


In order for MONSHULS to take this next step, I need your help. 

With your sponsorship, I will fund supplies and production, design and build our website, and manufacture marketing materials, brand stationery and the basic packaging needed for me to start making my dream come true.

  • $1 - EVERY DOLLAR COUNTS: Really! If you only have $1 to donate, don't hesitate! In exchange for it, you will have our eternal gratitud and we will send you a nice coloring photo frame (downloadable and printable) for you to put a picture of your MONSHULS in.  
  • $15 - MONSHULS POSTCARD SET: A fab set with 10 postcards (5 dogs / 5 cats) for you to go old-school and go back to writing and posting happy messages to your friends and family. 
  • $25 - MONSHULS BANDANA DUO:  One slip-over collar bandana (for your MONSHULS) + a classic bandana or a multifunctional bandana (for YOU!). Dog collar not included / you choose the designs and sizes.
  • $30 - JUST FOR MY MONSHULS: One dog collar for you to pamper your favorite MONSHULS. You choose the design and size.

  • $10 - MONSHULS TREAT: One slip-over collar bandana (for your MONSHULS). Dog collar not included / you choose the design and size. < 28.5% off retail price >
  • $40 - MONSHULS SET: One dog collar + leash set for you to pamper your favorite MONSHULS. You choose the designs and sizes. < almost 21% off retail price >
  • $70 - GENUINE PET LOVER COMBO: One dog collar + leash + slip-over collar bandana (for your MONSHULS) + a classic bandana or a multifunctional bandana (for YOU!) You choose the designs and sizes. < almost 18% off retail price >

    • $100 - MONSHULS LIMITED EDITION PHOTO FRAME: Indiegogo exclusive - Limited edition, just for sponsors, mdf-wood MONSHULS photo frame. Printed picture of your MONSHULS included.
    • $300 - YOUR MONSHULS, OUR MODEL: We will turn your MONSHULS pic into an illustrated Monshuls model. He/She will be part of our website along with all of our other MONSHULS, and will also be the muse for one of our future collections. In addition, we will send you a poster of his/her MONSHULS shot for you to brag about your star! (41.7 x 52.6 cm / 16.4 x 20.7 in). Frame not included.

The name of all of our backers will be included on a THANK YOU page on our new website.

Hi, my name is MaJo, and I am a #genuinepetlover!

After years of freelancing in Italy and my recent return to my home country Colombia, I decided to launch my own label: MONSHULS - for genuine pet lovers. I am a FIRM believer that color, patterns and textures make our lives happier and help us interact with our environment in a more fun and enjoyable way. I have seven MONSHULS that I adore with all my heart and that serve as constant inspiration for my project. 

Hi! I’m Natalia, a recently graduated architect, really eager to start creative projects that inspire me, and where I can join most of my passions. Although I do not own a pet right now, I consider myself a genuine pet lover. I think of them as companions, friends and as important parts of families that only gift them happiness and lifetime memories. I believe pets and design are a great combination that produce unexpected results that bring pets and owners closer and make them both happier. So far, MONSHULS   has been a great opportunity for me to learn, get inspired and have fun! 

The responsability of turning the printed surface into finished articles resides on our local mom seamstresses that use their expertise and hands to carefully shape each of our products.

So far, we’ve already chosen three women (Doña Flor, Verónica and Maria Helena) to manufacture our first collection. Each of them will be in charge of bringing to live one specific product.

Mission

MONSHULS  creates design objects inspired by the unconditional love that characterizes our 

relationship with our pets. Our mission is to build a community of pet lovers through creative, original, striking and modern artwork that brings to life imagination and generates well-being.

Philosophy

  • That genuine love develops between humans and their pets.
  • That pets are part of our family.
  • That pets deserve care, respect and love.
  • That pet designs must provide pets with well-being. They must be functional, comfortable, safe and beautiful.
  • That our designs should generate positive emotions in both pets and humans
  • That pet lovers communicate through their lifestyle the love they feel for their best friends.
  • In transparency and honesty: with both our customers, suppliers and business allies.
  • In being respectful and fulfilling 

Vision

By 2020, MONSHULS  will have consolidated itself as the most recognized brand by pet lovers in Bogota, and will have begun to venture into other markets nationwide.

By 2025, MONSHULS  will be the most recognized brand nationally by pet lovers, and will have been able to enter the international market for its innovative value proposition.  

Whatever way or ways you choose to help MONSHULS, know that I will be forever grateful with you, and that by doing so, you’ve demonstrated yourself and the world, you are a truly and passionate GENUINE PET LOVER.






ESPAÑOL


MONSHULS /mon-shuls/ Comúnmente conocido como mascota, pero para los genuine pet lovers, los monshuls son mejores amigos, hijos peludos, familia.



Hay muchos productos dirigidos a mascotas, pero cuando buscaba regalos u otros productos para mis MONSHULS, notaba que lo que había disponible era siempre lo mismo, aburrido y con poco color y variedad, hecho en serie y sin tener en cuenta los intereses y objetivos de los amantes de las mascotas como usuarios.

Progresivamente fui encontrándome con otros amantes de las mascotas que se quejaban de la misma situación y del malestar que esto les generaba. También descubrí que algunos de mis diseños que estaba vendiendo en Spoonflower estaban siendo utilizados para hacer accesorios para perros. En estos casos las personas estaban usando mi tela porque les gustaban mis diseños, pero todavía no estaban teniendo en cuenta a los seres humanos ni la usabilidad del producto (materiales duraderos y resistentes, así como cómodos.)

De ahí me surgió la idea de crear MONSHULS – for genuine pet lovers: una marca donde combino mi pasión por los animales con el diseño de superficies para proporcionar a través de estampados e ilustraciones diseñadas cuidadosamente y elaboradas detalladamente, moda y objetos de diseño para perros, gatos y humanos más felices.

Creamos objetos que permiten a los humanos amantes de las mascotas expresar su afecto hacia sus MONSHULS a través del uso compartido de un mismo estilo.

Nuestros productos generan experiencias de bienestar porque permiten que tanto los humanos como sus mascotas compartan objetos únicos que los identifican y les permiten sentirse auténticos, especiales y parte de una misma familia.

Asímismo, a través de estos objetos los MONSHULS y sus humanos pueden expresarse mutuamente emociones positivas como el amor, la alegría, y la satisfacción.

Por último, diversas investigaciones han encontrado que de la misma manera que ocurre entre la relación entre las figuras parentales y las niñas y los niños, la relación de los humanos con sus mascotas reduce el estrés, y esto a su vez, genera sensaciones de paz y tranquilidad en la mascota, lo cual retroalimenta positivamente la relación y el vínculo afectivo entre los dos. #humanofelizmascotafeliz #mascotafelizhumanofeliz

Nuestros productos son  para todas aquellas personas con perros y/o gatos, para quienes sus mascotas son parte esencial de su vida y familia, y ven valor en objetos de diseño que les permitan comunicar lo que sienten por ellas. 


Durante el último año he trabajado con constancia en el desarrollo de los fundamentos de negocio de MONSHULS con la ayuda y asesoría de diferentes profesionales, y juntos, planeamos ver finalmente nuestro trabajo materializado este octubre con el lanzamiento de mi primera colección.

Planeo tener un amplio y variado portafolio de productos, pero para empezar, alcanzaré mi mercado con collares, pañoletas y cuellos tanto para perros como para humanos.

Nuestros collares para perros y correas están hechos con:

  • reata 100% poliéster (porque permite la estimación por sublimación)
  • reata 100% nylon (por ser la fibra más fuerte y durable)
  • hilo 100% nylon (generalmente usado en marroquinería - garantiza costuras resistentes y seguras)
  • herrajes en plástico acetal (por  su resistencia a la tracción, resistencia a la fluencia y tenacidad)
  • accesorios metálicos en zamak fundido (por su resistencia mecánica)

Todas nuestras pañoletas (para collar y clásicas) están hechas con:

  • tela 100% poliéster con tecnología anti-manchas (libera las manchas, permite que la humedad se esparza y seque rápidamente)


Nuestros cuellos multifuncionales están hechos con:

  • tela en tejido de punto 100% en poliéster que permite el transporte de humedad y absorción (manteniendo la frescura durante su uso), con protección solar (UV UPF 30-50), y control de olores (una tecnología que controla la proliferación de bacterias, impidiendo así los malos olores)

Nuestros MONSHULS usan sus prendas y accesorios por varios días seguidos sin quitárselos. Con ellos salen, juegan, corren y duermen, lo que significa que sudan y los ensucian a diario sin cambiarlos. El poliéster ofrece un mejor comportamiento contra moho, hongos, y bacterias que las telas en fibras naturales como el algodón, y es por esto, lo escogimos para nuestros productos para disminuir el riesgo de malos olores y ácaros que puedan hacerle daño tanto a los MONSHULS como a sus humanos.

Estos son algunos de los diseños que harán parte de nuestra primera colección. Los usaremos para estampar nuestros materiales y confeccionar nuestros productos.
Mis diseños comienzan con un MONSHULS en mente y una tendencia de diseño que se adapte a él/ella. Una vez que he elegido mi musa y el tema para una mini colección específica, hago un poco de investigación visual, defino un concepto e historia del color para esta y comienzo a bocetar. Me gusta crear personajes curiosos y motivos con una estética ingenua (probablemente porque pienso en mis MONSHULS como niños eternos, leales, y siempre-listos para dar amor.)

Para que MONSHULS pueda dar este siguiente paso, necesito tu ayuda.

Con tu patrocinio, financiaré los insumos y la producción de la primera colección, diseñaré y desarrollaré nuestra página web, y elaboraré los materiales de marketing, los artículos de papelería de la marca y los empaques básicos necesarios para poder empezar a hacer mi sueño realidad.



  • $1 - EVERY DOLLAR COUNTS: ¡de verdad! Si sólo tienes $1 para donar, ¡bienvenido es! A cambio de él, te ganarás nuestro agradecimiento eterno y te mandaremos un lindo marco de fotos (descargable e imprimible) para colorear y poner la foto de tu MONSHULS. 
  • $15 - MONSHULS POSTCARD SET: un fabuloso set con 5 de nuestros modelos caninos y 5 de los felinos. 
  • $25 - MONSHULS BANDANA DUO: una pañoleta para collar (para tu MONSHULS) + pañoleta clásica o un cuello multifuncional (para TI). No incluye el collar / tu escoges los diseños y la tallas.
  • $30 - JUST FOR MY MONSHULS: un collar para perro para consentir a tu MONSHULS favorito. Tu escoges el diseño y la talla.

  • $10 - MONSHULS TREAT: una pañoleta para collar para tu MONSHULS. No incluye el collar / tu escoges el diseño y la talla. < 28.5% menos del p.v.p. >
  • $40 - MONSHULS SET: un collar para perro + una correa para tu MONSHULS favorito. Tu escoges los diseños y las tallas. < Casi el 21% menos del p.v.p. >
  • $70 - GENUINE PET LOVER COMBO: un collar para perro + una correa (para tu MONSHULS) + una pañoleta para tu collar (para tu MONSHULS) + una pañoleta clásica o un cuello multifuncional (para TI). Tu escoges los diseños y las tallas. < Casi el 18% menos del p.v.p. >


  • $100 - MONSHULS LIMITED EDITION PHOTO FRAME: exclusivo para Indiegogo - edición limitada sólo para patrocinadores de un lindo portarretratos MONSHULS en madera mdf. Foto impresa de tu MONSHULS incluida.
  • $300 - YOUR MONSHULS, OUR MODEL: tu MONSHULS ilustrado como uno de nuestros modelos de marca (será parte de nuestra página web y nuestra musa inspiradora para una futura colección). También te mandaremos un póster de su imagen MONSHULS para que presumas de tu estrella. (41.7 x 52.6 cm / 16.4 x 20.7 in) El marco no está incluido.

Los nombres de todos nuestros patrocinadores se incluirá en un muro de agradecimiento en nuestra página web.

¡Hola! Soy MaJo y soy una #genuinepetlover.

Después de años de trabajar como freelancer en Italia y mi reciente regreso a mi país Colombia, decidí lanzar mi propia marca: MONSHULS - for genuine pet lovers. Creo firmemente que el color, los patrones y las texturas hacen nuestras vidas más felices y nos ayudan a interactuar con nuestro entorno de forma más divertida y agradable. Tengo siete MONSHULS que amo con toda mi alma y me sirven de constante inspiración para mi proyecto. 

¡Hola! Soy Natalia,  una arquitecta recién graduada, ansiosa por comenzar proyectos creativos que me inspiren y donde pueda unir la mayoría de mis pasiones. Aunque en el momento no tengo ninguna mascota, puedo decir que soy una #genuinepetlover. Pienso en ellas como compañeros, amigos e integrantes importantes de las familias, que traen sólo felicidad y

recuerdos para toda la vida. Creo que las mascotas y el diseño son una muy buena combinación que produce resultados inesperados que unen aún más a las personas y sus animales.

MONSHULS  ha sido una gran oportunidad para mí para aprender, inspirarme y divertirme.

La responsabilidad de convertir las superficies estampadas en artículos acabados reside en nuestras costureras mujeres madres locales que utilizan su experiencia y manos para cuidadosamente dar forma a cada uno de nuestros productos.

Hasta ahora, ya hemos elegido tres mujeres (Doña Flor, Verónica y María Helena) para la fabricación de nuestra primera colección. Cada una de ellas será la encargada de materializar un tipo de producto específico.

Misión

En MONSHULS  creamos objetos de diseño inspirados en el amor incondicional que caracteriza nuestra relación con las mascotas que nos acompañan. Nuestra misión es construir una 

comunidad de personas amantes de las mascotas a través de una propuesta gráfica creativa, original, llamativa y moderna que da vida a la imaginación y genera bienestar.

Filosofía

En MONSHULS creemos...

  • Que entre los humanos y sus mascotas se desarrollan vínculos de amor auténticos.
  • Que las mascotas hacen parte de nuestra familia.
  • Que las mascotas merecen cuidado, respeto y amor.
  • Que los diseños para mascotas deben brindarles bienestar, ser funcionales, cómodos y al mismo tiempo seguros y bonitos.
  • Que nuestros diseños deben generar emociones positivas en las mascotas y sus humanos.
  • Que las personas amantes de las mascotas comunican a través de su estilo de vida el amor que sientes por sus mejores amigos.
  • En ser honestos y transparentes con nuestros clientes tanto internos como externos.
  • En el respeto y el cumplimiento.
Visión

En el 2020, MONSHULS  se habrá consolidado en Bogotá como la marca más reconocida por las personas amantes de las mascotas y habrá empezado a incursionar en otros mercados a nivel nacional.

En el 2025, MONSHULS  será la marca más reconocida a nivel nacional por las personas amantes de las mascotas y habrá logrado incursionar en el mercado internacional por su propuesta de valor innovadora.

Cualquiera que se la forma o formas que escojas para ayudar a MONSHULS, quiero que sepas que te estaré por siempre agradecida, y que al hacerlo, le demuestras al mundo y a ti mismo que eres un verdadero y apasionado GENUINE PET LOVER.

HAZ CLICK AQUÍ PARA ESPAÑOL (Por problemas técnicos, no funciona el link. Por favor baja y después de la info en Inglés, encontrarás la info en Español. ¡Gracias!)

MONSHULS /mon-shools/ Commonly known as a pet, but for genuine pet lovers, monshuls are best friends, fur kids, family.


There are many products for pets, but when throughout my life, when searching for
gifts or other products for my MONSHULS, I noticed that these were always the same, boring
and with little color and lacking variety, made in series and without, and without regard of the interests and objectives of pet lovers as users.
Increasingly, I started encountering other pet lovers who
complained of the same situation and the discomfort it generated them. I also found out, that some of the designs I was selling on Spoonflower were being used to make dog accessories. This time people were using my fabric because they liked my designs, but they still weren't considering humans nor the usability of the product (durable and resistant materials as well as comfortable.)

From there I got the idea of creating MONSHULS - for genuine pet lovers; A brand where I combine my
passion for animals with surface design to provide through carefully-crafted
and thoughtfully-designed patterns and illustrations every-day fashion and design products for happier dogs, cats and humans.


We create objects that allow pet lovers to express their love for their MONSHULS through a shared style.
The use of our products result in well-being experiences that allow humans and their pets to share unique items that identify them and allow them to feel authentic, special and part of the same family.






Furthermore, through these objects MONSHULS and their humans
can express each other positive emotions such as love, joy, and satisfaction.
Lastly, research has found that in the same way that occurs in
the relationship between parents and children, the relationship of humans with
pets reduces stress and this in turn, generates feelings of peace and
tranquility in the pet, which positively feeds back the relationship and
bonding between the two. #happyhumanhappypet #happypethappyhuman
Our products are for people with dogs and/or cats, for whom their pets are an essential part of their life and family, and value design objects that allow them to communicate what they feel for them.






For the last year, I’ve been working hard to develop the business foundations of MONSHULS with the help and advise of different professionals, and together, we’ve planned to finally see them all materialized in October with the launch of my first collection. 
I plan on having a wide range of products, but to start, I will reach my market with: collars, and bandanas for both dogs and humans. 


 

Our dog collars and leashes are made with:

100% poliéster webbing (because it can be printed using sublimation)

100% nylon webbing (because it is the strongest and most durable fiber)

100% nylon thread (usually used in leather goods - ensures resilient and secure seams)

Acetal plastic accessories (for its tensile strength, yield strength and toughness)

Zamak cast metal accessories (for its mechanical strength)




 

Our bandanas (slip-over collar and classic) are made with:
100% polyester fabric with anti-stain technology (releases stains and allows moisture to spread and dry quickly)


  

  
 

Our multifunctional bandanas are made with:
knitted fabric in 100% polyester that allows moisture transport and absorption (maintaining freshness during use), sunscreen protection (UV UPF 30-50), and odor control (a technology that controls the growth of bacteria thus preventing bad odors)

Our MONSHULS wear their clothes and accessories for several days without removing them. With them they go out, play, run and sleep, which means they sweat and get them dirty without a daily change. Polyester provides better performance against mold, fungi, and bacteria than fabrics in natural fibers such as cotton, and this is why, we chose it for our products; To reduce the risk of odors and dust mites that can hurt both MONSHULS and their humans.



These are some of the designs that are part of our first collection. We will use them to print our materials and make our products.
  
All of the designs start with a MONSHULS in mind and a design trend theme that suits him/her. Once I’ve chosen my muse and theme for a specific mini collection, I do some visual research, come up with a concept and color story for the mini collection and proceed with sketching. I like creating quirky characters and motifs with a naive aesthetic (probably because I think of my MONSHULS as eternal, loyal, and always-ready-to-give-love children.)  



In order for MONSHULS to take this next step, I need your help. 



With your sponsorship, I will fund supplies and production, design and build our website, and manufacture marketing materials, brand stationery and the basic packaging needed for me to start making my dream come true.









$1 - EVERY DOLLAR COUNTS: Really! If you only have $1 to donate, don't hesitate! In exchange for it, you will have our eternal gratitud and we will send you a nice coloring photo frame (downloadable and printable) for you to put a picture of your MONSHULS in.  

$15 - MONSHULS POSTCARD SET: A fab set with 10 postcards (5 dogs / 5 cats) for you to go old-school and go back to writing and posting happy messages to your friends and family. 

$25 - MONSHULS BANDANA DUO:  One slip-over collar bandana (for your MONSHULS) + a classic bandana or a multifunctional bandana (for YOU!). Dog collar not included / you choose the designs and sizes.


$30 - JUST FOR MY MONSHULS: One dog collar for you to pamper your favorite MONSHULS. You choose the design and size.







$10 - MONSHULS TREAT: One slip-over collar bandana (for your MONSHULS). Dog collar not included / you choose the design and size. < 28.5% off retail price >

$40 - MONSHULS SET: One dog collar + leash set for you to pamper your favorite MONSHULS. You choose the designs and sizes. < almost 21% off retail price >

$70 - GENUINE PET LOVER COMBO: One dog collar + leash + slip-over collar bandana (for your MONSHULS) + a classic bandana or a multifunctional bandana (for YOU!) You choose the designs and sizes. < almost 18% off retail price >







$100 - MONSHULS LIMITED EDITION PHOTO FRAME: Indiegogo exclusive - Limited edition, just for sponsors, mdf-wood MONSHULS photo frame. Printed picture of your MONSHULS included.

$300 - YOUR MONSHULS, OUR MODEL: We will turn your MONSHULS pic into an illustrated Monshuls model. He/She will be part of our website along with all of our other MONSHULS, and will also be the muse for one of our future collections. In addition, we will send you a poster of his/her MONSHULS shot for you to brag about your star! (41.7 x 52.6 cm / 16.4 x 20.7 in). Frame not included.




The name of all of our backers will be included on a
THANK YOU page on our new website.





Hi, my name is MaJo, and I am a #genuinepetlover!
After years of freelancing in Italy and my recent return to my home country Colombia, I decided to launch my own label: MONSHULS - for genuine pet lovers. I am a FIRM believer that color, patterns and textures make our lives happier and help us interact with our environment in a more fun and enjoyable way. I have seven MONSHULS that I adore with all my heart and that serve as constant inspiration for my project. 

Hi! I’m Natalia, a recently graduated architect, really eager to start creative projects that inspire me, and where I can join most of my passions. Although I do not own a pet right now, I consider myself a genuine pet lover. I think of them as companions, friends and as important parts of families that only gift them happiness and lifetime memories. I believe pets and design are a great combination that produce unexpected results that bring pets and owners closer and make them both happier. So far, MONSHULS   has been a great opportunity for me to learn, get inspired and have fun! 

The responsability of turning the printed surface into finished articles resides on our local mom seamstresses that use their expertise and hands to carefully shape each of our products.
So far, we’ve already chosen three women (Doña Flor, Verónica and Maria Helena) to manufacture our first collection. Each of them will be in charge of bringing to live one specific product.


Mission
MONSHULS  creates design objects inspired by the unconditional love that characterizes our 
relationship with our pets. Our mission is to build a community of pet lovers through creative, original, striking and modern artwork that brings to life imagination and generates well-being.
Philosophy



That genuine love develops between humans and their pets.

That pets are part of our family.

That pets deserve care, respect and love.

That pet designs must provide pets with well-being. They must be functional, comfortable, safe and beautiful.

That our designs should generate positive emotions in both pets and humans

That pet lovers communicate through their lifestyle the love they feel for their best friends.

In transparency and honesty: with both our customers, suppliers and business allies.

In being respectful and fulfilling 

Vision

By 2020, MONSHULS  will have consolidated itself as the most recognized brand by pet lovers in Bogota, and will have begun to venture into other markets nationwide.
By 2025, MONSHULS  will be the most recognized brand nationally by pet lovers, and will have been able to enter the international market for its innovative value proposition.  





Whatever way or ways you choose to help MONSHULS, know that I will be forever grateful with you, and that by doing so, you’ve demonstrated yourself and the world, you are a truly and passionate GENUINE PET LOVER.

$25 - MONSHULS BANDANA DUO: una pañoleta para collar (para tu MONSHULS) + pañoleta clásica o un cuello multifuncional (para TI). No incluye el collar / tu escoges los diseños y la tallas.

$30 - JUST FOR MY MONSHULS: un collar para perro para consentir a tu MONSHULS favorito. Tu escoges el diseño y la talla.









$10 - MONSHULS TREAT: una pañoleta para collar para tu MONSHULS. No incluye el collar / tu escoges el diseño y la talla. < 28.5% menos del p.v.p. >

$40 - MONSHULS SET: un collar para perro + una correa para tu MONSHULS favorito. Tu escoges los diseños y las tallas. < Casi el 21% menos del p.v.p. >

$70 - GENUINE PET LOVER COMBO: un collar para perro + una correa (para tu MONSHULS) + una pañoleta para tu collar (para tu MONSHULS) + una pañoleta clásica o un cuello multifuncional (para TI). Tu escoges los diseños y las tallas. < Casi el 18% menos del p.v.p. >








$100 - MONSHULS LIMITED EDITION PHOTO FRAME: exclusivo para Indiegogo - edición limitada sólo para patrocinadores de un lindo portarretratos MONSHULS en madera mdf. Foto impresa de tu MONSHULS incluida.

$300 - YOUR MONSHULS, OUR MODEL: tu MONSHULS ilustrado como uno de nuestros modelos de marca (será parte de nuestra página web y nuestra musa inspiradora para una futura colección). También te mandaremos un póster de su imagen MONSHULS para que presumas de tu estrella. (41.7 x 52.6 cm / 16.4 x 20.7 in) El marco no está incluido.
Los nombres de todos nuestros patrocinadores se incluirá en un muro de agradecimiento en nuestra página web.









¡Hola! Soy MaJo y
soy una #genuinepetlover.
Después de años
de trabajar como freelancer en Italia y mi reciente regreso a mi país Colombia,
decidí lanzar mi propia marca: MONSHULS - for genuine pet lovers. Creo
firmemente que el color, los patrones y las texturas hacen nuestras vidas más
felices y nos ayudan a interactuar con nuestro entorno de forma más divertida y
agradable. Tengo siete MONSHULS que amo con toda mi alma y me sirven de constante inspiración para mi proyecto. 




¡Hola! Soy
Natalia,  una arquitecta recién graduada,
ansiosa por comenzar proyectos creativos que me inspiren y donde pueda unir la
mayoría de mis pasiones. Aunque en el momento no tengo ninguna mascota, puedo
decir que soy una #genuinepetlover. Pienso en ellas como compañeros, amigos e
integrantes importantes de las familias, que traen sólo felicidad y 
recuerdos para
toda la vida. Creo que las mascotas y el diseño son una muy buena combinación
que produce resultados inesperados que unen aún más a las personas y sus
animales. 
MONSHULS  ha sido una gran oportunidad para mí para
aprender, inspirarme y divertirme.

La
responsabilidad de convertir las superficies estampadas en artículos acabados reside
en nuestras costureras mujeres madres locales que utilizan su experiencia y
manos para cuidadosamente dar forma a cada uno de nuestros productos.
Hasta ahora, ya
hemos elegido tres mujeres (Doña Flor, Verónica y María Helena) para la
fabricación de nuestra primera colección. Cada una de ellas será la encargada
de materializar un tipo de producto específico.


MisiónEn MONSHULS  creamos objetos de diseño inspirados en el amor incondicional que caracteriza nuestra relación con las mascotas que nos acompañan. Nuestra misión es construir una 
comunidad de personas amantes de las mascotas a través de una propuesta gráfica creativa, original, llamativa y moderna que da vida a la imaginación y genera bienestar.
Filosofía
En MONSHULS creemos...


Que entre los humanos y sus mascotas se desarrollan vínculos de amor auténticos.
Que las mascotas hacen parte de nuestra familia.
Que las mascotas merecen cuidado, respeto y amor.
Que los diseños para mascotas deben brindarles bienestar, ser funcionales, cómodos y al mismo tiempo seguros y bonitos.
Que nuestros diseños deben generar emociones positivas en las mascotas y sus humanos.
Que las personas amantes de las mascotas comunican a través de su estilo de vida el amor que sientes por sus mejores amigos.
En ser honestos y transparentes con nuestros clientes tanto internos como externos.
En el respeto y el cumplimiento.

Visión

En el 2020, MONSHULS  se habrá consolidado en Bogotá como la marca más reconocida por las personas amantes de las mascotas y habrá empezado a incursionar en otros mercados a nivel nacional.
En el 2025, MONSHULS  será la marca más reconocida a nivel nacional por las personas amantes de las mascotas y habrá logrado incursionar en el mercado internacional por su propuesta de valor innovadora.




Cualquiera que se la forma o formas que escojas para ayudar a MONSHULS, quiero que sepas que te estaré por siempre agradecida, y que al hacerlo, le demuestras al mundo y a ti mismo que eres un verdadero y apasionado GENUINE PET LOVER.

story:
Hello everyone!  My name is Jaime Talbot and I'm the inventor and creator of It-Clipz.  I'm formally educated in the field of marketing and hold a day job as operations manager for a major bank's Visa rewards credit card travel program.  I have worked in corporate affairs for over 20 years.  I'm an entrepreneur at heart and always knew I would start a business or launch a product, so, here we are.

I'm 100% dedicated to the success of this product and know whole heartedly that it will hit the market running.  I'm beyond passionate about it.  I have overcome some very significant challenges in my life including severe postpartum depression and thyroid cancer - If these two roadblocks didn't stop me, nothing will! I am well, ready and able to make this thrive.

How did I come up with this idea?  Well, I was in Las Vegas last fall and while doing a lot of walking in high heels I decided to buy a pair of flat shoes to provide some immediate relief.  When I swapped my heels for flats, I was left with a very inconvenient problem: nowhere to put my heels.  So, I designed a clip.  It then evolved and ideas and purposes for It-Clipz began to flow like crazy.  Picture having It-Clipz attached to any and every back pack, handbag, bag or sport bag and using it to attach shoes, boots, hats, scarves, gloves - or any other small object for that matter.  The market is calling out for a product like It Clipz!

If you contribute to this campaign, your gift will bring this product to store shelves this year!  I have teamed up with a USA  based marketing firm with a product line already in major retail stores and online that fits the It-Clipz profile.  Together we will manufacture the product overseas, warehouse it in the USA and distribute to stores in both Canada and the USA.  It will also be available on line.  Production is very costly, especially the first run as tooling, moulds, art work and packaging needs to be designed and created.  YOU can help make this happen.

I need to raise approximately 5000.00 to match my 5000.00 contribution to make production a reality.  Even if I don't reach the full financial goal, I will MAKE THIS HAPPEN.  Every penny counts.

By contributing to my campaign, you will earn product as the reward!

I fully understand the risk involved within a venture such as this.  I am a skilled and assertive business woman with many years of experience.  I intend to overcome every roadblock and hurdle by using my persistence and determination combined with my extensive experience.  Anyone who knows me will tell you that I never quit.

I thank you very much for taking the time to read this campaign and I appreciate your support and confidence in me and my product.

Regards,

Jaime Talbot

story:
About KEZI and Plans for Growth

 

I’m Olivia Ashjian James, owner & designer of KEZI jewelry. Starting a business selling my designs is the beginning of a lifelong dream, combining my passions for art and fashion into one vision.

 

 

KEZI jewelry is handmade and designed by me in my studio located right outside of Boston. My business name, KEZI, is actually a word in Armenian meaning “for you”. My tagline—For You. Be You.—is exactly the mission of my work. I want women to feel free to be exactly who they are and to embrace themselves through my original designs.

 

 

As a self-taught jewelry maker and entrepreneur, I’ve done everything myself since starting KEZI a little over 2 years ago. I can’t tell you how many fairs, trunk shows, jewelry parties, and fashion shows I’ve done, let alone the hours of designing my e-commerce website, directing KEZI's photoshoots, being written up in online mags, creating a social media presence, and of course designing new jewelry!

It’s all been worth it and now my work has been accepted into two of the top juried American made trade shows in the country: the American Craft Retailers Expo (ACRE) and the American Craft Council (ACC).

Trade shows are key for unknown designers to get nationwide exposure. Store owners from across America come to these shows to stock their boutiques with new products. The opportunities are endless, but funds are not!

Booth fees for these shows are a couple thousand dollars each. On top of that, there’s the cost of hotel rooms, air fare, shipping products to shows, and marketing to potential retailers (essential with big shows like these—over 1,200 other exhibitors have booths!).

 

KEZI's trade show booth

 

I’ve made it 2 years with no extra funding and know these shows will unlock the future of KEZI. With your help, my designs will be accessible to women across America looking to express themselves, and I will be one step further down the road of my dreams. Your help is the key to KEZI’s growth!

 

Perks for KEZI:

$8,000 is the lowest amount needed to make these trade shows a reality. That money will go directly to the costs mentioned—booth fees, travel expenses, shipping, and marketing. These are the bare-minimum costs.

Raising more funds than that would be even better! If more money is raised, I can put on an even higher quality show and make the most out of these amazing opportunities.

That means:

—Better booth display, such as additional lighting, wood floors, shelving, and custom walls

—Banners showing close ups of KEZI jewelry to hang on walls

—Advertising in trade show buyer booklets (starting at $375 for 1/3 of a page)

—Brochures to give out to potential retailers so they can remember KEZI

—Making some designs in gold so KEZI can get into higher-end stores

 

Perks For YOU:

Getting KEZI jewelry out into the world is what this campaign is all about. That's why I've decided to make your donations have double the impact!! 

That means all KEZI everything!  Represent your support by wearing it or gifting it. Pick out something special just for you or get going on holiday shopping for someone you know will love KEZI! 

 

Choose from these perks:

                          ^ LATEST NECKLACE ^

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------

                               ^ Heart + Pouch ^

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------

                                 ^ GEO Earrings ^

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------

(light tone)

(dark tone)

                              ^ Cat's Eye Earrings ^

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------

                         ^ Playful Bubble Earrings ^

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------

 

                            ^ Pearl Bracelet ^

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------

                         ^  Mariposa Earrings ^

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------

                                    ^ KEZI Heart ^

 

 

And if not $8,000...

Even if I don't make it to my goal of $8,000 every extra dollar makes a huge difference!! The money will be used in the order of importance, starting with paying for the booths, then shipping & travel, and finally marketing. No matter what, all help will have a huge impact on being able to attend these shows and continue growing KEZI!

 

 

Remember...Everything is HAND MADE!

 

The exciting part of this campaign will be hand making all the items for your donations. I will be making and shipping items in the order they are received. This means the earliest donations will be made and shipped soonest, and those a few weeks into the campaign may have a longer wait time. I average a 1-2 week turn around for orders, however this will be the first time I handle bulk orders, so keep that in mind. Be assured, all orders WILL be filled before the holidays!

 

Can't afford to contribute?

That's ok! What you can do is share, share, share!!!

—Use the Indiegogo share tools!

—Share on Instagram, Facebook + Twitter

—Follow us @designbykezi.com

 

And when you can afford to...shop KEZI !!!

story:
Short Summary

We are a group of women volunteers changing our community and empowering our youth through Sports and Nutrition programs.  With the support of Siaya Basketball camp organisers and True Happiness Is Giing Society, we held the first Basketball Camp in the Rural area of Kenya (Siaya County) in August with the help of well-wishers and volunteers who supported us with balls, accomodation and at time transport with over 40 students attending for 5 days



What We Need & What You Get

We are looking for your support to raise  usd 3,500 to buy  SPORTS SHOES for High school students participating in our annnual camps and do not have the proper shoes for training.

We need Basic training shoes for each of the 100 students who attend the camps with a pair costing usd 35.


For every pair usd 30 Donated, we will send a signed Thank you card signed bu individual student and the volunteer trainers.

We will also send regular updates on the camps and all donors or well wishers are encouraged to try attend at least one camp either during the August Holidays which will always be held outside the Capital City.

Any extra will go into buying more shoes as our stretch target is 500 pairs (20 pairs each for 25 schools). Should we not reach our target we will buy and distribute equivalent to what we will have received

The Impact

The camps aim to challenge and motivate the youth and also give them forum to interact and exchange ideas with their peers and with experienced and qualified professionals. In particular:-

  • The students are exposed to training and techniques from qualified volunteer trainers both by KBF/FIBA
  • Motivational talks by different speakers on issues affecting the youth.
  • Students from different schools get a forum to interact and exchange ideas besides competing
  • Exposure to opportunities for Scholarship both Nationally and abroad for exceptional talent both academically and in sports.


Other Ways You Can Help

You can also help by sharing with your friends, communities, religious organizations to support and contribute.
You can also help us collect actual shoes and ship to us (For shipping details email: Rachel at Truehappinessisgiving@hotmail.com)

https://www.facebook.com/pages/SIAYA-Basketball-Camp
https://www.facebook.com/HappinessIsGiving
https://twitter.com/THisgiving

Please visit our page and share via indiegogo tools to create more support and visibility for our campaign!

#indiegogo

story:
This goes beyond self-driving cars. And it’s more than a simple sensor-network: This is the era of smart mobility — an Internet of Vehicles.

 1, Mobile remote security

 2, positioning & search parked car

 3, OBD2 remote diagnostic

 4, Trajectory Analysis for Driving

 5, Clear the ‘Check Engine’ light, and investigate its cause

 6, Emergency relief

 7, Energy conservation

 8, Collision notice

 9, Monitor kid’s speed

 It will protect your car from being stolen. If the alarm system is trigger while armed, Lobox will sent an alert message to your phone

 Help you find your car in the parking lot by Built-in Vehicle Positioning System. See a parking map in the app.

 If the occurrence of rollover accidents, LOBOX will inform your loved one, and located your accident.

 You don't have to worry about the kids speeding with your car, since your APP will notify you.

Check engine light and fix it by yourself. Decode engine problems like a pro.

 You’ll see a route map with distance, time, MPG, and the cost of gas for every trip you take.

Improve your driving with real-time feedback. Fuel saving. 

 LOBOX With OBD2, you can use your phone or tablet as a diagnostic scan tool and trip computer.

 3 color options




  1, Compatible apps

  2, Intelligent sleep mode

  3, The most stable quality

  4, Firmware upgrade by yourself

  5, Easy setup, 100% plug & play

Most smart phone with GSM, CDMA. iOS and Android.

 iPhone 3,4,5, 5C, 5S, 6, 6+ 

 Samsung 

 HTC 

  Sony 
  Google 

  LG 

     And so on Android

LOBOX complies with the OBDII protocol just like the vehicle manufacturers have to.

LOBOX is privacy friendly. We figured that if you, the driver, wanted that feature you’d give us permission to track your location via your smart phone (which is already being tracked). If you give us permission, then we can add in automatic location tagging, map views and various other location based features. If you don’t, we can’t. You’re the boss.

We use best in class security.

All data to and from the phone and server is encrypted over SSL.

Firmware updates are encrypted.

Device-to-phone communication employs secure encrypted BLE (with pin code protection).

It’s very simple - you own your data. We do use anonymize data to run reports on safety and efficiency across the entire 'fleet' and to compare car models for environmental awesomeness. We do NOT look at individual drivers. We don’t sell personalised data.




We focus on automotive electronics for more than 8 years. Our clients all over the world. LOBOX, it took us 2 years to develop it, is a successful product after many tests. In the future, we will recruit agents worldwide.

story:
Enter The New FLOW2PLUG

A new simple, affordable and truly smart anti-flood                                           plug  

This will flood-proof and make your home safer in a truly remarkable way.launched on IndieGogo, we’re excited to be working on producing the first batch of this great product making it available to you here before it enters the general market. Designed to fit any standard sink , it comes in four colors – blue, yellow, red and black –, to allow you to easily match it with your decoration style. It looks good and works extremely efficient at removing any danger .


move image


                               View of Flow2 in the sink and how cool it looks.

    Make Your Place Flood-Safe

Get the simple, affordable, smart and innovative device that will keep your sinks flood-proof and your home safe.

We all know how it is. As much as we may try to keep our house safe and neat, we all get distracted every now and then – and, especially children left alone in the bathroom or perhaps senior citizens  who may have some memory loss issues, chances are distractions will happen more often than not.

 

                                       Mechanism in closed position 


           SHARE OUR STORY.

        Sharing is simple and means the world to us!

 Please post links or comments to our campaign anywhere on the web (i.e. our website, Facebook, twitter, etc). Please share with anyone you know that might be interested in our product. When you share our story it is extremely valuable to the future of our product and we are extremely grateful. We want to create the best product available for our community and most importantly YOU our backer.


                                   Mechanism in open position


     
          Housing unit for Flow2 plug will come in four great colors

 

                                  Prototype Flow2plug on test


       




                       FLOW2PLUG

A turn of a screw sets the safe level of water you want in your sink

An entirely adjustable device which allows you to adjust the maximum amount of water in your sink, setting it so that, when the maximum level of water is reached, the mechanism will automatically flip-open and allow the water to safely drain away,even if for some reason you or someone in your house gets distracted, you will not have to deal with the hassle or the danger of a flood.

     

                   FLOW2PLUG
     No plumbing No mess No worries

Unlike other far more expensive anti-flood devices costing hundreds of pounds,  It doesn't  have to be plumbed in to the sink, it's totally mobile, if you move house you simply take it with you and set it to the level you require for you new sink.   

         

                   FLOW2PLUG

 Hotels,Apartments, Hospitals, 

Care-homes

Suitable not only for family homes but also for hotels, apartments, offices, and for care facilities where it would help people to lead a more independent and safer lifestyle , and for so many other cases where it can be a simple solution for a potentially very serious problem.

                           FAQ

I can't get my payment to work in Paypal, what should I do 

Email the Indiegogo Customer Happiness Team at support@indiegogo.com. They'll be able to track your transaction and help with any issues.

Do I need to add the cost of shipping to my pledge?

Yes, for all destinations, please add the amount specified in the description. Local import taxes may apply.

What if you fail to reach the funding target?

We appreciate every dollar of support we receive during the campaign, and every backer will be welcomed into the Flow Right community. If we don't reach out target then we will focus on other means to produce the product and bring them to market. 

What warranties apply to the Flow Right?

A standard manufacturer warranty will apply. If you are not happy with the product, you may return it within 28 days of receiving it for a full refund. Please note, Flow Right cannot cover the cost of the return postage and packaging. 

What if I have a question about the campaign?

We are happy to respond to any other questions you might have about our company, the indiegogo campaign, and or product! Email us!

       RISKS AND CHALLENGES
Every project could face obstacles and ours is no different. Setback's might include the production of the product. Ensuring we have the products manufactured correctly and delivered to you will be our top priority.
We will continue to keep our backer community updated and aware of project status throughout the process. We will work hard to follow through on making this the best indiegogo that you have ever supported. We value your contribution to helping us make this project a reality and we will deliver a reward that proves it.

story:
About the project:

During the day, the customer can feel the uniqueness, and during the night, it will reveal what it's been hiding all along. So, Turn Off The Lights.....!


The first step to the new brand, White Peacock, is in the form of an original T-shirt, which will transform you into a shining star!

T-Shirt - Stars Sky - Light ON

The super comfortable T-shirt is unique in design and style. It's groovy design is custom made for each individual and feels super soft on the skin. 

But during the night, is when the magic happens.......

Front Page


Backhand


Turn Off The Lights! 

TOTL! effect will be achieved by adding the different fluorescent colors that absorbs the light and re-emit light once the lights are turned off. 

  1. Long lasting effect
  2. High visibility

TOTL! - Front Page


TOTL! Effect Backhand

Please support the production of the T-shirt by contributing a small amount of money in the form of 35€ and I will send you your own unique T-shirt straight after production! Don't forget to add your size and your star sign in the order.

Sizes: S, M, L, XL

The amount of T-shirts are limited! The White Peacock Star Sky model consist of only 12 original T's and this is available for printing in 4 different sizes. Each individual will have his/her own customised, original T-shirt!

Contribute Now

BTW: I don’t count those, who will help with creation of galactic brand White Peacock. To them, I will send the t-shirt also with a small personal gift. After finishing the collection will be on sale only 48 t-shirts 12 stars sign x 4 T-shirt size. One T-shirt will cost 95USD.

More planned models in gallery ;)

Description of the product, production and delivery 

T-shirts will be made in the best European factories. Material and production will under supervision of strict quality control and fabrication. At first the material will be printed by the adding of fluorescent colors, which enables the hidden powers of space and the 'turn of the light' effect. The print will have to go through the quality control by means of washing and crumpling it in order to last through years of wear and tear. 


Once we have printed the material to the desired quality, the T's will be produced from it. Furthermore, the adding of labels, pockets and all the original features of the brand, White Peacock. Completed T's will be controlled and packed into a unique container shaped like a planet corresponding to the particular star sign. These packed T's will be shipped off to the warehouses of Amazon from where they will be distributed to their proud owners.

Risks and challenges: 

It's the start of a brand new collection called the White Peacock and I am aware that it won't be easy. Therefore, I have chosen to start with only one T-shirt. The aim is to make it as good a possible, keeping in mind the costs and production satisfaction.

Usage of UV colors will be a challenge in regards to production and quality. I will distribute the T's to the whole world, so it will be very important to solve the logistic and commercial conditions. However, I am thoroughly prepared and ready for every milestone ahead.

Risks:

  • Not enough money collected - might have to look for an investor to fund the project.
  • Price vs. quality - 3 pre-selected manufacturers in Europe are chosen for comparison of prices and quality.
  • UV colors and printing quality - each T will go through a quality control process.
  • Shipping globally with commercial conditions - Cooperating with Amazon.com

Objectives:

  • Launch of the project
  • Collection of financial aid
  • Production of the first set/collection of T-shirts in their different sizes (12 X 4 = 48)
  • Selling point
  • Packaging in form of planets 
  • Delivery of the T's 
  • Production of a new collection
Read White Peacock story on my site Rednaxela.sk 

Please support the production of the T-shirts by contributing a small amount of money in the form of 10€ and I will send you your own unique T-shirt straight after production! Don't forget to add your size and your star sign in the order.

Sizes: S, M, L, XL

The amount of T-shirts are limited! The White Peacock collection consist of only 12 original T's and this is available for printing in 4 different sizes. Each individual will have his/her own customised, original T-shirt!

This is just the beginning...

Thanks for everything  

Džin Rednaxela O.

story:
Built to last. Bound for life.

Help kickstart the production of the very first Men's and Travel Collection, featuring:

  • Wallet
  • Dopp kit (toiletry bag)
  • Laptop bag
  • Dolyn Duffel
 

 

We have partnered with a factory in New Jersey that will be helping with the sampling and production runs of the new duffels, dopp kit, laptop bag and wallet. This will allow us to take the items to market this Spring, making the products available to buyers on an international platform. 

If you would like to join us in our endeavor, we would be so honored to have your support.

story:
Short Summary

I create jewelry featuring Roman and Victorian coins. Most Roman coins are delivered dirty. I clean them with water, oil and dental picks over days, weeks and even months. Prepared coins are placed into settings or wrapped in wire, then hung from unique creations of beads and chain.

No coins are harmed in the making of this jewelry! I'm a historian. Drilling holes in ancient coins makes me sad.

What I Need

The $3000 goal will fund several things:

  • Coin and jewelry supplies, including materials to produce some higher high end pieces through the use of more expensive coins
  • A 10'x10' canopy for street fairs, which is often required
  • Booth fees at street fairs and conventions, which can easily run $200/weekend. My goal is at least ten events this year, hopefully more.
  • Travel and lodging for out of town events

If the campaign doesn't reach its goal, plans will be scaled back in accordance with the money contributed. All money will go directly to the improvement of the business.

 

What You Get

Contributors of $10 will receive a historical coin, with a choice of Roman or Victorian.

Contributors of at least $25 will receive a piece of jewelry featuring a genuine Roman or Victorian coin, with a choice of antique brass or silver finish.

I will work with contributors of $100 or more to design a unique piece for them.

All contributors of at least $10 will receive a handwritten thank you card and email updates regarding my progress.

All coins are 16mm to 20 mm unless otherwise indicated.

 

Risks & Challenges

Finding the right venues will be the biggest challenge. I'm beginning with a variety of steampunk events. The Victorian coins should be particularly attractive there, and attendees have a good appreciation for history. They can form my initial base of customers.

I am also in the process of seeking out and applying to suitable art fairs.

Finding affordable suppliers is a challenge for every business. I have identified several which suit my needs nicely, and I am always on the lookout for new sources of material.

Finally, there is the basic challenge of getting my name and my products known. Conventions and art fairs are a major facet of this. An Etsy site provides an online component. But you are also an important part in this. Every time you share this campaign I gain more promotion.

 

Ways You Can Help

This project is important to me, and I appreciate any help offered. If you're not interested in donating, please tell other people about both my shop at remintedjewelry.etsy.com and this Indiegogo campaign. You can even use the "share" button Indiegogo offers!

story:
Summary

Its been almost a year since we launched the Exoband v1.0 which instantly resonated with the dire requirement in the market for a product like this. From Bike taxis to delivery companies everybody wanted an Exoband. We managed to sell over 2000 units in a quick period and then we got suggestions from these places on how to make this product even more awesome.

 

So…  

We're very excited to announce  Exoband 2.0!With better quality and new design you are sure to love this exciting new update.

We’ve redesigned the holders to accommodate phones with thicker phone cases plus an additional pocket has been added behind the Exoband to accommodate cash, card, keys etc.

 

Additionally,

  • Can hold phone size from 4.3 inches to 6 inches .
  • Direct access to touch screen controls
  • It’s made of strong nylon elastic.
  • Clamps are made of hard polyethylene. high density hook & loop.
  • Water resistant neoprene which has the property of elasticity.

 

You no more have pay for expensive fitbits or smart watch. You can convert your smart phone to smart watch for a reasonable cost.

 

 

Exoband convenience factor

  • Bikers to navigate while riding bike.

  • Cyclist & checking the distance traveled.

  • Joggers, can easily change music & check the calories burned.

  • Easy to trek & travel hands free.

  • Makes it easy & convenient to play PokemonGo :D

Since a pocket is added to the Exoband you don’t have to carry your wallet anymore. No hassle of searching for your phone in your pocket. Its always right with you.

 

 

Risks and challenges

If the Exoband is successfully funded we are extremely confident we will be able to produce the Band and have it to backers by this Sept 2017. All parties involved from material wholesalers, manufacturing company, etc. are ready to go. The funds raised are going directly into the production/manufacturing of the Band. Though we do not see any direct risks, there is always unforeseen circumstances that may present themselves during production. However it is our #1 goal to get you a quality Band you are excited about, and we will do all in our power to make that happen.

story:
There is nothing like Kotto Jamz© lounge wear on the market and over the past year, we have been working tirelessly perfecting our product and getting everything ready to go. From prototypes to manufacturers, were all set!

Now here is where you come in. We want you to join our team and with your help we can raise the money needed to go into full production. Not only will you be getting the most comfortable lounge wear for your family, but you will be helping us donate pairs of Kotto Jamz© to kids in foster care transition here in Nashville locally and one day around the country. We look forward to you joining our team!

Your contribution will help us reach our goal to raise $50,000. This funding will be used to produce our initial three lines of Kotto Jamz© in multiple sizes as well as single pants, shirts, and light-weight hoodies that you can mix and match to create your own unique designs.  With your contributions, you will be the first people in the world to own Kotto Jamz© and your kids will enjoy unbelievable comfort and softness.

The impact that your contributions have on Kotto Jamz© goes much farther than producing the most comfortable kid's lounge wear on the market, but it will also be touching the hearts of kids throughout middle Tennessee. A portion of all the contributions we receive will be donated to foster kids in transition. Many of these kids make the foster care transition without having something comfortable to lounge or sleep in. We hope a set of Kotto Jamz© will add a little comfort in their new-found homes.

 If your unable to donate, we understand, but you can still help us take flight by passing on our information to your Facebook page or any of your social media networks. Please let your friends, family, and churches know about Kotto Jamz©.

Also, if you know of charities that can use our donations we want to hear about them too! Thank you for your support!

 

Here are the available sets offered as perks during our campaign!

Many of these kids make the foster care transition without having something comfortable to lounge or sleep in. We hope a set of Kotto Jamz© will add a little comfort in their new-found homes. If your unable to donate, we understand, but you can still help us take flight by passing on our information to your Facebook page or any of your social media networks. Please let your friends, family, and churches know about Kotto Jamz©.Also, if you know of charities that can use our donations we want to hear about them too! Thank you for your support! Here are the available sets offered as perks during our campaign!

story:
Who are we?

As a Business:

Ma(i)de is a business venture that exists to re​-​imagine and re-​position the unique and powerful value of domestic workers in South Africa, while expanding their scope of opportunity.  1 in 5 women in South Africa are domestic workers, and as they run 2 households, they affect 1/7 of all of the households in the country, making their scope of influence the widest and most diverse.

 

As a Foundation:

Ma(i)de is in the process of finalizing our NGO segment of the company, called the Ma(i)de Foundation. It will hold donor funds for the benefit of domestic workers and their immediate family members in order to enable access to funds, literacy and to build wealth practice, which is to save and invest and to have financial literacy. The Ma(i)de Foundation is the first fund of its kind that aims to actively tackle the inter-generational poverty among the minimum wage earners of the country.

Of all of the profits that Ma(i)de generates, 50% of it will go into the Foundation in order to build a sustainable source of funding.

On the board is sit us as the Directors; as well as key financial, legal and business experts.

 

As People:

My name is Tuliza and I am an architect and lecturer at the University of Johannesburg. I am a determined 27 year old who loves to find ways to design sustainable systems that create mutual benefit and shared opportunity, or at least when I’m not making music or teaching. I’ve realized the power in designing the systems that influence space, rather than space itself, and, together with my Co-Founder Mbali, saw that to redesign the domestic worker industry would be to affect the country's most important and powerful socio-economic influencer, which could lead to profound shifts in major sectors and scales of society.

My Co-Founder Mbali, is also 27 and a graduate of GIBS Business School and a former African Leadership Academy (ALA) staff member. She became an au pair while on a writing sabbatical. It is there that she experienced stigma, while developing strong bonds with domestic workers. It moved her to want to help them reclaim their story. On most days, Mbali is fascinated by the idiosyncrasies of human life and thinks anything ‘neo’ is a bit of a sham.

 

Why a uniform project?

Simply put, we can sum up the uniform as the material embodiment of all of the shame and insignificance associated with a domestic worker’s job. Here is some of what they have said about the uniform in the many interviews that we have had with them:

"I feel like the uniform carries all of the shame and insignificance associated with the work I do."


"When you wear this uniform you lose your voice. Wherever you go you do not receive the same service and treatment as others do."


"Sometimes your children are ashamed to be seen with you, and other times a man will not court you publicly. Both are afraid of what the uniform will say about them."

 

We’ve probably all experienced how our day can be ruined if we feel that we look bad. It can make us lose confidence, it can affect how people see and treat us and it can even affect our productivity. Now if that can happen with the clothes that we choose to wear, imagine what would happen with clothes that we couldn’t choose, that you’d have to wear every day, that makes you feel judged, undermined, devalued and unseen by everyone; even your family members?

Think about it in this way: would you wear a domestic worker uniform?

The domestic worker uniform has defined them so much that those that know nothing about them assume their class, their education level, their community, etc., which are things that they don’t necessarily want defining them, because after all, we are not our jobs.

We use uniforms to be a part of a collective identity, hopefully one that every member in that collective can be proud of. What then does the uniform about the domestic worker collective say to us and to them: is it a uniform that can inspire pride?

To be clear: The issue is not that they have to wear a uniform; most prefer it because it protects their clothes. Many feel, that besides sometimes not being offered the opportunity to choose what they want to wear, there aren’t many options, and those options are often generic sizes that say nothing about their unique personalities; making them all look the same and treated like they are the same.

 

Why this uniform?

We facilitated the redesign of the uniform under the careful guide of the Fashion Department lecturing staff. The students explored image, as well as durability, flexibility and identity under the concept of ‘enclothed cognition’, which is clothing’s ability to influence a person’s mental functions in relation to what they feel they represent in the outfit. It explains why you have a bad day when you feel bad about how you look.

This new uniform is a balance between a uniform and personal clothing. Its secret is in its flexibility. The uniform is either a dress or an apron.

The zip-up, zip-down flexibility lets you very quickly change your entire appearance. The flexible waist belt allows different sized women to tailor how much the waist hugs their body or frames them loosely and it adjusts to a pregnant belly with ease. When zipped up, it is an apron that protects your personal clothes underneath, while at the same time, showcases your personal choice of style. When zipped down, it becomes its own full garment, a synced dress that compliments the female form.

Our extensive research, studies and interviews have put us in the best position to understand the potential success of this uniform, from the horse’s mouth.

All of the domestic workers that we have interviewed have told us how they would never step foot in a restaurant with their uniform, because of how ashamed and judged they would feel. This design has not only managed to have them wear it in public, but to also model it in those environments with such pride. One of the domestic workers, Clemmy van Eyssen, can be quoted as saying:

“Wow, I could just quickly change my shoes and go to a wedding in this, that is how different it becomes. I think it is so beautiful. I feel beautiful in it, and in control.”

A lack of confidence and pride and an increase in judgement and shame leads to a decreased level of performance and productivity and increases levels of physical illness, tardiness and apathy. The trickle-down effects of that are huge, as they sustain households and allow the workforce to continue, less strained than we would otherwise be.

What you wear has powerful implications; our domestic workers show us that.

 

Who will receive these uniforms and what are the risk factors?

There is very little risk to this project, as any amount in increments of R385  or $29 will provide a new uniform.

The money will go into our company’s Foundation, a protected NGO that is in the process of being finalized, so that nothing can be done with the funds except what it has explicitly been assigned for, which is the provision of 3000 uniforms. For the moment, the money pledged will go into Ma(i)de’s existing business account and overseen by the company’s CFO, Nikki Gajoo, until the NGO paperwork is finalized. We will share those details with you as soon as it is finalized, along with our registration number. We are racing against time to get the uniform line ready in time for the September launch.

Our project manager and head manufacturer, Christine Muchingami is ready with her team to get the uniforms done. She is a fashion designer and domestic worker, and as you can imagine, is personally invested in making this happen.

The University of Johannesburg’s Graphics Design Department will be approached to design incredible packaging for the uniforms and once done, we will contact the networks that we are in partnership with, such as the 26 suburbs in Johannesburg that works with our Domestic Watch network founder Penny Steyn to help distribute the uniforms in the lessons that they conduct with the suburbs' domestic workers.

We are also in conversation with companies like SweepSouth to have their app network receive and market the uniforms.

As it is not one solid body of 3000 domestic workers who are waiting in anticipation for a large delivery, it gives us room to deliver smaller amounts to smaller networks! This is why, every amount counts, because it can influence one network at a time.

 

Why us to bring this to life?

With a design that has undergone a rigorous process and is ready to go to market, we are ready with a team to get the work done. As a practicing project architect, with success in bringing huge urban design and architecture skyscraper projects to life, you might know that it is no small feat. to bring to life a design that is both beautiful and meets all of your needs. This product does, and as any good design project, it deserves to come to life with the same rigour and care as any large project would be offered, to ensure its success.

Mbali, with a skilled capacity to bring large and often impossible projects to life, will also help oversee the success of the process till the September launch date.

We are not domestic workers, but we are certainly invested in them and all that their presence has to offer to the progress of our society. It is with that strong belief and value system that we've dedicated our careers to shifting the nature of their industry entirely and we won't rest until it happens. 

 

What will your money be used for?

Here is a breakdown of what you can expect to have done with your money:

  1. material costs, incl. clothes labels: R319 000 or $23 422
  2. material delivery: R700 or $52
  3. manufacturing costs: R 1 155 000 or $84 803
  4. Labour costs: R67 500 or $4 956 for 3 months
  5. Packaging  and graphic design costs: R150 000 or $11 014
  6. Final garment delivery costs: R240 000 or $17 622
  7. TOTAL: R1 932 200 or $141 867

 

How far can your money go?

For R385 or $29 (the price of 3 orders of Chicken McNuggets at McDonalds), you can dramatically shift one person’s perception of themselves, how much choice and control they feel they have and how much potential they feel that they can realize. That is how much it costs to bring one uniform to life. The reward is not comparable to the price.

For this reason, we have chosen flexible funding; because just one of your pledges can go a long way into getting this into the market.

 

What can you get out of it?

The greatest investment that you are making is in someone’s psychological well-being, but that doesn’t mean you don’t deserve to be rewarded for it; in fact you all the more deserve it.

To invest in the well-being of the person who allows the economy to run smoothly alongside your family’s well-being is to invest in your time and sanity in a society so conducive to stress. For someone to have to wear something that makes them feel ashamed and judged everyday, especially when filling such a powerful role, affects everyday performance and happiness and can, in turn, affect everything around them, including you. To contribute to a domestic worker’s well-being is to contribute to your own and sustain a more balanced middle class workforce.

You know there is more, and here is how else you can benefit:

  1. For $100, you will receive a special thank you on our Cliff Central radio show.
  2. For $300, you will receive an interview on our Cliff Central radio show (we can have telephonic interview if you do not live in Johannesburg).
  3. For $500, you will have a uniform delivered to you and a special thank you will be given on our Cliff Central radio show.
  4. For 1000 uniforms funded, which is R644 067 or $47 289, your name/brand will be printed on the packaging of the uniform for the 3000 units as well as when they go into nationwide stores. Your brand will be publicized in 1/7 of South Africa’s households as one that invests in the goodness of everyone’s well-being.
  5. For 2000 units funded, which is R1 288 134 or $94 578, your name/brand will be printed on the tag of the uniform for the 3000 units as well as when they go into nationwide stores. Your brand will be publicized in 1/7 of South Africa’s households as one that invests in the goodness of everyone’s well-being.

 

Why are we grateful?

With each part of bringing this project to life, we have been invited into spaces that are not ours. The many domestic workers that we have interviewed have let us into their most vulnerable spaces, the University of Johannesburg has let us into their curriculum and now you are taking the time to see that this project comes to life. We want to thank you, not just for investing it its success, but for also entertaining the important and sometimes difficult discussions on it. This is a gift to our democracy, a symbol of how we will always do better and be better. This is us.

So tell others about it, ask them and others questions about it and ask you domestic worker about; and while you do that, make sure to pledge and share! 

 

So, let’s talk.

 

If you liked the video, edited and produced by Orange Groove; you can contact the Founder, Justin, on +27 82 504 9771.
