story:
HISTORY

STORMGARD is a British company that was established in 1921 by Mr. A. Whyman in Leeds, England. As a rainwear manufacturer, the name STORMGARD soon became synonymous with specialised fabrics such as enamelled oilskins that were hugely popular with the cyclist and especially the motorcycling community. A decade later, in 1931 STORMGARD began producing specialised clothing for the Air Ministry; most notably, flight suits.

In the late 1930s, Whyman moved his premises from Leeds to a new industrial estate in Gateshead, occupying the Stormgard Works (inspiration for the new domain name) at Team Valley through the Second World War. In 1947, at a trade fair in Earls Court London, the company advertised itself as STORMGARD Guaranteed Weatherwear. Manufacturers of Raincoats, Waterproofs, Sportswear, Leather Clothing, Suits, Overcoats, Golf Jackets, Flannel Trousers, Sports Jackets, Motor Cycle and Motor Clothing. Having probably over-extended its operations, A. Whyman was bankrupt in 1953 and STORMGARD was lost. Until now.

RELAUNCH

With a background in marketing for British heritage brands, I discovered STORMGARD late 2015 whilst researching historical manufacturing companies on a train journey to Leeds. I had co-founded another British brand called Hancock in 2012, a company that I am a part of today and has enjoyed tremendous success over the last 5-years collaborating with Missoni, Converse and other like-minded partners. I had been thinking of creating something new whilst fantasising about the idea of discovering something old, with an incredible back story that no-one really knew existed; the Holy Grail of clothing brands! There wasn't a ton of information about the company online and most of what I found came from a book written by Katrina Honeyman titled "Well Suited: A History of the Leeds Clothing Industry, 1850-1990". Reading about the company, I knew that this was something special and looked into any current links to the brand, finding nothing. Once I had registered the trademark, I began collecting vintage STORMGARD print ads, product brochures, original coats and enamel motorcycle pins. What I discovered was that every product had a model number (something I could use in the new line) and that STORMGARD even had it's own motorcycle club called 'Ye Ancient Order of Neverwets'.

Working closely with designers and production facilities for the last 10-years, I understand the importance of materials and craftsmanship. I knew I wanted to contemporarise the product and that I had to find factories in the UK that could make to a globally, high standard. I began looking at fabrics for something specialised as a 21st century alternative to enamelled oilskins and found a mill in Japan that produces high-density fabrics with performance qualities, eg. natural, lightweight, water repellent, UV repellent and shape retention. Next, I developed a simple overcoat design that with this new Japanese fabric could be worn anytime of the year in any city in the world. I like design that is "super normal", not overly tricked out, just paired down perfectly, finding the right balance between form and function. The result is the first product to be made by STORMGARD in over 60-years;  a reissue of the original Model 214 Raincoat as featured in their original 1930s catalogue. With another nod to the history of the company, the military clothing contracts are referenced in the garments super lightweight, ripstop camouflage lining.

Every STORMGARD Model 214 Raincoat is made at a tailoring facility in North London that also manufactures for Savile Row. British manufacturing was at the heart of the company history and is a philosophy that will continue into the future.

So, finally I'm ready to push the button and go live, but I need your help. It's important to me that I don't take on partners in the business at this stage so that I can control the product - design, quality, provenance and especially, price. I want a modern, easy-to-wear product for myself that comes from an aspirational brand with an interesting story at a price that's affordable. For now, the product will sell direct-to-consumer via the website to keep the price where it should be. Other brands selling a British made product can retail between £300-500, although the cost to make is more or less the same. With your help, and the power of crowdfunding, I can bring this glorious brand back to life and celebrate the history of the company while bringing a luxury product to the world at a price that isn't going to break the bank.

The STORMGARD Model 214 Raincoat is available in Beige and/or Navy. The cut of the garment is oversized so that it drapes nicely on the body and is an ideal overcoat to layer with suit jackets, heavy sweaters in the winter or over a t-shirt in the summer. This modern cut is tailored to suit most frames and whilst this is essentially a mens coat can look equally as cool on a woman! Sizes are Small through to X-Large and a full measurement chart will be available to customers before orders are processed at the factory so that you can ensure the size and fit is right for you.

RISKS & CHALLENGES

I have taken every step to ensure that the fabric has the absolute highest performance quality and that the finish of the garment from the cutting to the stitching is at a standard befitting a luxury brand. I am working with one of the best mills in Japan and arguably one of the best tailoring houses in the UK. All my supply chains are set-up and ready to go, so that orders can be placed as soon as this campaign ends. March 2017 is a realistic delivery date but lead-times can change with suppliers if their production schedule alters. In this event, I will update customers every step of the way to ensure complete transparency and to manage your expectations as well as keeping you all involved in all things STORMGARD related.

I also appreciate that size matters (!) Whilst every attempt will be made to ensure that you have all the information you require to inform your purchase, should your garment not fit you in exactly the way you want, or you have any other issues with your purchase, then I will be happy to refund your purchase provided the garment is returned to me at your cost and in like-for-like condition. I want you to LOVE your STORMGARD raincoat as much as I do :)

Reading about the company, I knew that this was something special and looked into any current links to the brand, finding nothing. Once I had registered the trademark, I began collecting vintage STORMGARD print ads, product brochures, original coats and enamel motorcycle pins. What I discovered was that every product had a model number (something I could use in the new line) and that STORMGARD even had it's own motorcycle club called 'Ye Ancient Order of Neverwets'.
Working closely with designers and production facilities for the last 10-years, I understand the importance of materials and craftsmanship. I knew I wanted to contemporarise the product and that I had to find factories in the UK that could make to a globally, high standard. I began looking at fabrics for something specialised as a 21st century alternative to enamelled oilskins and found a mill in Japan that produces high-density fabrics with performance qualities, eg. natural, lightweight, water repellent, UV repellent and shape retention. Next, I developed a simple overcoat design that with this new Japanese fabric could be worn anytime of the year in any city in the world. I like design that is "super normal", not overly tricked out, just paired down perfectly, finding the right balance between form and function. The result is the first product to be made by STORMGARD in over 60-years;  a reissue of the original Model 214 Raincoat as featured in their original 1930s catalogue. With another nod to the history of the company, the military clothing contracts are referenced in the garments super lightweight, ripstop camouflage lining.
Every STORMGARD Model 214 Raincoat is made at a tailoring facility in North London that also manufactures for Savile Row. British manufacturing was at the heart of the company history and is a philosophy that will continue into the future.
So, finally I'm ready to push the button and go live, but I need your help. It's important to me that I don't take on partners in the business at this stage so that I can control the product - design, quality, provenance and especially, price. I want a modern, easy-to-wear product for myself that comes from an aspirational brand with an interesting story at a price that's affordable. For now, the product will sell direct-to-consumer via the website to keep the price where it should be. Other brands selling a British made product can retail between £300-500, although the cost to make is more or less the same. With your help, and the power of crowdfunding, I can bring this glorious brand back to life and celebrate the history of the company while bringing a luxury product to the world at a price that isn't going to break the bank.
The STORMGARD Model 214 Raincoat is available in Beige and/or Navy. The cut of the garment is oversized so that it drapes nicely on the body and is an ideal overcoat to layer with suit jackets, heavy sweaters in the winter or over a t-shirt in the summer. This modern cut is tailored to suit most frames and whilst this is essentially a mens coat can look equally as cool on a woman! Sizes are Small through to X-Large and a full measurement chart will be available to customers before orders are processed at the factory so that you can ensure the size and fit is right for you.
RISKS & CHALLENGES
I have taken every step to ensure that the fabric has the absolute highest performance quality and that the finish of the garment from the cutting to the stitching is at a standard befitting a luxury brand. I am working with one of the best mills in Japan and arguably one of the best tailoring houses in the UK. All my supply chains are set-up and ready to go, so that orders can be placed as soon as this campaign ends. March 2017 is a realistic delivery date but lead-times can change with suppliers if their production schedule alters. In this event, I will update customers every step of the way to ensure complete transparency and to manage your expectations as well as keeping you all involved in all things STORMGARD related.
I also appreciate that size matters (!) Whilst every attempt will be made to ensure that you have all the information you require to inform your purchase, should your garment not fit you in exactly the way you want, or you have any other issues with your purchase, then I will be happy to refund your purchase provided the garment is returned to me at your cost and in like-for-like condition. I want you to LOVE your STORMGARD raincoat as much as I do :)

story:
Jennifer Rothwell wants to reignite the Celtic Revival (also know as the Celtic Twilight) of the 19th and 20th century and bring it to the 21st Century to change the face of fashion. A pioneer of Irish manufacturing, Jennifer wants to use her vivid prints to recreate the Celtic Twilight and bring it to a new audience. 

Jennifer's clothes are both designed and manufactured in the heart of Dublin and are aimed for tasteful men and women who want timeless, dramatic designs that make the wearer feel positive. We want to be able to create clothes that represent art and culture, mixing the contemporary with the classic!

Jennifer Rothwell wants to reignite the arts movement of the 20th Century; 100 years later. 

With your support Jennifer Rothwell will:

  • Be able to purchase fabric to create new innovate and creative works of Art 

  • Help reignite the Celtic Arts movement in the 21st century   

  • Uphold local to local, ethically made fashion with a low carbon footprint

  • Create employment in the fashion manufacturing and design sector 

Jennifer Rothwell has already created a number of timeless collections:

Harry Clarke Print Collection Series One​:

From Jennifer's Harry Clarke Print Collection Series One, this print is inspired by the vivid colours from the stained glass windows made by Irish Artist Harry Clarke; married with Fairy Folklore Mythology.

Jennifer was drawn to The Eve of St Agnes stained glass panels’ and it's use of vibrant purples, blues, oranges and reds. Inspired by the English poet John Keats, the panels tell the romantic story of two lovers escaping to be together on a cold windy stormy night.

Harry Clarke Madeline Print Collection Series Two:

Jennifer’s second series of Harry Clarke themed prints are based on Clarke’s work inspired by the poem ‘The Eve of St Agnes’, based upon the myth that a young Maiden Madeline would see a vision of her lover if she performed certain rites on the eve of St Agnes Day.
Jennifer’s prints are full of rich jewel-like hues, especially purples and blues and accented with golds and gunmetal.  With dazzling colour, etched and scratched effects and immense detail, diverse tones and texture are produced. The prints are infused with light and have a magical and ethereal quality.

"The 1916 GPO Print Collection Is a positive commemoration of the 1916 Rising, Irish history and free expression - and 2016 was the 100th anniversary” Jennifer stated. The inspiration for this compilation came from the positive aspects of this controversial era – such as the architecture of the GPO and the famous Hibernia Statue. Hibernia is the Classical Latin name for the Island of Ireland and the spelling was influenced by hibernus that means “wintry. These features are celebrated through sensational tones of purples and blues. 

The inspiration for the Kells Space Mythology Print Collection design came to fruition after Jennifer’s desire to bring Celtic design into the 21st century. Jennifer wanted to put a modern stamp on Celtic design and bring it into the modern era.“The peacock bird used in the print is from gospel of John who is seen as the messenger between heaven and earth,” Jennifer stated “and I discovered it only after completion of the print.”

Fashion designer Jennifer Rothwell is renowned for her colourful innovative unique prints. She's passionate about the made in Ireland campaign and reigniting art and culture through modern contemporary Design. Rothwell's designs are produced using up-to-the minute digital print technology these vibrant pieces evoke our past and at the same time represent contemporary design. Jennifer Rothwell is also currently the only designer who digitally prints and manufactures all her designs in Ireland.

The following awards have recognized Jennifer Rothwell's achievements in fashion:

  • "Brown Thomas Designer Award” at Dublin Fashion Week in 2007.
  • New Product Award at the Showcase Expo in 2010.
  • Winner of Irish Made Awards Fashion Category in 2017

 

  • 2006 - Jennifer Launched her own label and just 7 months later she won the Brown Thomas Designer Award at Dublin Fashion Week in 2007, with the Brown Thomas website reading: “New York born Dublin resident Jennifer Rothwell's superb tailoring, innovative designs and beautifully cut feminine dresses caught the eye of Brown Thomas Buying Director Stephen Sealey and Head of Fashion Direction Shelly Corkery.” 
  • 2010 - Appointed as a Peer Mentor for the Design and Craft Council of Ireland and Dublin Local Enterprise Board. Jennifer loves her role as a Mentor and is extremely open and giving with her knowledge and vast experience in the aid to help the next generation on the road to success in the Fashion world.
  • 2014 -  Jennifer opened her first flagship store in the Powerscourt Townhouse Centre, Dublin 2 as well as an online boutique www.jrothwell.net. The boutique showcases her collection of prints and printed accessories, jersey pieces and evening dresses,
  • 2015 - Showcases her collection in Ireland Showcase in New York during New York Fashion Week.
  • 2016 - Set up the Digital Textile Fashion Hub Ltd - First commercial Digital Textile printer to print on silk in the Republic Of Ireland. Resulting in Jennifer Rothwell to be the first fashion designer in Ireland to pioneer digital printing and manufacturing in Ireland.
  • 2016 - National Museum Of Ireland the National Museum of Ireland acquired 3 of her printed designs for their Contemporary Design Collection a great endorsement of Rothwell's work. The prints acquired were the Madeline print 2nd edition Harry Clarke inspired, 1916 GPO Commerative and Kells Mythology. Having the prints acquired by the NMI is a great endorsement and recognition of the quality of Jennifer's exceptional contemporary design. Being part of the collection is a great recognition for the designer who frequently looks into the past and uses Irish history and culture as a source of her inspiration. “I want to reignite the Celtic revival (also known as the Celtic twilight) of the 19th and 20th centuries in the 21st century, to celebrate Irish artists, folklore, legends and traditions through fashion in a modern and contemporary way.” Jennifer Rothwell said. 

Jennifer's clients consist of other creative professionals; such as artists, writers, poets etc. Irish singer Enya is a frequent client of Jennifer Rothwell and her designs. The below image was featured on the front page of the Irish Examiner, Enya wearing Jennifer's 'Red Jersey Draped Gown' at the Honan Chapel for "Christmas Carols from Cork" which was screened on RTÉ One on Christmas Day 2016. 

"In choosing pieces from Jennifer Rothwell’s collections, I felt that these particular designs would beautifully complement and enhance the existing collections at the National Museum of Ireland in that they represent a very contemporary interpretation of Irish events and movements from a century ago.  Jennifer’s Kells print is a modern reimagining of ancient motifs that were popular during the Celtic Revival and her reworking of Harry Clarke designs recalls the best of the Irish Arts and Crafts movement. By incorporating the GPO into a new print Rothwell commemorates the 1916 Rising in a very unique way.  Produced using up-to-the minute digital print technology these vibrant pieces evoke our past and at the same time represent contemporary Irish design."

- Ms. Alex Ward

Curator of Dress and Textiles

National Museum of Ireland

 

'I fell in love with Jennifer Rothwell designs last year and now have several items in my wardrobe. Every design is unique and flattering - the use of really good quality fabrics in bold colours and designs lends itself to gorgeous garments that work well from daytime work wear to evening events and weekend parties! The dresses travel really well - I simply roll them up and they are ready to wear on arrival. Jennifer is a pleasure to deal with - she works with you to ensure you're happy with your choices and is an absolute perfectionist with great attention to detail.'

- Mo Durkan

Communications Manager

Coca-Cola Ireland

All Jennifer Rothwell designs are timeless artworks that are all fair trade and locally made in Jennifer's own studio in Artane, Co. Dublin. Jennifer Rothwell wants to protect the environment and practices slow fashion and maintaining a clean carbon footprint through all manufacturing in our studio and boutique.

Your contribution will go towards fabrics, employment, making wearable artworks and creating awareness about the 20th Century Arts Movement. With your support, Jennifer wants to reignite the celtic revival of the 20th century and apply it design. The conservation of art and culture is so important to us as a brand, but also to us in our ability to create wearable works of art that showcase the Irish arts movement. 

Help Jennifer create wearable artworks and bring forth the Celtic Revival into the 21st century.

Support our campaign. #supportthecelticrevival

#slowfashion

#followyourtribe

#lionesses

#fashionisart

#localtolocal

#heritageandculture

#bebrave

#makeadifference

#buylocalfashion

Instagram: @jrothwelldesign

story:
My name is Jenniffer Turpeau. I am the creator of Madame Turpeau, an accessory line scheduled to launch at the end of February.

From the line's early stages, I have received an incredible amount of support from loved ones to help me jump-start the line. Now, in order to finalize the collection and launch it, financial backing  is needed. 

Your contribution will help finalize all legal structures, marketing, packaging, production materials and labor—up until this point I have been working on my own, but for the success of the line I need some help.

 

What We Need

In order to achieve my goal, I need 20,000 dollars.

Should I not reach the full amount through this campaign, all earnings will still be used to support the main goal of 20K, which I will seek through private investment.

The Impact

I have been incredibly touched by how this line has contributed to the life of people. Individuals have reached out to me with personal, timeless pieces from loved ones who have passed, which I am able to transform into an accessory piece they can wear and feel their loved ones close to them.

Risks & Challenges

Should I not reach the goal on time, the launch will be pushed to a later date. 

After the released of the video about Madame Turpeau, in one month I received messages from 400 women interested in purchasing items from the line.

This clearly shows me that it is just a matter of "when" for the success of Madame Turpeau.

Other Ways You Can Help

So many ways you can support, not only financially.

Please use indigogo tools to share this campaign and spread the word.

Sharing can make a huge difference for the campaign.

story:
Short Summary

Hi, my name is Mark Corwyn Jameson. Several years ago, I had an angiogram that told me I have two different problems with my heart, which have resulted in very low energy and some pretty bad days, which have made me rather undesirable to most employers.  I am not the type to take this lying down, and it was from this adversity that MacCamie Studios was born, where my goal is to brighten the world with unique and exquisite works of wearable art.

For the past several years I have worked to perfect and streamline my art, and to come up with a product line with a wide appeal.  Now I’m ready for that next step in expanding my business and a full launch of my new product line: “The Errant Apprentice”.  This line started as an experiment in a new (to me) technique of dying clothing. This technique, though resembling traditional tie-dye, is something else entirely. It creates, through a fundamentally separate process, a watercolor effect that is unique and has found a special place within myself and my views of the world.  However, as you might imagine, there is quite a significant cost associated with starting a new product line and that is where this campaign comes in.

This campaign will allow for the studio to not only grow stock, but also to produce and document the new garments that will now be offered as part of this line.  This is where you come in! As the Perks show, you are able to be among the first individuals to own these products!  This will also allow me to produce these garments and document them for display at shows, conventions, and on my website.


What We Need & What You Get

Here's what we need and why:

  • $2000 for Initial Stock. Instead of building it one piece at a time, we'd like to get 1-2 pieces of each of our product lines started in each of our 14 color sets. When you multiply that by the different sizes of our shirts and socks, you can see that it would take us a long time doing it one by one.
  • $500 for Infrastructure.  The internet is a vital marketing tool these days, but we don't want to rely on just one method of reaching out. This means face-to-face sales, primarily at conventions and other weekend shows. We've been putting the majority of our money back into the business, but we could use a few more things like a table or two and a portable awning to hit some more venues, especially in the outdoor shows that the summer offers. 
  • $350 for Photos & Publishing. To help sell our clothes, we need to set up some photo shoots for our catalog, website and general marketing. The more product we have to do a shoot, the fewer shoots we need to do, saving us money. 
  • $150 for a PayPal EMV Card Reader.  With the new Credit Card processing requirements, this is something that is a "must have" to protect ourselves and our customers.
Here's what we're offering:
  • Each of our perks get you one or more of our fantastic products. When you make your choice, you'll get an email from us with a PDF showing you all 14 of our color sets. Email us back with your choice(s) and sizes (if applicable) and we'll start creating them just for you! Be aware though, that since these are hand-dyed, the pictures you get are for reference only of the general colors in each set, and may not reflect the balance of what you get from us. This goes double if you order any of our silk products.
  • If we don't make our goal, whatever money we do make (THANK YOU in advance by the way), will go straight to building stock. Now, onto the perks:
  • $5 - Perk 1: Thank You Card. We appreciate any donation you care to give. So, for a $5 donation we'll send you a nice thank you card printed with an image of one of our color sets including a hand-written note thanking you personally!
  • $10 - Perk 2: Wallpapers. We're very proud of our color sets, as you can possibly imagine, and we take a great many pictures when we see our creations unfold. You can get in on the fun by choosing this pic, and get a set of our 14 best pics, sized to your desktop in a high resolution format!

  • $15 - Perk 3: Knee High Socks. 
     

    With this perk, you get a pair of our wonderful Knee High Socks! You pick the color set from the PDF we provide, and then we send you a great set of comfy socks. Unisex knee high socks for any occasion.      Cotton Blend (80% Cotton / 15% Nylon / 5% Elastane) 

    Approximate leg length is 11 1/2” (29.21cm)
  • $15 - Perk 4: T-Shirts.

  

Pick this perk and you get a short sleeve T-shirt, in your choice of size and color set. Anywhere from a Small to a 3X, these soft T-shirts show off your flair for color! Unisex, cut long, 100% cotton.

$20 - Perk 5: Thigh High Socks

  

Now here's a sweet deal: A single pair of cotton blend (90% Cotton / 9% Nylon / 1% Elastane) Thigh High Socks (One size, 9-11 Thigh length - approximate leg length is 26” (66 cm)). 

Of course, you also get to pick the color set! Warm and fun made of thick cotton so they won't fall apart on you. Dancing, cosplay or just to wear around town, these socks are fantastic. 


$20 - Perk 6: Arm Warmers

  

These are longer gloves that reach up to the upper arm (17" long) and have a half thumb piece.  Great for dance productions, weddings, parties, Burning Man, Cosplays or just looking fashionable around town. Seen worn with basic T-shirts or camis for layering. The fabric content is 90% Cotton and 10% Lycra. Edges are stitched with a stretchy pearl overcast finish.  These will stretch enough, width wise, to accommodate a forearm circumference of 12" maximum. Pick your color set and make a splash!

$20 - Perk 7: Playing Cards

       


Something special, a set of playing cards. The back will have your choice of one of our great color sets. You get to pick your choice from a PDF we'll send you when we get your contribution. In addition, we'll throw in our collection of Wallpapers too!

$25 - Perk 8: Matching T-Shirt & Socks
In the market for a fun set? Choose this perk and you'll get a T-shirt and matching crew socks. Tell us the size of shirt (S-3X) and socks (Women's 9-11 or Men's 11-13), and pick the color set. That's all there is to it!

$35 - Perk 9: Wrap Pants

  

Here's something that's getting raves! Our 100% cotton wrap pants. They fit up to a 44" waist/hip, with extra long ties, made so they both tie in front, for better security and comfort (not to mention ease). Like all of our other products, you get to choose the color set you want. But here's something special: You can choose 2 colors! That's right, you have the option of choosing a single color set, or making them parti-colored, and choose one color set for each leg! Great for men & women!

$35 - Perk 10: Peasant Shirt

    

Our dyed peasant shirts are a loose fit roomy tunic with side slits, so it fits many body types comfortably. 100% Rayon. Light, not sheer, but you still may want to wear a cami under it. Elastic at neckline and under the bust. The raglan big bell sleeves have 2 gathered bottom tiers. Turned and stitched hems. Choose the color set and size from a pdf we provide, and you'll have a shirt that's fabulous and fun!

$40 - Perk 11: Short Gored Skirt


This knee-to-calf length skirt comes in 10 gored panels, with alternating stripes of black and one of our color sets. Pick the colors from the PDF we will provide. It can also come in single color or a random motley! One size fits all, with a drawstring dyed to match.

$45 - Perk 12: Peasant Shirt & Knee Socks
Here's a great set for the ladies! One of our lovely rayon tier-sleeved peasant shirts, combined with a pair of our cotton blend Knee socks. Choose size of the shirt (S-2X) and color of both. You'll be glad you did!

$50 - Perk 13: Silk Sarong

Here's one of our deluxe perks, a sarong made from a medium-weight 10 momme Habotai silk, and wonderfully hand-dyed. These lustrous sarongs feel great, with a color set that has a very pronounced watercolor look, much more than its cotton cousins. They measure a full 43" x 72". Also make great dance veils!


$60 - Perk 14: It's Curtains!


Here's just the thing to add some color to your home in a way that will make your windows a work of art! With this perk, you will get a pair of 100% cotton curtains, measuring a whopping 54" x 96" EACH! At your request, they can be shortened, just provide us with the length. You even get to pick the color set from our pdf we'll send to you.


$80 - Perk 15: Ankle-Length Gored Skirt


This is an ankle-length skirt, offered for this campaign, made from 100% cotton and dyed to order. The skirt measures 36" long and the 8 gored panels alternate between solid black and one of our wonderful color sets. After choosing this perk, you will receive a PDF with our selection of color sets. One size fits all. Even the drawstring is dyed to match! It can also come in single color sets or a random motley! Your choice!


$90 - Perk 16: Arm Warmers, Peasant Shirt & Short Skirt

The Rennie/Hippy Trifecta. What more could you want than Arm Warmers, a fantastic Peasant shirt and a 10 panel gored skirt in your colors? On a bright spring day, not much!


$250 - Perk 17: Top to Bottom

Soooo, you want all the clothes? Since you ask, OK! 

Here's what you get: Our Arm Warmers; T-Shirt; Peasant Shirt; 1 pair each of our socks: Crew, Knee High & Thigh High plus a pair of our Wrap Pants. 

Plus!: Our Short and Ankle length gored skirts. Just give us your sizes for the shirts and your choice in color set after receiving our handy-dandy PDF! 


$330 - Perk 18: Kitchen Sink

With this, you get everything: 1 set of Arm Warmers, Crew Socks, Knee Socks, Thigh High Socks, Wrap Pants, T-Shirt, Peasant Shirt, Short Gored Skirt & Ankle Skirt, even our Curtains! We'll even throw in a deck of playing cards and a set of our desktop wallpapers!!


The Impact

I'll be honest, there's no global or national impact here. I'm not pitching something that will change the world. What I am trying to do is to be successful at what I do. And, I hope, bring some joy and pleasure to the people who see and love my work. That is an impact that can be both subtle and profound. I work hard to get bigger and better smiles from people. I wish I could do it on my own, but I shouldn't let pride get in the way of my goals. Or those smiles.

Risks & Challenges

The hard part in designing clothes and dyes sets is the number involved. For example: our shirts come in 6 sizes. When you combine that with our 14 color sets, you see we need 84 shirts just to have one of each in stock. And we don't just produce shirts! 

Now, building a website is all well and good, and a necessary tool in this age. However, you can't just wait for people to find you. You have to go to them, at least initially. So that means a lot of travelling. To shows, fairs, conventions, what-have-you so people can see the work and fall in love with the clothes and colors. Despite what the ad companies may say, word of mouth is still the best way to get traffic. And hey, I love talking to people about my wares anyway, so that's a help.

All of this leads to a quandary: Do I spend my money getting into more shows, or on more stock?  This is where this campaign comes in. I want to expand my business. Yes, I have health problems (money? what money?) but I don't want that to stop me. Being my own boss means I can work on my clothes on my schedule, and being a productive member of society.

BUT, and this is important to me, I don't want to just ask for money. I want to give you something for your donation. It may be a little, like a thank you card, or it may be a selection of my entire inventory. This way, you get something, and I get something. 


Other Ways You Can Help

If you can't donate, that's alright. Believe me, I understand. Heck, I applaud you for reading this at all! But if you would like to do something anyway, PLEASE forward my campaign to your friends and relations, or really, anyone whom you think would be interested in my wares, or helping me out. I would greatly appreciate it. Thank you for reading, and I hope your year goes even better than you hope!

Mark Corwyn Jameson, 
MacCamie Studios
story_txt:
Short Summary



Hi,
my name is Mark Corwyn Jameson. Several years ago, I had an angiogram that told
me I have two different problems with my heart, which have resulted in very low
energy and some pretty bad days, which have made me rather undesirable to most
employers.  I am not the type to take
this lying down, and it was from this adversity that MacCamie Studios was born, where my goal is to brighten the world with unique and exquisite works of
wearable art.
For
the past several years I have worked to perfect and streamline my art, and to
come up with a product line with a wide appeal. 
Now I’m ready for that next step in expanding my business and a full
launch of my new product line: “The
Errant Apprentice”.  This line started as
an experiment in a new (to me) technique of dying clothing. This technique, though resembling traditional tie-dye, is something else entirely. It creates, through a fundamentally separate process, a watercolor effect that is unique and has found a
special place within myself and my views of the world. 
However, as you might imagine, there is quite a significant cost
associated with starting a new product line and that is where this campaign
comes in.
This
campaign will allow for the studio to not only grow stock, but also to produce
and document the new garments that will now be offered as part of this
line.  This is where you come in! As the
Perks show, you are able to be among the first individuals to own these
products!  This will also allow me to
produce these garments and document them for display at shows, conventions, and
on my website.   
What We Need & What You Get Here's what we need and why:  $2000 for Initial Stock. Instead of building it one piece at a time, we'd like to get 1-2 pieces of each of our product lines started in each of our 14 color sets. When you multiply that by the different sizes of our shirts and socks, you can see that it would take us a long time doing it one by one.
$500 for Infrastructure.  The internet is a vital marketing tool these days, but we don't want to rely on just one method of reaching out. This means face-to-face sales, primarily at conventions and other weekend shows. We've been putting the majority of our money back into the business, but we could use a few more things like a table or two and a portable awning to hit some more venues, especially in the outdoor shows that the summer offers. 
$350 for Photos & Publishing. To help sell our clothes, we need to set up some photo shoots for our catalog, website and general marketing. The more product we have to do a shoot, the fewer shoots we need to do, saving us money. 
$150 for a PayPal EMV Card Reader.  With the new Credit Card processing requirements, this is something that is a "must have" to protect ourselves and our customers.

Here's what we're offering:
 Each of our perks get you one or more of our fantastic products. When you make your choice, you'll get an email from us with a PDF showing you all 14 of our color sets. Email us back with your choice(s) and sizes (if applicable) and we'll start creating them just for you! Be aware though, that since these are hand-dyed, the pictures you get are for reference only of the general colors in each set, and may not reflect the balance of what you get from us. This goes double if you order any of our silk products. If we don't make our goal, whatever money we do make (THANK YOU in advance by the way), will go straight to building stock. Now, onto the perks:

$5 - Perk 1: Thank You Card. We appreciate any donation you care to give. So, for a $5 donation we'll send you a nice thank you card printed with an image of one of our color sets including a hand-written note thanking you personally!


$10 - Perk 2: Wallpapers. We're very proud of our color sets, as you can possibly imagine, and we take a great many pictures when we see our creations unfold. You can get in on the fun by choosing this pic, and get a set of our 14 best pics, sized to your desktop in a high resolution format!


$15 - Perk 3: Knee High Socks.  With this perk, you get a pair of our wonderful Knee High Socks! You pick the color set from the PDF we provide, and then we send you a great set of comfy socks. Unisex knee high socks for any occasion.  Cotton Blend (80% Cotton / 15% Nylon / 5% Elastane) Approximate leg length is 11 1/2” (29.21cm)


$15 - Perk 4: T-Shirts.



  
Pick this perk and you get a short sleeve T-shirt, in your choice of size and color set. Anywhere from a Small to a 3X, these soft T-shirts show off your flair for color! Unisex, cut long, 100% cotton.

$20 - Perk 5: Thigh High Socks

  



Now here's a sweet deal: A single pair of cotton blend (90% Cotton / 9% Nylon / 1% Elastane) Thigh High Socks (One size, 9-11 Thigh length - approximate leg length is 26” (66 cm)). 
Of course, you also get to pick the color set! Warm and fun made of thick cotton so they won't fall apart on you. Dancing, cosplay or just to wear around town, these socks are fantastic. 

$20 - Perk 6: Arm Warmers

  
These are longer gloves that reach up to the upper arm (17" long) and have a half thumb piece.  Great for dance productions, weddings, parties, Burning Man, Cosplays or just looking fashionable around town. Seen worn with basic T-shirts or camis for layering. The fabric content is 90% Cotton and 10% Lycra. Edges are stitched with a stretchy pearl overcast finish.  These will stretch enough, width wise, to accommodate a forearm circumference of 12" maximum. Pick your color set and make a splash!


$20 - Perk 7: Playing Cards

       


Something special, a set of playing cards. The back will have your choice of one of our great color sets. You get to pick your choice from a PDF we'll send you when we get your contribution. In addition, we'll throw in our collection of Wallpapers too!


$25 - Perk 8: Matching T-Shirt & Socks
In the market for a fun set? Choose this perk and you'll get a T-shirt and matching crew socks. Tell us the size of shirt (S-3X) and socks (Women's 9-11 or Men's 11-13), and pick the color set. That's all there is to it!


$35 - Perk 9: Wrap Pants
  
Here's something that's getting raves! Our 100% cotton wrap pants. They fit up to a 44" waist/hip, with extra long ties, made so they both tie in front, for better security and comfort (not to mention ease). Like all of our other products, you get to choose the color set you want. But here's something special: You can choose 2 colors! That's right, you have the option of choosing a single color set, or making them parti-colored, and choose one color set for each leg! Great for men & women!


$35 - Perk 10: Peasant Shirt
    
Our dyed peasant shirts are a loose fit roomy tunic with side slits, so it fits many body types comfortably. 100% Rayon. Light, not sheer, but you still may want to wear a cami under it. Elastic at neckline and under the bust. The raglan big bell sleeves have 2 gathered bottom tiers. Turned and stitched hems. Choose the color set and size from a pdf we provide, and you'll have a shirt that's fabulous and fun!


$40 - Perk 11: Short Gored Skirt




This knee-to-calf length skirt comes in 10 gored panels, with alternating stripes of black and one of our color sets. Pick the colors from the PDF we will provide. It can also come in single color or a random motley! One size fits all, with a drawstring dyed to match.


$45 - Perk 12: Peasant Shirt & Knee Socks
Here's a great set for the ladies! One of our lovely rayon tier-sleeved peasant shirts, combined with a pair of our cotton blend Knee socks. Choose size of the shirt (S-2X) and color of both. You'll be glad you did!






$50 - Perk 13: Silk Sarong
Here's one of our deluxe perks, a sarong made from a medium-weight 10 momme Habotai silk, and wonderfully hand-dyed. These lustrous sarongs feel great, with a color set that has a very pronounced watercolor look, much more than its cotton cousins. They measure a full 43" x 72". Also make great dance veils!



$60 - Perk 14: It's Curtains!



Here's just the thing to add some color to your home in a way that will make your windows a work of art! With this perk, you will get a pair of 100% cotton curtains, measuring a whopping 54" x 96" EACH! At your request, they can be shortened, just provide us with the length. You even get to pick the color set from our pdf we'll send to you.




$80 - Perk 15: Ankle-Length Gored Skirt





This is an ankle-length skirt, offered for this campaign, made from 100% cotton and dyed to order. The skirt measures 36" long and the 8 gored panels alternate between solid black and one of our wonderful color sets. After choosing this perk, you will receive a PDF with our selection of color sets. One size fits all. Even the drawstring is dyed to match! It can also come in single color sets or a random motley! Your choice!



$90 - Perk 16: Arm Warmers, Peasant Shirt & Short Skirt
The Rennie/Hippy Trifecta. What more could you want than Arm Warmers, a fantastic Peasant shirt and a 10 panel gored skirt in your colors? On a bright spring day, not much!

Soooo, you want all the clothes? Since you ask, OK! 
Here's what you get: Our Arm Warmers; T-Shirt; Peasant Shirt; 1 pair each of our socks: Crew, Knee High & Thigh High plus a pair of our Wrap Pants. 
Plus!: Our Short and Ankle length gored skirts. Just give us your sizes for the shirts and your choice in color set after receiving our handy-dandy PDF! 



$330 - Perk 18: Kitchen Sink
With this, you get everything: 1 set of Arm Warmers, Crew Socks, Knee Socks, Thigh High Socks, Wrap Pants, T-Shirt, Peasant Shirt, Short Gored Skirt & Ankle Skirt, even our Curtains! We'll even throw in a deck of playing cards and a set of our desktop wallpapers!!

And, I hope, bring some joy and pleasure to the people who see and love my work. That is an impact that can be both subtle and profound. I work hard to get bigger and better smiles from people. Now, building a website is all well and good, and a necessary tool in this age. However, you can't just wait for people to find you. You have to go to them, at least initially. story:
Moksha

[mohk-shuh] 
 Free, let go, release, liberate.

Moksha is the inspiration born through our admiration for unique, custom made accessories for men and women across the globe. Accessories that have their one of a kind look, appearance just like the one who owns them. Accessories that could become just a part of the normal routine like they were never added. We present our retro style, vintage leather satchels, bags and backpacks. An essential accessory for the modern men and women, available in different designs and sizes our satchels are what you need to give yourself a stand out from the crowd look.


What We Need & What You Get

In order to turn this dream of ours in to a reality, we need your support. Not only does this mean pledging & purchasing one of ours awesome bags, but also sharing the movement with your friends.
We need your Support!
To raise the funds we're opening up our range for pre-order at a discounted rates between 30% to 50%. Our products price range starts from $25 to $45. Once available to public, they will retails between $40 to $90.  
The perk, along with a thank you letter from our team, will ship as soon as production has finished. Each and every bag is handcrafted and hand stitched by an expert artisan.  We will also email a discount coupon of 30% off, thru which you guys can shop any number of products from our Facebook Store for a span for 2 years. 

Our Products/Perks

All of our distinctive bags & satchels are handmade.  Rajasthan ‘The land of kings’ has been the home of leather craftsmen for hundreds of years and our aim is to blend this Indian craftsmanship with international standards. 

The extraordinary ability of our skilled artists can be seen in each one of our fine masterpieces.

We use the best of the best full-grain, vegetable-tanned leather, original YKK zippers, Brass rivets and buckles.

The range of bags is designed for day to day use and the person who wants practical but affordable leather bags.

Each bag is individually handmade made using goat leather by experienced artisans which results in a unique product every time. The bag gets better and better with the time as the leather softens. The leather does not receive any chemical treatment.  Each bag has its charm and style and a very special earthy smell that will assure you it’s real leather. Its lightness, flexibility and durability will not make you regret your purchase.

1 Adjustable shoulder strap



LEATHER MILITARY DUFFLE BAG

$45
Colour: Brown
Leather: Goat Leather
9.5"(H) * 22"(W) * 7.5"(D)
1 Front pocket.
2 Additional pockets, one on each side.
1 Adjustable Shoulder strap.
Carry Handles on top


RETRO MAN DUFFLE BAG

$45


Colour: Brown
Leather: Goat Leather
9.5"(H) * 22"(W) * 7.5"(D)
1 Front pocket
2 Additional pockets, one on each side
1 Additional pocket on top flap dd
Adjustable backpack straps


Disclaimer: 

Genuine Goat Leather by its nature has some scars (due to markings/cuts on goat skin) which reconfirms that its 100% pure and gives it a perfect vintage look. Also, each bag has different colour shade and it might be a little different from given pictures which makes each bag unique. Each bag is specially fresh made for you so there might be a little different smell of leather. It any which way fades away within 3-4 weeks of regular use.


FAQ's

My bag has a distinctive earthy smell. Will this fade over time?

Yes. Because we use no harsh chemicals or dyes, your leather does not give off that “new leather smell.” Instead, each piece initially has a genuine earthy aroma that is characteristic of the natural tanning process. This scent begins to dissipate as soon as the bag is removed from its packaging, and fades entirely in 2-6 weeks.

How will my bag hold up over time?    

We want you to enjoy your handmade bag for a lifetime. For this reason we invest in the very best leather and fittings. Your straps are double stitched for strength. Your buckles and rivets are made of corrosion-free brass, not nickel, which is why they are stronger and will not rust, tarnish or leave black marks on your leather.


Order Fulfillment?

Our team has an extensive history of working with e-commerce retail stores which made us perfectly suited to designing and creating these bags. It has also provided us with the ability to package and ship with your order with speed and professionalism. 

Challenges?

The greatest challenge we face is raising awareness and making noise to bring our dream to life. We are going to do everything we can to spread the word but we need your help. If you could do something as simple as tweeting about and/or sharing this page with your Facebook friends, it can go a long way. Simply click the Facebook tab at the top page.



From everyone here at the Moksha team, THANK YOU so much for your time and your support.

Disclaimer: 
Genuine Goat Leather by its nature has some scars (due to markings/cuts on goat skin) which reconfirms that its 100% pure and gives it a perfect vintage look. Also, each bag has different colour shade and it might be a little different from given pictures which makes each bag unique. Each bag is specially fresh made for you so there might be a little different smell of leather. It any which way fades away within 3-4 weeks of regular use.

FAQ's

My bag has a distinctive earthy smell. Will this fade over time?
Yes. Because we use no harsh chemicals or dyes, your leather does not give off that “new leather smell.” Instead, each piece initially has a genuine earthy aroma that is characteristic of the natural tanning process. This scent begins to dissipate as soon as the bag is removed from its packaging, and fades entirely in 2-6 weeks.
How will my bag hold up over time?    
We want you to enjoy your handmade bag for a lifetime. For this reason we invest in the very best leather and fittings. Your straps are double stitched for strength. Your buckles and rivets are made of corrosion-free brass, not nickel, which is why they are stronger and will not rust, tarnish or leave black marks on your leather.


Order Fulfillment?
Our team has an extensive history of working with e-commerce retail stores which made us perfectly suited to designing and creating these bags. It has also provided us with the ability to package and ship with your order with speed and professionalism. 

Challenges?

The greatest challenge we face is raising awareness and making noise to bring our dream to life. We are going to do everything we can to spread the word but we need your help. If you could do something as simple as tweeting about and/or sharing this page with your Facebook friends, it can go a long way. Simply click the Facebook tab at the top page.

From everyone here at the Moksha team, THANK YOU so much for your time and your support.

story:
Short Summary


I featured this product on Kickstarter and reached my goal.  I started this campaign on Indiegogo to offer this product for pre order and selected a flexible goal because I already raised enough funds to produce this product.  This will be retailed between 14.99 and 19.99 plus shipping.  Pre order today to receive a significant discount.

It all started when my mother in law was a victim of identity theft and had her credit card information stolen (called RFID Skimming) while at an art fair in Kansas City, MO (not a large city, identity theft is everywhere).  She did not lose her card or have it stolen by the thief.  They simply used RFID Skimming and acquired the name, credit card numbers and expiration date with a RFID scanner.  These can be purchased for under 50 dollars online and now most smart phones can also receive this information with a free app.  After she became a victim of identity theft I started to do some research and found out that I could produce a product that could prevent this.  Check out this news story about how this happens



RFID skimming

From Wikipedia, the free encyclopedia

RFID Skimming is a form of digital theft, which enables information from RFID based smart cards to be read and duplicated. It can be used as a form of wireless identity theft or credit card theft among other forms of information theft. Typically it works by illegitimate reading of RFID chips at a distance using a cheap RFID reader device, which downloads the card information.[1] From there, it can be written to a new blank card, which then operates in the same manner as the original legitimate card. Because the data is identical on both cards, and the information is only copied, it makes no difference if the original data is encrypted or not.

RFID skimming has been demonstrated as far back as 2008[2] and as recently as 2013,[3] however levels of theft are difficult to determine, as victims typically do not know how their card data was compromised.[4]

RFID Protection: The Secret to Keeping Your Data Safe!

Identity Theft is at All Time High! Unless properly shielded, your card-based data is readily available when any active reader is in range!

This RFID Blocking Card Protects Your Smart Cards from unwanted capture of data from contactless cards issued by banks, governments and other institutions such as:

* Credit or Debit (for example: MC PayPass, VISA PayWave, AMEX expresspay, INTERAC Flash, etc.)

* Enhanced driver's license, Hunting and fishing license

* Access / security control, Employee / School ID

* Health insurance, Medical ID

* Gift, Membership, Library

* Transit / Park pass

Protects against access by NFC-equipped Smartphones

INTRODUCING PROTECTED CARDS RFID BLOCKING CARD

I wanted to produce a product that was inexpensive and would simply work with any current wallet or card holder. There are many products on the market that block RFID signals and stop identity theft but use sleeves as the protection.  You can avoid these bulky sleeves by funding this project. As you can see from the last picture all you have to do is insert two cards, one in front and one behind the cards you want to block from RFID signals.  For larger wallets please use more than 2 RFID Blocking cards. 2 Blocking Cards will protect up to 8 contact-less cards.  If you do not carry a wallet then simply sandwich your credit cards between 2 Blocking cards.

WHY YOU SHOULD FUND THIS PROJECT

A. New innovation Radio frequency Blocking layer embedded can absorb all 13.56MHz frequency within half inch, let your RFID payment card rest safely until you take it out for payment.

B. Protected Cards RFID Blocking card is a slim but powerful card that prevents any one attempt to wiretap information in the card without your permission. Insert it inside your wallet with payment cards together for a protective shield around your wallet.

C. Same size as a traditional Credit Card or ID. No need for additional items for protection (ex: Sleeves).

PLEASE ASK ANY QUESTIONS YOU MAY HAVE REGARDING THIS PROJECT

Disclaimer: No RFID protection is 100% effective in all circumstances due to the constant changing in technology.

Risks and challenges

After making the first run of this card it has been tested using a NFC phone. I do not see any risks or challenges that will come with completing this project. I really need the funding to manufacture a larger quantity for a better price for the consumer. As soon as the funding has hit 100% then I will start the manufacturing process.  I will have this shipped out in April once I have received the funding and the shipping address of all the supporters of this project.

Other Ways You Can Help

We understand if you can not contribute, but that doesn't mean you can't help:

  • If you really like this project but just can not spare any money please share this with all your friends and family
  • Like protectedcards on facebook and check out our page to see all the latest products that we are putting out to stop RFID Skimming.

story:
JUMANNE is a new and exciting brand of sport and casual footwear. This collection is a reflection of our love, vision and passion for shoes of all types. Our goal is to provide you and all consumers the opportunity to purchase high quality, real suede leather, designer sport/casual shoes at very affordable prices.

We are very proud to present our first collection. This new style is a fashionable sport moccasin casual shoe. Our team went through great detail picking the right leathers and materials for our first production of footwear. We were inspired to bring you the most stylish, comfortable and in-fashion casual and sport shoes you can ever wear. 


WHY SHOULD YOU SUPPORT THIS PROJECT?  

When you support this project, you will get your sport moccasin shoes (perks) directly from our warehouse! In addition, you will obtain the best possible price on the market for great quality,  Real Suede Leather (also lower priced Synthetic Canvas Suede) sport/casual shoes. While other brands have business models that include extensive retail markups and additional fees, you will able to obtain our shoes at an unbeatable wholesale price before our shoes hit the stores and sell at retail prices! 



HERE'S WHERE WE ARE
During the past few months we have designed and developed our very first collection of shoes. We already have our first production of our sport moccasin style in stock. Therefore, we can and will immediately ship our fashionable footwear to our supporters! YOU WILL BE GUARANTEED TO RECEIVE YOUR PERK(S) FOR YOUR CONTRIBUTION REGARDLESS OF THE AMOUNT WE RAISE!  All proceeds received will go towards assisting us with the financing of our SECOND production run of our New Court/Casual Style (See Stretch Goal Below). This is where you, our INDIEGOGO partners are needed so we can quickly bring more exciting styles and product to fulfillment. WE NEED YOUR SUPPORT!.


OUR PERKS (REWARDS) 

OUR SIZING AND COLORS

IMMEDIATELY at the end of our campaign, we will send out a survey to ALL backers so you can submit your sizing information and your choice of six colors (BLACK, BROWN, GRAY, RED, NAVY BLUE or MUSTARD YELLOW).                                              

  For Men we offer sizes: 7 - 13 (US) / 40 - 47 (Euro)                                               For Women we offer sizes: 5 - 10 (US) / 35.5 - 42 (Euro)

Our shoes are UNISEX and our sizing is TRUE TO SIZE (Example: Size 7 in Men = 7). We have both men and women sizes and do not offer half sizes at this time. We will in the subsequent shipments. For half sizes please round up (Example: Size 7.5 in Men = 8). We do not offer Narrow or Wide Sizes. All shoes are made in Medium Width.  

TIMING & PROCESS


Immediately at the close of our campaign, you can expect to receive a personalized questionnaire regarding your perk (reward) information. All of the product offered in this campaign is presently in our warehouse. Therefore, by the end of June, you can expect to have your PERKS in your hands, or we should say, ON YOUR FEET!



UNLOCKED NEW STYLE...

Once our goal of $5,000 is reached, we will immediately begin production of our New Court/Casual (unisex) style. If you desire this exciting new style for your perk, delivery will be during the month of August 2016. 


THE PLEDGE AMOUNT FOR THIS REAL COW SUEDE/LEATHER SHOE (PERK) IS $60 FOR ONE PAIR. Please advise us at the end of the campaign if this is the style of your choice along with your preference of size and color.



Here are the colorways we will produce if we reach our goal of $5,000. So all supporters please help us unlock this great new style (early August 2016 delivery).



OUR PERSONAL PROMISE TO YOU...

To show our appreciation for your support, you will always be first to have access to our products prior to store arrival. In addition, you will be offered (prior to the public) our new styles at early bird discounted prices. We promise to keep you in the loop and kept up to date throughout the entire process of our company's growth and the release of our new products. If you ever have any questions or concerns, please feel free to contact us. You can be assured that we will reply to each and everyone of you as soon as possible.



Risks and challenges

We have already made our first shipment of shoes!!! Therefore, there are no real risks of you not receiving your perks (reward). In addition, everything is in place for us to begin the production process of our second shipment. With your support, we can immediately begin the manufacturing of our second exciting style. If there are any issues, we will be proactive in our communications and resolve them as quickly as possible. Thank you in advance for your support...THE JUMANNE APPAREL TEAM.

story:
We're selling directly to our customers. This allows us to cut out middlemen, expensive storefronts, and excessive marketing. We pass the savings on to you. 

 

 

 

 

We believe in our wallets. If anything were to happen to your wallet within one year, we hope that you will send it back to us for repair or replacement. 

AND

When you receive your wallets if you’re not 100% satisfied with the design or quality simply send it back with in 60 days for a full refund of the purchase price (shipping and handling fees are non-refundable).

Please note that contributors are responsible for any taxes and duties related to their shipping country.

 

Are colors exactly as they appear here?

We tried to show the colors as accurate as possible.

 

Can The JOYE SLIM take cash?

It can hold up to 10 folded bills.

 

How long would it take to get my product?

We will start our shipping on February 2019 and  We estimate 2 to 8 weeks of shipping time. however if everything goes according to plan  we'll   be able to ship sooner than that.

 

Do you cover import fees ?

Import fees and other customs fees are not covered by us. 

 

How much are import taxes to My country?

Please contact us at  support@joyeleatherart.com   We'll be more than happy to help you.

 

Risks and challenges

 

 In manufacturing, there's always a risk that suppliers do not fulfill orders on time. We're working with a very professional, organized factory that has decades of experience.

We'll update you frequently about our progress, and if there are any blips along the way, we'll let you know!

We need your support to launch this line of wallets. We are raising funding for manufacturing, packaging, and logistics for joye leather art wallets

Thank you for taking the time to check out the project.

story:
Time is our most valuable asset;Don't waste it !

Due to our unique design and amazing organizing features,packing and unpacking your 3FOLD bag takes literally seconds,

 

Built To Last 

We didn't want to cut any corners when fabricating this bag.

We chose the finest materials,making sure you will be happy with your choice after years of using it as you will be after a few days since purchasing it.

When your essentials are well organized you can be more productive.

Awesome organization features for fast and easy access to all your gear.

 

Comfortable and multifunctional shoulder strap

adjustable and removable

removable pocket  with easy access to your phone,charger, your car keys or anything you may want.

Soft interior materials,pleasant to the touch.

A laptop is a valuable electronic device. Keeping it in the best conditions is our main concern

There are no snaps,buckles,latches or zippers that could harm or scratch your devices.

13'' , 15'' and 17'' bags will be available,this way we make sure your laptop fits perfect.

Available in multiple colors and types of materials

Genuine Leather

PU Leather

Denim

How it all started:

It was made to fulfill needs that other bags didn't.

I'm not a fan of messenger bags,they are too sluggish for me. A laptop cover was great in size and looks but it wasn't enough,I need more space for my gadgets. Then we thought of a bag with the looks and size of a cover but with enough space and organizer features for my accessories to fit in.So we made the first 3FOLD slim bag for me.

One morning while having my coffee in a coffee shop I was asked by several people where did I bought this bag. I then realized there are many people looking for the same features in a laptop bag as I do.

Now,with your support,we could start manufacturing this awesome bag for everyone!​​

Why do we need the money?

In order to fabricate this awesome bag in large numbers we'll need to have more people in our team,this means more money to be spent on equipment.

Each Perk is a Promise,

either we reach our goal or not,all backers will receive their perks ! even if it means higher fabrication costs,it's important for us to keep our promises!

It could be a limited time offer,after the end of the campaign,if we don't raise enough funds we won't be able to offer such a big discount.

About us:

We are a family based business,our main activity is in automotive upholstery.Having many years of experience in this field,we know how important attention to details is,we also learned that no matter how good a product looks it doesn't mean anything if it's not durable.We think the best advertise is word of mouth,this is why we do our best to make each product to the highest standards having each of our clients satisfied with the choice they make.

We support the ''no logo movement''

We strongly believe each product should be appreciated for it's quality,not by it's brand,therefore our products will have no logo on them.

A laptop cover was great in size and looks but it wasn't enough,I need more space for my gadgets. Then we thought of a bag with the looks and size of a cover but with enough space and organizer features for my accessories to fit in.So we made the first 3FOLD slim bag for me.One morning while having my coffee in a coffee shop I was asked by several people where did I bought this bag. I then realized there are many people looking for the same features in a laptop bag as I do.Now,with your support,we could start manufacturing this awesome bag for everyone!​​Why do we need the money?In order to fabricate this awesome bag in large numbers we'll need to have more people in our team,this means more money to be spent on equipment.Each Perk is a Promise,either we reach our goal or not,all backers will receive their perks ! even if it means higher fabrication costs,it's important for us to keep our promises!It could be a limited time offer,after the end of the campaign,if we don't raise enough funds we won't be able to offer such a big discount.About us:We are a family based business,our main activity is in automotive upholstery.Having many years of experience in this field,we know how important attention to details is,we also learned that no matter how good a product looks it doesn't mean anything if it's not durable.We think the best advertise is word of mouth,this is why we do our best to make each product to the highest standards having each of our clients satisfied with the choice they make.We support the ''no logo movement''We strongly believe each product should be appreciated for it's quality,not by it's brand,therefore our products will have no logo on them.

story:
All You Need is LOVE, the first Style Talks Collection, has a pattern design with the word LOVE in 44 languages and includes scarves, umbrellas, tote bags, beach towels, duvet covers and pillow shams, ties, and women’s and men’s shirts that are all available in three color combinations; white/multi, black/white/red and black/multi as shown below. Prices start at $15, so there is something for every budget. 

  

We are starting with the word ‘LOVE’ because that’s what brings people closer together and words matter. You can tuck in your child with a little extra LOVE when you cover them with a LOVE quilt and they can learn about different languages and characters. You can wrap yourself in LOVE when you wear a LOVE shirt, blouse, neckerchief, tie or scarf and carry a LOVE umbrella or tote bag to let the world see your message.

Each product comes with a key to the languages.  They make great conversation pieces…see how many languages your friends can identify.  It’s also a wonderful way to start a dialogue with a stranger.  Imagine walking down the street in Paris carrying a LOVE umbrella...someone sees 'L'amour' on your umbrella and stops to say hello.

You can give a ‘gift of LOVE’ and love the gift you give with a Gift Certificate for a LOVE product. Log on to: www.StyleTalks.fashion to see our entire line of products.

Ten percent of our net profits will be donated to the Golden Rule Day Project…a nonprofit dedicated to creating a National Golden Rule Day.  A day each year when people intentionally treat each other as they want to be treated. www.GoldenRuleDay.net

Style Talks lets you “Say it With Fashion.”  Help us spread the word.  Make LOVE your brand.

 

Here is the translation key that will come with all products...

 

 

To see this recent article about Style Talks from the San Diego Union Tribune, click the link below...

www.sandiegouniontribune.com/communities/north-county/sd-no-angela-coppola-20180204-story.html

 

Why should you support Style Talks?

  • We believe that these products can make a difference in people's consciousness.
  • When you wear or carry a LOVE product, it speaks for you.  It tells the world that you believe in LOVE as the strongest peace offering.
  • Our products are awesome...beautiful fabrics carefully chosen, well designed, great quality, made at Fair Trade factories in China and fairly priced.
  • We passionately believe that this brand will become a successful international brand within the next three years.  

 

Below is a Brand Overview to give you some idea of how we plan to achieve our goals...

 

Below is a Use of Funds chart to show you what we intend to do with the money you invest in our Phase I Funding:

 

This is the Selling Sheet  we email prospective wholesale accounts along with an order form listing all of our products, the available color choices and size selection...

 

Here is Tessa, our video star, being creative with a LOVE 35" Silk Square tied as a blouse and a LOVE 12" x 66" Oblong tied as a hatband...

 

Here's a behind-the-scene photo of our team at the video shoot on beautiful Moonlight Beach here in Encinitas, CA...

 

Some of the 'teaser' video clips we used on social media....

 
 
 
 
 
 
 

 

Tessa taking a stroll on the beach with her LOVE Head Scarf and Tote...

 

Tessa is tying her LOVE Canopy* to set up a spot in the shade...

(*custom order)

 

May you always have a spot in the shade and be 'covered' with LOVE...

story:
Short Summary

I am Emma Clark, and I started MaxCleavage.com back in the year 2000, when it was simply impossible to find any comfortable stylish gel filled bras that would boost your cleavage and your confidence.

I had lots of friends with bigger boobs, and I lacked the confidence to wear figure hugging dresses when going out, or gym wear when working out. Now after 20 years experience designing and manufacturing bras and swimwear here in the UK, I know that these days, things are a little different…

There are many bras on the market but we want to produce our best ever plunge bra, available in 3 colours, black, white and nude!

We’ve looked at lots of prototypes, sampled fabrics, gel pads, underwires and more and we know that we’ve come up with our best design yet, ideal for all outfit dilemmas!  The most comfortable, technologically advanced liquid filled plunge bra on the market today, based on 20 years of design improvements.

The Atomic WOW is now ready to go into production, so please join our campaign today and bring this bra to life!

What We Need & What You Get

We need your help towards raising the £12,000 we need for the cost of production of the first batch of our amazing new Atomic WOW Plunge bras. This will cover the cost of all the raw materials; the fabric, the gel pads, the bra wires and the cost of the complex manufacturing process.

As a massive thank you for joining our campaign we have some wonderful perks for you!

  • donate £32 and we will send you one Atomic WOW plunge bra in your choice of black, white or nude (Saving you 5% on the RRP)
  • donate £80 and we will send you the Atomic WOW plunge bra in all 3 colours which will save you a massive 20% on the RRP
  • donate more than £500 and get all the perks above plus a free tour of our office and factory and meet our wonderful staff
  • donate more than £1000 and you get all the perks above plus we will custom make your very own Atomic WOW plunge bra in any fabric, and custom make you your very own bikini or swimsuit in any of the fabrics we have available

If we do not reach our goal of £12,000 with this campaign we will find another way to pay for the first shipment, but all perks claimed to date will be honoured in full.

The Impact

We have been manufacturing bras and swimwear for 20 years now, and this really is the best plunge bra we have ever manufactured. We are 100% confident it will be life changing for thousands of women worldwide.

Your contribution will make a massive impact, it will go towards making the world's best liquid filled plunge bra come to life

Challenges

One of the challenges we have is that due to our company being focused on helping the small busted, we have only been able to make the smaller sizes below so far:

AA - 30/32/34/36
A - 30/32/34/36
B - 32/34/36
C - 32/34/36
D - 32/34

So if you are any of these sizes then we look forward to helping you, but if you are a larger bra size, I am sorry! (We may add your size in the next shipment!)

Other Ways You Can Help

Please don't worry if you just can't contribute to our campaign right now, but what would be fantastic is if you could help us in a small way by sharing our campaign with everyone you know! 

Please use the indiegogo sharing tools to do this. Thank you! xx
