story:
Doyen® – A celebration of British culture and legacy

Introducing Doyen® - a new lifestyle brand steeped in the rich legacy of Great Britain. 

There are few countries today that can claim to have shaped the world in which we live like Great Britain.  The nation’s dogged determination has led to some of the greatest advancements and achievements in science, industry, culture, civil society, discovery, exploration, even the arts and philosophy the world has ever known, earning her the respect and endearment of millions the world over.

Strength, determination, attitude, pride, grace, dignity and a sense of the fitness of things: these are the defining characteristics of Britain and her people, and the character that our team has set out to capture in one, unmistakably British brand that we call Doyen®.

 

Big Ben by Doyen® - the first in a series of limited-edition timepieces.  For gents and ladies.  

The symbol of perseverance 

For more than 150 years, 'Big Ben', officially The Elizabeth Tower, has truly been 'the world's clock.'  Located at the Palace of Westminster, Big Ben is possibly the most famous landmark in London and England.  

A British cultural icon, Big Ben is universally recognized across the globe, often used as the establishing shot in motion pictures to indicate a scene's location in London.

But Big Ben is more than a famous landmark.  The clock tower has also served to symbolize the continued functioning of the British government and way of life, even during Britain's darkest hours.  Indeed, Big Ben represents the very essence of Britain - which is why Doyen® chose the symbolic clocktower as the inspiration for the first in our series of iconic British timepieces.

 

London's iconic Big Ben - faithfully preserved in a beautiful timepiece by British master watch designer, Chrissie Butcher 

 

Together with British master watch designer, Chrissie Butcher, Doyen has faithfully translated every unique design component of Big Ben into two remarkable timepieces for men and women: Mr. Ben and Lady Ben.

While faithfully echoing Big Ben's iconic design, Both watches are designed with contemporary lifestyles in mind, with thoughtful features including Doyen's unique PRESSTURN interchangeable bezel, allowing both designs  to adapt to a wide array of professional and social situations and attire.  

"Big Ben has always been a celebration not just of British legacy, but of its future as well.  Big Ben's chimes and gongs have been welcoming the future and leading Britain into an evermore modern world, hour by hour, for 158 years," Butcher says.   

Quality you expect at a price you can afford

Timeless styling, elegance, and class.  Tasteful luxury.  Impeccable craftsmanship.  A commitment to quality.  These are the qualities of Britain's most iconic brands: from the world's most coveted automobiles of Bentley and Rolls-Royce to its classic yet contemporary fashion houses recognized the world over.  

At Doyen, we are are staying true to these British ideals in a collection of timepieces that are price-accessible.  Our design and manufacturing incorporates the highest-quality materials you will find in a timepiece in its price range.  

Affordable, quality craftsmanship, made with the utmost of care and attention to detail - that's our mission.    

 

Mr. Ben

Strength.  Perseverance.  Determination.  These are the qualities that Big Ben represents to the British gentleman.  Be reminded of this same spirit each day as you pursue your goals, while letting the world know that you are as dependable and persevering as the famous clocktower echoed on your wrist - with the limited edition Mr. Ben by Doyen.   

 

Unique watch hands and index typeface inspired by Big Ben.  

Complete 316L grade stainless steel case ensures durability and resistance even in the face of extreme elements.  At the same time, Mr. Ben has a perfectly balanced 'wrist feel' and an ideal weight indicative of its quality craftsmanship.  The watch feels substantial without being uncomfortably heavy.  (Pictured: Mr. Ben finished in IP Rose Gold with black interchangeable bezel.)

Doyen-engraved double crown accentuates the opposite side of the case. (Pictured: Mr. Ben finished in IP Gold with white interchangeable bezel).

Secure, four-screw caseback.  Each rare and unique timepiece is individually numbered.  Mr. Ben is water-resistant to 100 meters and carries a 2-year international warranty.  (Pictured: Mr. Ben finished in IP Rose Gold)

Specifications and finish options

  • Choose from these finishes: Stainless Steel, IP Gold, and IP Rose Gold
  • Choose from these dial colours: White, Black, Yellow, Blue
  • Interchangeable PRESSTURN bezels available in these colours: 

 

 

Lady Ben

For centuries, the world has looked to Great Britain and witnessed before them the very definition of powerful women - women who have had an indelible impact on history and the world in which we live. 

Like those remarkable women who preceded them, women today are leading the modern world into a new era.  Driven by their strength, independence, pride and determination; defined by their inherent sense of class and elegance and an unwavering sense of duty not only to their careers but to family and society - today’s women truly do it all.

Punctual and always on the go.  Endlessly adaptable.  These are the modern-day doyennes that were the inspiration for our first lady’s timepiece: Lady Ben. 

 

Lady Ben: As Adaptable As The Modern Woman

 

 

 

What We Need and What You Get

If you're like us - wherever you live and wherever you are from - and hold a deep appreciation for Great Britain and what she represents, we're asking you to help us by backing our Mr. Ben and Lady Ben watches.  In the process, you'll be helping to bring the Doyen brand to life, and bring us closer to releasing additional timepieces inspired by other icons of British culture.  

We are raising $30,000 that will be used for the first production runs of Mr. Ben and Lady Ben.  

Both runs will be limited in quantity, ensuring that your watch remains rare and unique.   

 

Risks & Challenges

Other Ways You Can Help

We understand that not everyone can contribute to our campaign right away.  But if you have a love for Great Britain like we do here at Doyen, we'd appreciate your help in getting the word out so we can make Doyen and the Big Ben collection a reality.  Please consider:

  • Using the share buttons for Facebook, Twitter, etc. at the top right of this page and sharing Big Ben with your friends and followers.
     
  • Suggesting Big Ben as a gift: When your mates are pondering a gift for their significant others, family or friends - do them (and us!) a favor and suggest the Mr. Ben or Lady Ben timepieces from Doyen and steer them to this page.  
     
  • Writing about us! If you're a blogger or writer and like what you see, consider sharing our campaign with your audience.  Drop us a note at doyen@upliftpr.com if you need images or other material for your story.

Using the share buttons for Facebook, Twitter, etc. at the top right of this page and sharing Big Ben with your friends and followers.

story:
Our Story 

Our Founder Omolara, launched Heels and the City in April 2017 after she a grew tired of being overlooked by the footwear industry.  At 5’10 and a 9.5UK shoe size, Omolara, aged 23, always felt that there wasn’t a fashionable enough range of options available in her size.

From the age of 9 she wore a size 7UK and wanted nothing more than to wear the same sparkly shoes her friends of the same age, wore to their parties. However, her only option was to buy shoes for women 4 times her age which were not only inappropriate adult styles, but were also just frumpy.

By taking matters into our own hands, we decided it was time to create our own brand after unsuccessfully trying to find styles we loved online or on the high street.  With the average women shoe size being a 6UK, its quite baffling how most brands ignore the huge demand for fashionable and affordable shoe for women who are not average. Nevertheless, we decided to take on the task!

Within 6 short months we have achieved a lot! From creating our Instagram and Twitter and launching our web mailing list to completing 3 photoshoots and signing a media partnership with the global hospitality group ‘Nobu’ with whom we shot our debut collection at their first European hotel in Shoreditch, London.

In September, our Founder Omolara and Brand Strategist Esmé who is 6’ft 1 and wears a size 9UK travelled to our factory in China to finalise the first collection and start production to ensure we can be ready to launch for December 2017.  

Image from A/W17 Campaign 

Our Mission

Heels and the City (HATC) is the ultimate online shoe shopping destination that caters for women like yourself, size UK 7 - UK 11.

Our name was created with the idea that a good pair of shoes can make you feel confident in any situation and in any city.

From the long day in the office closing that new client account to partying the night away on ladies night, we want you to feel gorgeous and empowered at all times regardless of having a larger shoe size.

Here at HATC we are also looking to change the conversation and stigma around women having a larger shoe size. We spoke to over 400 women and the issues are all the same; from media shaming to stories of being ‘size shamed’ by sales assistants in stores, the majority of women we spoke with have been made to feel ashamed and embarrassed about something that they cannot change.

Images from A/W17 Campaign

Many female celebrities that wear between a size 7 – 11UK shoe include Kendall Jenner, Heidi Klum, Cindy Crawford and Serena Williams Paris Hilton, Oprah, Kate Winslet, Tyra Banks, Elle Macpherson, Michelle Obama and Uma Thurman. However, celebrities can commission brands that would not normally cater to them or have made to order shoes.

HATC aims to make all women with larger feet feel like a celebrity by wearing our shoes that are the latest styles and with standard and wider fittings, the perfect fit.

Image from A/W17 Campaign

Our Branding

The HATC Girls 

The quintessential HATC Girl is a woman creating her own lane and conquering the world one step at a time. She is metropolitan and a social chameleon. Her wardrobe is a mixture of brands from Zara to Balenciaga and she loves a sample sale. Spending her lunch breaks surfing the web for top celebrity gossip to power business meeting luncheons eating overpriced sandwich wraps from Pret as she climbs the career ladder. She ends Fridays meeting with friends on a rooftop for post-work drinks and weekly debrief on their dating lives, ridiculous rent prices, and of course upcoming sample sales! She is living a fast paced life in the big city and trying to balance it all to make it her own.

With this in mind we wanted to create not 1 but 5 women who are not only diverse racially and represent a global community but diverse in their careers and goals so women around the world could feel represented. Meet the HATC Muses: Tatiana, Naomi, Huda, Lidae´ and Aiko Lee.  

   

             Our Muses                          

Mailing List

Our online mailing list has been such a hit! Created to give a true feel of 'city chic' our prospective clients receive a sneak preview of what is to come in our debut collection whilst signing up to be among the first to be kept up to date and of course purchase our shoes!

Our mailing list webpage 

Social Media

Our Twitter and Instagram pages are such important channels for us to connect and interact with the public and supporters of our brand. The excitement and anticipation building around our brand is growing from strength to strength daily as women around the world have finally found a brand that represents them.  

          Our social media pages

Our Product 

We have worked tirelessly over 6 months to improve the styles for our first collection from sample to ready for production stage. We have expanded our range from initially 5 styles to 7 styles to now a finale 9 to give you, our customers the best options possible

Sample Stage

After spending several weeks researching different suppliers around the world it had come to our attention after multiple recommendations that Sichuan Province in China was the #1 for top quality shoes. 

Retailers such as Zara who we see as a benchmark competitor, produces all their shoes in this region. We commissioned multiple pairs of samples shoes and tested them on several women like yourselves to get feedback on, fit, style and comfort in order to improve the overall quality of the product.

                                      

Our prototype collection before development 

 

Size

The 7 - 11 UK size  demographic was selected due to the increasing lack of fashionable styles and correct fitting shoes available on the market. Heels and The City have combined both affordability and availability something women with large feet fittings struggle to obtain.

                     

Development 

We have learnt that business isn’t an easy road and the initial plans you make 6 months prior do not always go to plan. We aimed for a September launch back in April however we wanted to make sure our product was the best possible. So we travelled to China in September ‘17 to meet our Chinese partners, tour our factory, develop the line further and finalise the collection.

We spent several hours at our factory editing existing styles, trying new materials, choosing new colours for existing styles and expanding our range. It was truly amazing to have even more hands on experience building our brand from scratch.

We finalised the collection with 5 new colours and 2 brand new styles including a block heeled boot for customers who wanted more options than a stiletto!

 

Our Founder working in our factory in Sichuan, China

    

Product development  - Colours, Quality and New Styles 

 

Cushion Sole Technology 

Designed by our team whilst in China, with your comfort in mind, all our shoes will be fitted with our “Cushion Sole” technology to enhance the heels experience. The cushion sole is placed inside the insole of the shoe to make our heels as comfortable as possible. We are focused on easing the pressure away from the balls of your feet so you can focus on conquering your day.

No other premium retailer is focused on providing comfort in their heels, something that puts a lot of  women off wanting to purchase heels for every occasion. As we grow taller and our body frames become bigger we need to start looking after our feet and making sure we are choosing the best fit all round.

                                                         Prototype stage whilst visiting our factory 

Risks and Challenges

We have done the groundwork and proven our competence as a team by finalising to the stage that it is in production and securing partnerships with a number of established brands.

We have a great relationship with our factory which we have strengthened further through our recent visit to Asia. 

Money has been our greatest challenge which we have risen to by personally financing this process so far and therefore cannot see any further issues so long as we have your backing.  During this process, we will keep our backers fully updated on all details of our campaign. 

       

                         Behind the scenes of our shoot day 

 

Why You Should Back Our Campaign 

Not only is there such a huge gap in the market for our line, but we are fixing a global issue for  women who have been neglected from the retail industries.  In a time where plus sized fashion and body positivity is front and centre stage, women everywhere have started to finally feel included with regards to their body shapes in magazines and ready to wear campaigns so now its time to make women feel just as empowered with their shoe size. 

The first collection is currently in production and will be ready for you to purchase in December '17 if we can hit our goal of £20,000. Your pledges will cover the following: 

  • Completing production of 540 pairs of shoes  
  • Import and fully outsourced delivery cycle
  • Marketing and PR services
  • Completing our website 
  • Photoshoots and press
  • First steps of development for our S/S18 collection which will be bigger, brighter and better! 
  • Dedicated desk space area at WeWork

 

Image from A/W17 Campaign 

 

Here at Heels and The City, we would like to thank you for viewing our crowdfunding campaign and hopefully with your support we can bring our idea to life! 

Visit our website and join our mailing list here!

xoxo

Special Thanks To...

Boy Wonder Management  , Creative Media Agency 

Leann Visser, Illustrator 

 Nobu Shoreditch

Fidgit Media
story_txt:
Our Story Our Founder Omolara, launched Heels and the City in April 2017 after she a grew tired of being overlooked by the footwear industry.  At 5’10 and a 9.5UK shoe size, Omolara, aged 23, always felt that there wasn’t a fashionable enough range of options available in her size.From the age of 9 she wore a size 7UK and wanted nothing more than to wear the same sparkly shoes her friends of the same age, wore to their parties. However, her only option was to buy shoes for women 4 times her age which were not only inappropriate adult styles, but were also just frumpy.By taking matters into our own hands, we decided it was time to create our own brand after unsuccessfully trying to find styles we loved online or on the high street.  With the average women shoe size being a 6UK, its quite baffling how most brands ignore the huge demand for fashionable and affordable shoe for women who are not average. Nevertheless, we decided to take on the task!Within 6 short months we have achieved a lot! From creating our Instagram and Twitter and launching our web mailing list to completing 3 photoshoots and signing a media partnership with the global hospitality group ‘Nobu’ with whom we shot our debut collection at their first European hotel in Shoreditch, London.In September, our Founder Omolara and Brand Strategist Esmé who is 6’ft 1 and wears a size 9UK travelled to our factory in China to finalise the first collection and start production to ensure we can be ready to launch for December 2017.  Image from A/W17 Campaign Our MissionHeels and the City (HATC) is the ultimate online shoe shopping destination that caters for women like yourself, size UK 7 - UK 11.Our name was created with the idea that a good pair of shoes can make you feel confident in any situation and in any city.From the long day in the office closing that new client account to partying the night away on ladies night, we want you to feel gorgeous and empowered at all times regardless of having a larger shoe size.Here at HATC we are also looking to change the conversation and stigma around women having a larger shoe size. We spoke to over 400 women and the issues are all the same; from media shaming to stories of being ‘size shamed’ by sales assistants in stores, the majority of women we spoke with have been made to feel ashamed and embarrassed about something that they cannot change.Images from A/W17 CampaignMany female celebrities that wear between a size 7 – 11UK shoe include Kendall Jenner, Heidi Klum, Cindy Crawford and Serena Williams Paris Hilton, Oprah, Kate Winslet, Tyra Banks, Elle Macpherson, Michelle Obama and Uma Thurman. However, celebrities can commission brands that would not normally cater to them or have made to order shoes.HATC aims to make all women with larger feet feel like a celebrity by wearing our shoes that are the latest styles and with standard and wider fittings, the perfect fit.Image from A/W17 CampaignOur Branding
The HATC Girls The quintessential HATC Girl is a woman creating her own lane and conquering the world one step at a time. She is metropolitan and a social chameleon. Her wardrobe is a mixture of brands from Zara to Balenciaga and she loves a sample sale. Spending her lunch breaks surfing the web for top celebrity gossip to power business meeting luncheons eating overpriced sandwich wraps from Pret as she climbs the career ladder. She ends Fridays meeting with friends on a rooftop for post-work drinks and weekly debrief on their dating lives, ridiculous rent prices, and of course upcoming sample sales! She is living a fast paced life in the big city and trying to balance it all to make it her own.With this in mind we wanted to create not 1 but 5 women who are not only diverse racially and represent a global community but diverse in their careers and goals so women around the world could feel represented. Meet the HATC Muses: Tatiana, Naomi, Huda, Lidae´ and Aiko Lee.                  Our Muses                          Mailing ListOur online mailing list has been such a hit! Created to give a true feel of 'city chic' our prospective clients receive a sneak preview of what is to come in our debut collection whilst signing up to be among the first to be kept up to date and of course purchase our shoes!Our mailing list webpage Social MediaOur Twitter and Instagram pages are such important channels for us to connect and interact with the public and supporters of our brand. story:
Risks & Challenges

All projects have risks, but we've tried to minimize ours by pre-ordering enough material for over 20x our funding goal. From there we have identified primary and backup factories that will begin production as soon as we finish the campaign. Additionally, we have already completed a sample run with our packaging design partner, and have previously shipped thousands of orders with our logistics and fulfillment supplier.

With 10+ years of experience in eCommerce operations and fulfillment, our team is confident we can deliver on time after we reach our funding goals.

Risks & Challenges
All projects have risks, but we've tried to minimize ours by pre-ordering enough material for over 20x our funding goal. From there we have identified primary and backup factories that will begin production as soon as we finish the campaign. Additionally, we have already completed a sample run with our packaging design partner, and have previously shipped thousands of orders with our logistics and fulfillment supplier.
With 10+ years of experience in eCommerce operations and fulfillment, our team is confident we can deliver on time after we reach our funding goals.

story:
Summary

The Covidisor is a Powered Air Purifying Respirator (PAPR) protecting your entire head without hiding it.  It provides bi-directional N95 (or N100) air filtration, is light weight, comfortable to wear for extended periods, easy to put on & take off, and is beard and Face ID friendly. 

People wearing the Covidisor can work both safer and closer than otherwise, whether in the office, at school, or even socially.  The current public health requirement of face masks and 6' physical distancing when indoors has radically changed office layouts, elevator occupancy, public transit ridership, and is dissuading many from returning to offices and schools.

Imagine what can be reclaimed in the workplace and the classroom if it was safe to work closer than 6 feet.  The Covidisor aims to make that possible.

Its clear polycarbonate shell provides full visibility for and of the wearer and its bi-directional filtration protects both the wearer and others nearby.  A variable speed fan assures a comfortable stream of filtered air in the wearer's "air bubble" and also filters exhaled air for the safety of colleagues and co-workers.

The Covidisor is conceived and designed by architects and engineers in New York who are passionate about helping people safely work in offices, teach on campus, and socialize publicly in the time of COVID.

In this campaign, we are looking for 200 angel backers to 1) support the remaining engineering and production of the first 200 field test units; 2) to field test the Covidisor in their respective office, university, factory, and farm environments; and 3) to provide us feedback before we finalize the design and go to mass production.

Features:

  • Head mounted and center weighted, so it's light and balanced to wear.
  • Quick and easy to don/doff.  Just put it on like a hat and pull a neck strap to make it airtight.
  • Battery powered fan filters air in both directions, keeping you and others safe, and without breathing fatigue.
  • Swivel mount allows you to rotate the outer sphere while wearing, so for example to drink via a straw inserted in one of Covidisor's ports  (drinking connector provided).

 

What We Need & What You Get

We are seeking $49,000 to cover the remaining engineering work and fabrication of 200 fully functional field test units of the Covidisor.

You can back our efforts with a contribution of any amount and you can also get early access to the Covidisor via our $245 perk that gets you a fully functional "engineering" release unit for field testing plus first delivery of the production version at 50% discount.

The "engineering" release is a fully functional unit with custom 3D printed components that we can rapidly modify and send out to our angel backers based on their feedback.  We have sourced all the other parts needed for the Covidisor.

 

The Impact

We believe that the Covidisor with its transparent full head protection and bi-directional air filtering will allow:

  • Office and manufacturing workers to work in closer proximity than if wearing regular masks masks
  • Professors to teach and lecture on campus
  • Manufacturing and farm workers to work in closer proximity
  • Everyone to regain their smile and identity!

 

Risks & Challenges

We've been heads down working on the Covidisor the past two months.  There were early challenges of air flow and humidity in the sphere that we've resolved.  We are now working on optimization of the 3D printed components and connectors.  What's most needed now is user feedback from a sizable group of early adopters/backers. 

 

Other Ways You Can Help

We've priced the perk to cover the remaining engineering work and production of the first 200 test units.  If $245 is out of reach for you at the moment, but you see the potential of the Covidisor, you can help by spreading the word about the Covidisor.  

The quicker we reach our campaign goal, the quicker we get the field test units out, and in turn the quicker we finalize the design, manufacture it, and get it out at a lower price.

Please share widely using the share links for this campaign.

story:
The Kapwatch Story

Frustrated by the lack of Filipino inspired watches, Kapwatch was established through the beautiful mixture of a strong passion for watches and a love for Filipino culture. Inspired by traditional Filipino designs, we wanted to create something that was not only unique but also best showcased the beauty of these designs all in a wearable timepiece. We have spent the past year working with different watch manufacturers to create an affordable, stylish, Filipino-inspired watch collection that we know everyone will love.

While designing, we made sure each of these key features was incorporated into the watch

  • A modern look that could be worn in a casual or professional setting.
  • The highest quality materials.
  • Designs inspired by traditional Filipino culture in the different regions of the Philippines.
  • Offer a unique, one-of-a-kind watch at an affordable price point

 

The Kapwatch Unity Collection

For our first watch collection, we are offering 3 different watches and 6 colored watch bands to choose from!

To best showcase the beauty and unity of the Philippines, the watch pulls designs from each of the three main regions (Luzon, Visayas, and Mindanao) and combines them into a uniformed stylish watch. With this modern take, we wanted to keep true to the cultural heritage of the designs as well as make something you can wear in a casual or professional setting.

 

 

Kapwatch Fully Backed 1 Year Warranty 

A quality brand comes with quality watches! We are confident with the watch’s durability and quality that if anything happens to it within the first year, we encourage you to send it back to us and we will replace it for you free of charge. Warranty includes all internal components of the watch.

Kapwatch Warranty does not include:  

  • The life of the battery 
  • Wear and tear and aging (i.e. scratched sapphire glass; alteration and discoloration of  straps and chains, such as leather, textile and metal; peeling of plating, etc.) 
  • Any damage on any part of the watch resulting from abnormal/abusive use, lack of care, negligence, accidents (knocks dents, crushing, broken crystal, etc.) 

 

The Future of Kapwatch?

We want to keep introducing full lines of different types and styles of modern Filipino-inspired watches that DON’T compromise on affordability and quality. We will always stay true to and put Filipino inspired designs first and we want you to be part of this journey. To our backers, we will be sending out important updates not only throughout the whole process but also after the campaign to make sure our supporters stay informed and be part of the process. It is important for us to build relationships and a community with our backers because ultimately you are the ones helping turn the dream into a reality. We are excited to grow and have you be a part of making milestones every step of the way!

 

Kapwatch Founder

I’m Dwight Ong, founder of Kapwatch. As a young Filipino-American from Cebu, I have been fascinated by watches and inspired by my cultural heritage for as long as I can remember. I sought to combine my two strongest passions and turn them into something that makes a lasting impression and brings representation to the Filipino community around the world.

Kapwatch is built with quality and Filipino designs in mind. I want to express the beauty of the many different Filipino groups through high-quality timepieces that look good for everyone in any setting. With watches built to last, the purpose is to make watches that carry a piece of Filipino culture throughout the generations.

 

Watch Specifications:

  • Material case: 316L stainless steel
  • Diameter case: 41mm
  • Display: Analog
  • Thickness: 10.5 mm
  • Side Engraving: Yes
  • Band Width: 20mm
  • Easily Interchangeable Bands: Yes
  • Water-resistance: 5ATM
  • Glass: Sapphire glass
  • Movement: Japan Miyota 2035 Movt

 

With a fully functional and tested prototype, we just need one last thing… your support!

 

We Need Your Support!

In order to make this dream possible we need your support. Not only does this mean pledging support for one of our unique watches, but also sharing the Kapwatch story with a friend. With Indiegogo, the important thing to remember is that if we don't reach our full funding goal....we get nothing.

In order to reach our goal, we are going to do everything we can to spread the word in a variety of ways. Through social media, blogs, and marketing we know we can drive enough outside traffic to our page to help fulfill the funding goal. With your help, something as simple as liking, sharing, or talking about our page in groups can really go a long way. Simply click the Facebook and Instagram tabs and help us spread the word!

 

When funded, how will you fulfill the orders?

Our Kapwatch Unity collection prototype design has been adjusted and finalized. We collaborated and purchased the molds with a reputable manufacturer in the industry and once we receive the funds from Indiegogo, we can pay the initial deposit and immediately begin production. Production time takes roughly 45-50 days depending on the quantity of the order. We will then ship the orders to our amazing backers and supporters to get them to you as soon as possible!

 

Kapwatch risks and challenges

One of Kapwatch’s challenges will be getting the word out, and convincing people like you to participate. We know there are so many different projects to choose from, but we hope that Kapwatch is a project that you believe to be worth backing. In order to reach as many people as possible, we are asking everyone from friends, families, influencers, and multiple targeted blogs to help spread our story and project!

Once funded, scaling will also be another challenge. We know that finding good help is hard, but we made sure to find the right manufacturer for our project and developed a great relationship with them for the past year. This gives us the confidence to fulfill our future goals and expanding the selection.

 

We thank you again for all your help kickstarting the project: Kapwatch

Simply click the Facebook and Instagram tabs and help us spread the word! When funded, how will you fulfill the orders?Our Kapwatch Unity collection prototype design has been adjusted and finalized. We collaborated and purchased the molds with a reputable manufacturer in the industry and once we receive the funds from Indiegogo, we can pay the initial deposit and immediately begin production. Production time takes roughly 45-50 days depending on the quantity of the order. We will then ship the orders to our amazing backers and supporters to get them to you as soon as possible! Kapwatch risks and challengesOne of Kapwatch’s challenges will be getting the word out, and convincing people like you to participate. We know there are so many different projects to choose from, but we hope that Kapwatch is a project that you believe to be worth backing. In order to reach as many people as possible, we are asking everyone from friends, families, influencers, and multiple targeted blogs to help spread our story and project!Once funded, scaling will also be another challenge. We know that finding good help is hard, but we made sure to find the right manufacturer for our project and developed a great relationship with them for the past year. This gives us the confidence to fulfill our future goals and expanding the selection. We thank you again for all your help kickstarting the project: Kapwatch

story:
FREE INTERNATIONAL SHIPPING

 

End of campaign 45% off Special. 

Step 1: Pick a watch Dial you like. 

Step 2: Choose whether you want the watch with a FLAT sapphire crystal OR a DOME sapphire crystal. 

All watches come with three easy to change straps, no need to pick. You get ALL 3 straps with purchase. 

Mission

              XIII XI celebrates growth that is transcending. XIII XI watches are meant to remind you of the journey that you are on in life. To inspire you to define your purpose and make it definite. Our logo and watch designs are derived from sacred geometry, such as the “flower of life” pattern, which has been said to be nature’s blueprint when creating all that is matter. Our brand aims to remind you that with time comes change, and though change is inevitable, the secret is not to resist; but accept and embrace change; to grow with time.

              Our watches are as beautiful as they are loaded with symbology; from the name of the watches and logo to the designs; our watches are packed with significance and harmony. Though compliments are bound to happen when wearing our beautiful watches, our aim is not for you to buy them for the purpose of impression-management or superficial flexing. There comes a point in every person’s life where we have grown to the point that we shed our old selves and become something greater; unrecognizable to the old self. Like a caterpillar morphs into a butterfly. This growth is transcending, where the growth that we have made amounts to something great and becomes apparent to everyone that knew us. These are moments that mark a personal evolution. That’s what XIII XI stands for. The number 13 is symbolic of this transcended growth. For example, there are 12 musical notes in a harmonic scale, the 13th note is simply the first note vibrating at a higher frequency. The number 11 is symbolic of synchronicity, where two unrelated events coincide with each other and give us a sign that we are on the right path.  This is the meaning XIII XI (13:11), to grow with time in a transcending way.

              XIII XI is committed to bringing you value that is more than just tangible. Our mission is to inspire personal growth as we challenge ourselves to grow with time as well. Being pragmatic in our approach but unwavering on our mission.

 

COMPANY DESCRIPTION

Describe the company’s products or services. How many are there? What makes them different and unique? Why should a customer buy them?

              There are currently two watch series, the Sacred Geometry men’s series that comes with four dial options; and the “Fruit of Life” women’s series that also comes with the option of four different dials. All watches come with three easy to change straps, a metal strap, a silicone strap, and a leather band; each strap changes the look drastically and provides an array of options to match all your moods and go with any occasion. The watch cases are made with a durable 316L stainless steel and a swiss quartz movement. They are 50 meters water-resistant and come with an option of a dome sapphire crystal or a flat sapphire crystal with a magnifier over the date window. They are presented in a beautiful and unique book that makes for a great gift.

              Each watch is named after esoteric knowledge such as universal laws that govern the universe and consciousness itself. We not only aim to sell watches but more importantly aim to use our brand to bring awareness to the power that we all have when we fix our minds on the attainment of our dreams and work in a definite way to attain them. We want our watches to remind you of that journey that you are on and to inspire you to grow with time and not to drift away from your dreams.

Watches come in a unique box that is inspired by an ancient book. 

 

 

All watches come with a serialized card of authenticity. 

 

Watch Specifications:

5 ATM (50 Meters water resistant)

Swiss Rhonda 715 Movement

316L Stainless Steele Case

Sapphire Crystal... Available in either in Dome or Flat with magnifier over the date window.  

Comes with three easy to change straps.

1.)Stainless Steele band

2.)Silicone band

3.) Genuine Leather band

story:
Short Summary

My name is Nicole Locorriere (LA-core-AIR-ah. I know, I know) and I'm an Associate Marriage and Family Therapist in New Jersey.

So, an MFT doesn't necessarily only see couples and families. Really, it means we're specially trained to see problems as a result of how we relate to the world (+people) around us. This puts me in the unique position of deeply understanding the effect STIGMA has on society.

Stigma is a negative perception about someone or something that makes people think it/they have less value, even if it's a baseless stereotype. And there's a HUGE stigma around going to therapy right now. People believe you only go if there's something wrong with you, or you need fixing. But I know, as do you, my dear Potential-Backer-and-New-Favorite-Human, that everyone can benefit from therapy. The more we shout this message from the rooftops, the more people will feel comfortable getting the help and validation they deserve.

By backing my Spill The Tea bags, you'll be doing three amazing things. First, simply carrying the bag around in public shows everyone around you that it's okay to talk about therapy. Second, 25% of the profit from your bag will go to To Write Love on Her Arms, a mental health organization that, among other things, gives people access to therapy. Third, you get to show off how cool you are, knowing what the kids these days are saying.

 

Stigma has left the chat.

 

What We Need

I believe doing this project the right way will cost about $4,000. Here's a breakdown of how I'll use it. I will:

  • Pay my awesome designer, Lara, who is currently working on an original design for us.
  • Make promo bags to give away to influencers, local businesses, etc.
  • Purchase a trademark. (I'd love for others to get into stigma-busting design, but if a bunch of people try to take this phrase and run with it, nobody wins)
  • Have capital for the first bunch of bags that go out to customers
  • Have an emergency fund for unforeseen circumstances. Call it a first-time founder fee!

 

If I don't reach this goal, the funds will go toward making sure those who ordered bags still receive them. 

If there turns out to be EXTRA funding, it will be donated straight to TWLOHA or the organization we are working with at that time. 

 

The Impact

Ooh, the fun part!

Spill The Tea bags are not simply another bag that proves how #woke you are. (Even though its true, and you're awesome for it!) The real impact comes from the fact that we'll be donating a portion of the profit to mental health organizations that are really making a difference in the field. However, I plan to do this in a unique way to benefit as many organizations as possible. 

For every 100 bags sold, I will change the organization based on who YOU choose. Do you know a mental health organization that really deserves some love? Let's add it to the list! The more you share the bag, the more organizations we can get through!

We'll be starting with my favorite mental health organization, To Write Love on Her Arms. 

TWLOHA is a nonprofit organization dedicated to helping those who struggle with depression, addiction, self-harm, and suicide. Since they got started in 2006, they have donated over $2 MILLION to help people get access to mental health treatment. They also fight stigma like it's their JOB (oh, wait...). They have a presence on college campuses all across the country, and they're getting started on high schools now. They have also travelled over 3 million collective miles meeting people in their communities to offer help and validation. 

 

Please leave me a comment with other organizations you'd like to see receive a Spill The Tea donation!

 

Risks & Challenges

Honesty and transparency are a big chunk of a therapist's work. We must be honest with ourselves so our clients feel comfortable being honest with us. The same goes for this project. I would never expect you to feel comfortable giving me your hard-earned money without being honest about risks you may face.

The most obvious challenge I face in making Spill The Tea bags is that I'm a first-time founder. I've never tried to sell a product, and I've never run a crowdfunding campaign. In that way, this whole project is a bit of a risk. However, the strongest defense I have against that risk is your support and constructive feedback. The bigger and more close-knit our community, the more we can accomplish.

You may notice that I also added wiggle-room in my financial goal to cover expenses I wasn't initially aware of. I have also given us way more time than I think we'll need to get to the production and shipping stages. 

 

Other Ways You Can Help

I totally understand if you don't have the money to financially support Spill The Tea bags right now. You can still help us along though! Someone on your Facebook timeline, Twitter feed, or Instagram feed is as #woke as you, with a slightly thicker wallet ;)

Indiegogo has handy-dandy share tools that make it really easy to make some noise! Hit 'em all like a little kid in an elevator. 

 

Truly, thank you from the bottom of my heart for backing this project. You're doing amazing, sweetie.
